<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> A few weeks ago, we launched an important new part  </s>
<s> of the Affordable Care Act.  </s>
<s> It's called the Marketplace.  </s>
<s> And for Americans without health insurance,  </s>
<s> and Americans who buy insurance on their own  </s>
<s> because they can't get it at work, it's a very big deal.  </s>
<s> If you're one of those people, the Affordable Care Act  </s>
<s> makes you part of a big group plan for the first time.  </s>
<s> The Marketplace is where you can apply and shop  </s>
<s> for affordable new health insurance choices.  </s>
<s> It gathers insurers under one system  </s>
<s> to compete for your business.  </s>
<s> And that choice and competition have actually  </s>
<s> helped bring prices down.  </s>
<s> Ultimately, the easiest way to buy insurance  </s>
<s> in this Marketplace will be a new website, HealthCare.gov.  </s>
<s> But as you may have heard, the site isn't working  </s>
<s> the way it's supposed to yet.  </s>
<s> That's frustrating for all of us who have worked so hard  </s>
<s> to make sure everyone who needs it gets health care.  </s>
<s> And it's especially frustrating for the Americans  </s>
<s> who've been trying to get covered.  </s>
<s> The site has been visited more than 20 million times so far.  </s>
<s> Nearly 700,000 people have applied for coverage already.  </s>
<s> That proves just how much demand there is  </s>
<s> for these new quality,  affordable health care choices.  </s>
<s> And that's why, in the coming weeks,  </s>
<s> we are going to get it working as smoothly as it's supposed to.  </s>
<s> We've got people working overtime, 24/7,  </s>
<s> to boost capacity and address these problems,  </s>
<s> every single day.  </s>
<s> But even as we improve the website,  </s>
<s> remember that the website isn't the only way  </s>
<s> to apply for coverage under these new plans.  </s>
<s> We've updated HealthCare.gov to offer more information  </s>
<s> about enrolling over the phone, by mail,  </s>
<s> or in person with a specially-trained navigator  </s>
<s> who can help answer your questions.  </s>
<s> Just call 1-800-318-2596 or visit LocalHelp.HealthCare.gov.  </s>
<s> And don't worry - these plans will not sell out.  </s>
<s> We're only a few weeks into a six-month open enrollment  </s>
<s> period, and everyone who wants insurance  </s>
<s> through the Marketplace will get it.  </s>
<s> Some people have poked fun at me this week  </s>
<s> for sounding like an insurance salesman.  </s>
<s> And that's okay.  </s>
<s> I'd still be out there championing this law  </s>

<s> know the economic security of health care.  </s>

<s> and threatened default over it.  </s>
<s> As I've said many times before, I'm willing to work  </s>
<s> with anyone, on any idea, who's actually willing  </s>
<s> to make this law perform better.  </s>
<s> But it's well past the time for folks to stop rooting  </s>
<s> for its failure.  </s>
<s> Because hardworking, middle-class families  </s>
<s> are rooting for its success.  </s>
<s> The Affordable Care Act gives people who've been stuck with  </s>

<s> The President: Hello, everybody.  </s>
<s> One of America's greatest strengths is our free market.  </s>
<s> A thriving private sector is the lifeblood of our economy  </s>
<s> - it's how we create jobs, expand opportunities,  </s>
<s> and give everybody a shot at success.  </s>
<s> It's what has made America the strongest country on Earth.  </s>
<s> The most essential ingredient in a healthy free  </s>
<s> market is competition.  </s>
<s> But right now, too many companies are engaging in  </s>
<s> behaviors that stifle competition - like blocking  </s>
<s> new competitors from entering the market or  </s>
<s> limiting the information and options that give consumers  </s>
<s> real choice.  </s>
<s> As a consequence, the rest of us pay higher prices for  </s>
<s> lower quality products and services.  </s>
<s> Workers receive lower wages than they otherwise would.  </s>
<s> Small businesses and entrepreneurs can get  </s>
<s> squeezed out of the market.  </s>
<s> And none of that is fair - or good for our economy.  </s>
<s> The deck should not be stacked in favor of the  </s>
<s> wealthiest individuals and the biggest corporations,  </s>
<s> against working Americans.  </s>
<s> That's why my administration is doing everything we can  </s>
<s> to reverse this trend and promote more competition  </s>
<s> in the marketplace.  </s>
<s> In addition to enforcing the rules on the books,  </s>
<s> I've directed federal agencies to identify  </s>
<s> anti-competitive behavior in different industries,  </s>
<s> and find new and specific ways to promote competition.  </s>
<s> One industry that's ripe for change is cable TV.  </s>
<s> Right now, 99 percent of cable and satellite TV  </s>
<s> customers rent set-top boxes from their providers.  </s>
<s> According to one survey, this costs households an  </s>
<s> average of more than $230 per year.  </s>
<s> We spend some $20 billion to rent these devices.  </s>
<s> While we have almost unlimited choice in what we  </s>
<s> watch on television, from traditional programming to  </s>
<s> online content, there's next to no competition to build a  </s>
<s> better, user-friendly product that allows you to  </s>
<s> easily access all this content in one place.  </s>
<s> So most consumers just rent whatever  </s>
<s> the cable company offers.  </s>
<s> Because we have to.  </s>
<s> That means companies have little incentive  </s>
<s> to innovate.  </s>
<s> As a consequence, we need multiple devices and  </s>
<s> controllers to access content from different sources.  </s>
<s> That makes no sense.  </s>
<s> So my administration has encouraged the FCC to remove  </s>
<s> the barriers to competition that prevent new players  </s>
<s> from offering innovative cable box options to consumers.  </s>
<s> We know this works.  </s>
<s> For years, Americans had to rent our telephones  </s>
<s> from the phone company.  </s>
<s> This was a while ago, but when the FCC finally  </s>
<s> unlocked competition for home phones,  </s>
<s> the marketplace was flooded with all kinds of phone  </s>
<s> options with new features, and at different price points.  </s>
<s> Consumers suddenly had many options.  </s>
<s> And the whole industry moved forward as a result.  </s>

<s> consumers, workers, businesses, and our economy.  </s>

<s> President Obama: Recently, there have been signs that the economy is  </s>
<s> picking up steam.  </s>
<s> Last month, we saw the strongest job growth in five years,  </s>
<s> and have added more than three-quarters of a million  </s>
<s> private sector jobs in just three months.  </s>
<s> But there are still too many Americans who are either looking  </s>
<s> for work, or struggling to pay the bills and make the mortgage.  </s>
<s> Paychecks aren't getting any bigger,  </s>
<s> but the cost of everything from groceries to college tuition  </s>
<s> keeps on rising.  </s>
<s> Without a doubt, one of the biggest burdens over the last  </s>
<s> few months has been the price of gasoline.  </s>
<s> In many places, gas is now more than $4 a gallon,  </s>
<s> meaning that you could be paying more than $60 to fill  </s>
<s> up your tank.  </s>
<s> These spikes in gas prices are often temporary,  </s>
<s> and while there are no quick fixes to the problem,  </s>
<s> there are a few steps we should take that make good sense.  </s>
<s> First, we should make sure that no one is taking advantage of  </s>
<s> consumers at the pump.  </s>
<s> That's why we've launched a task force led by the Attorney  </s>
<s> General that has one job: rooting out cases of fraud or  </s>
<s> manipulation in the markets that might affect gas prices,  </s>
<s> including any illegal activity by traders and speculators.  </s>
<s> Second, we should increase safe and responsible oil production  </s>
<s> here at home.  </s>
<s> Last year, America's oil production reached its highest  </s>
<s> level since 2003.  </s>
<s> But I believe that we should continue to expand oil  </s>
<s> production in America -- even as we increase safety and  </s>
<s> environmental standards.  </s>
<s> To do this, I'm directing the Department of Interior to  </s>
<s> conduct annual lease sales in Alaska's National Petroleum  </s>
<s> Reserve, while respecting sensitive areas,  </s>
<s> and to speed up the evaluation of oil and gas resources in the  </s>
<s> mid and south Atlantic.  </s>
<s> We plan to lease new areas in the Gulf of Mexico as well,  </s>
<s> and work to create new incentives for industry to  </s>
<s> develop their unused leases both on and offshore.  </s>
<s> We're also taking steps to give companies time to meet higher  </s>
<s> safety standards when it comes to exploration and drilling.  </s>
<s> That's why my Administration is extending drilling leases in  </s>
<s> areas of the Gulf that were impacted by the temporary  </s>
<s> moratorium, as well as certain areas off the coast of Alaska.  </s>
<s> And to streamline that permitting process,  </s>
<s> I'm establishing a new team to coordinate work on Alaska  </s>
<s> drilling permits.  </s>
<s> Finally, the third step we should take is to eliminate the  </s>
<s> taxpayer subsidies we give to oil and gas companies.  </s>
<s> In the last few months, the biggest oil companies made about  </s>
<s> $4 billion in profits each week.  </s>
<s> And yet, they get $4 billion in taxpayer subsidies each year.  </s>
<s> $4 billion at a time when Americans can barely fill  </s>
<s> up their tanks.  </s>
<s> $4 billion at a time when we're trying to reduce our deficit.  </s>
<s> This isn't fair, it makes no sense.  </s>
<s> Before I was President, the CEOs of these companies even admitted  </s>
<s> that the tax subsidies made no sense.  </s>
<s> Well, next week, there's a vote in Congress to end these oil  </s>
<s> company giveaways once and for all.  </s>
<s> And I hope Democrats and Republicans come together and  </s>
<s> get this done.  </s>
<s> The American people shouldn't be subsidizing oil companies at a  </s>
<s> time when they're making near-record profits.  </s>
<s> As a nation, we should be investing in the clean,  </s>
<s> renewable sources of energy that are the ultimate solution to  </s>
<s> high gas prices.  </s>
<s> That's why we're investing in clean energy technology,  </s>
<s> helping businesses that manufacture solar panels and  </s>
<s> wind turbines, and making sure that our cars and trucks can go  </s>
<s> further on a tank of gas -- a step that could save families as  </s>
<s> much as $3,000 at the pump.  </s>
<s> These are investments worth making --  </s>
<s> investments that will save us money,  </s>
<s> reduce our dependence on foreign oil,  </s>
<s> and protect the health and safety of our planet.  </s>

<s> we're also willing to cut what we don't need.  </s>

<s> But as we work to reform our budget,  </s>
<s> Congress should also put some skin in the game.  </s>
<s> I agree with those Republican and Democratic members of  </s>
<s> Congress who've recently said that in these challenging days,  </s>
<s> we can't afford what are called earmarks.  </s>
<s> These are items inserted into spending bills by members of  </s>

<s> Now, some of these earmarks support worthy projects in  </s>
<s> our local communities.  </s>
<s> But many others do not.  </s>
<s> We can't afford Bridges to Nowhere like the one that  </s>
<s> was planned a few years back in Alaska.  </s>
<s> Earmarks like these represent a relatively small part of overall  </s>
<s> federal spending.  </s>
<s> But when it comes to signaling our commitment to fiscal  </s>
<s> responsibility, addressing them would have an important impact.  </s>
<s> As a Senator, I helped eliminate anonymous earmarks and created  </s>
<s> new measures of transparency so Americans can better follow how  </s>
<s> their tax dollars are being spent.  </s>
<s> As President, time and again, I've called for new limitations  </s>
<s> on earmarks.  </s>
<s> We've reduced the cost of earmarks by over $3 billion.  </s>
<s> And we've put in place higher standards of transparency by  </s>
<s> putting as much information as possible on earmarks.gov.  </s>
<s> In fact, this week, we updated the site with more information  </s>
<s> about where last year's earmarks were actually spent,  </s>
<s> and made it easier to look up Members of Congress and the  </s>
<s> earmarks they fought for.  </s>
<s> Today, we have a chance to go further.  </s>
<s> We have a chance to not only shine a light on a bad  </s>
<s> Washington habit that wastes billions of taxpayer dollars,  </s>
<s> but take a step towards restoring public trust.  </s>
<s> We have a chance to advance the interests not of Republicans or  </s>
<s> Democrats, but of the American people;  </s>
<s> to put our country on the path of fiscal discipline  </s>

<s> The President: More than a decade ago, Congress set up a formula that governs  </s>
<s> how doctors get paid by the Medicare program.  </s>
<s> The intent was to slow the growth of Medicare costs,  </s>
<s> but the result was a formula that has proposed cutting  </s>
<s> payments for America's doctors year after year after year.  </s>
<s> These are cuts that would not only jeopardize our physicians'  </s>
<s> pay, but our seniors' health care.  </s>
<s> Since 2003, Congress has acted to prevent these pay cuts from  </s>
<s> going into effect.  </s>
<s> These votes were largely bipartisan,  </s>
<s> and they succeeded when Democrats ran Congress and when  </s>
<s> Republicans ran Congress -- which was most of the time.  </s>
<s> This year, a majority of Congress is willing to prevent a  </s>
<s> pay cut of 21% -- a pay cut that would undoubtedly force some  </s>
<s> doctors to stop seeing Medicare patients altogether.  </s>
<s> But this time, some Senate Republicans may even block a  </s>
<s> vote on this issue.  </s>
<s> After years of voting to defer these cuts,  </s>
<s> the other party is now willing to walk away from the needs of  </s>
<s> our doctors and our seniors.  </s>
<s> Now, I realize that simply kicking these cuts down the road  </s>
<s> another year is not a long-term solution to this problem.  </s>
<s> For years, I have said that a system where doctors are left to  </s>
<s> wonder if they'll get fairly reimbursed makes absolutely no sense.  </s>
<s> And I'm committed to permanently reforming this  </s>
<s> Medicare formula in a way that balances fiscal responsibility  </s>
<s> with the responsibility we have to doctors and seniors.  </s>
<s> In addition, we're already taking significant steps to slow  </s>
<s> the growth of Medicare costs through health insurance reform  </s>
<s> -- not by targeting doctors and seniors,  </s>
<s> but by eliminating 50% of the waste, fraud,  </s>
<s> and abuse in the system by 2012.  </s>
<s> This not only strengthens Medicare,  </s>
<s> it saves taxpayer dollars.  </s>
<s> I'm absolutely willing to take the difficult steps necessary to  </s>
<s> lower the cost of Medicare and put our budget on a more  </s>
<s> fiscally sustainable path.  </s>
<s> But I'm not willing to do that by punishing hard-working  </s>
<s> physicians or the millions of Americans who count on Medicare.  </s>
<s> That's just wrong.  </s>
<s> And that's why in the short-term,  </s>
<s> Congress must act to prevent this pay cut to doctors.  </s>
<s> If they don't act, doctors will see a 21% cut in their Medicare  </s>
<s> payments this week.  </s>
<s> This week, doctors will start receiving these lower  </s>
<s> reimbursements from the Medicare program.  </s>
<s> That could lead them to stop participating in the Medicare program.  </s>
<s> And that could lead seniors to lose their doctors.  </s>
<s> We can't allow this to happen.  </s>
<s> We have to fix this problem so that our doctors can get paid  </s>
<s> for the life-saving services they provide and keep their  </s>
<s> doors open.  </s>
<s> We have to fix this problem to keep the promise of Medicare for  </s>
<s> our seniors so that they get the health care they deserve.  </s>
<s> So I urge Republicans in the Senate to at least allow a  </s>
<s> majority of Senators and Congressmen to stop this pay cut.  </s>
<s> I urge them to stand with America's seniors and America's doctors.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>

<s> we're fighting for today.  </s>
<s> We have lessons to learn from the past  </s>
<s> -- and we have learned them.  </s>

<s> isn't one of those lessons.  </s>
<s> We can't surrender to the future -- because we are  </s>

<s> while our economy is in a position of new global  </s>
<s> strength, then China will write those rules.  </s>
<s> I've seen towns where manufacturing collapsed,  </s>
<s> plants closed down, and jobs dried up.  </s>

<s> nobody can beat us.  </s>

<s> that actually works for working Americans.  </s>

<s> we're negotiating in the Asia-Pacific --  </s>
<s> home to the world's fastest-growing markets.  </s>
<s> It's the highest-standard trade agreement in history.  </s>
<s> It's got strong provisions for workers and the  </s>
<s> environment -- provisions that,  </s>
<s> unlike in past agreements, are actually enforceable.  </s>
<s> If you want in, you have to meet these standards.  </s>
<s> If you don't, then you're out.  </s>
<s> Once you're a part of this partnership,  </s>
<s> if you violate your responsibilities,  </s>
<s> there are actually consequences.  </s>
<s> And because it would include Canada and Mexico,  </s>
<s> it fixes a lot of what was wrong with NAFTA, too.  </s>

<s> a race to the top.  </s>

<s> The President: This weekend, I'm traveling to Toronto to meet the members of  </s>
<s> the G20.  </s>
<s> There, I hope we can build on the progress we made at last  </s>
<s> year's G20 summits by coordinating our global  </s>
<s> financial reform efforts to make sure a crisis like the one from  </s>
<s> which we are still recovering never happens again.  </s>
<s> We've made great progress towards passing such a reform  </s>
<s> here at home.  </s>
<s> As I speak, we are on the cusp of enacting the toughest  </s>
<s> financial reforms since the Great Depression.  </s>
<s> I don't have to tell you why these reforms are so important.  </s>
<s> We're still digging ourselves out of an economic crisis that  </s>
<s> happened largely because there wasn't strong enough oversight  </s>
<s> on Wall Street.  </s>
<s> We can't build a strong economy in America over the long-run  </s>
<s> without ending this status quo, and laying a new foundation for  </s>
<s> growth and prosperity.  </s>
<s> That's what the Wall Street reforms currently making their  </s>
<s> way through Congress will help us do --  </s>
<s> reforms that represent 90% of what I proposed when I took up this fight.  </s>
<s> We'll put in place the strongest consumer financial protections  </s>
<s> in American history, and create an independent agency with an  </s>
<s> independent director and an independent budget to enforce them.  </s>
<s> Credit card companies will no longer be able to mislead you  </s>
<s> with pages and pages of fine print.  </s>
<s> You will no longer be subject to all kinds of hidden fees and  </s>
<s> penalties, or the predatory practices of unscrupulous lenders.  </s>
<s> Instead, we'll make sure credit card companies and mortgage  </s>
<s> companies play by the rules.  </s>
<s> And you'll be empowered with easy-to-understand forms,  </s>
<s> and the clear and concise information you need to make the  </s>
<s> financial decisions that are best for you and your family.  </s>
<s> Wall Street reform will also strengthen our economy in a  </s>
<s> number of other ways.  </s>
<s> We'll make our financial system more transparent by bringing the  </s>
<s> kinds of complex trades that helped trigger this crisis --  </s>
<s> trades in a $600 trillion derivatives market --  </s>
<s> finally into the light of day.  </s>
<s> We'll enact what's called the Volcker Rule to make sure banks  </s>
<s> protected by safety nets like the FDIC can't engage in risky  </s>
<s> trades for their own profit.  </s>
<s> We'll create what's called a resolution authority to help  </s>
<s> wind down firms whose collapse would threaten our entire  </s>
<s> financial system.  </s>
<s> Put simply, we'll end the days of taxpayer-funded bailouts,  </s>
<s> and help make sure Main Street is never again held responsible  </s>
<s> for Wall Street's mistakes.  </s>
<s> Beyond these reforms, we also need to address another piece of  </s>
<s> unfinished business.  </s>
<s> We need to impose a fee on the banks that were the biggest  </s>
<s> beneficiaries of taxpayer assistance at the height of our  </s>
<s> financial crisis -- so we can recover every dime of taxpayer money.  </s>
<s> Getting this far on Wall Street reform hasn't been easy.  </s>
<s> There are those who've fought it tooth and nail to preserve the  </s>
<s> status quo.  </s>
<s> In recent months, they've spent millions of dollars and hired an  </s>
<s> army of lobbyists to stop reform dead in its tracks.  </s>
<s> But because we refused to back down, and kept fighting,  </s>
<s> we now stand on the verge of victory.  </s>
<s> And I urge Congress to take us over the finish line,  </s>
<s> and send me a reform bill I can sign into law,  </s>
<s> so we can empower our people with consumer protections,  </s>
<s> and help prevent a financial crisis like this from ever  </s>
<s> happening again.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi everybody, this week,  </s>
<s> we remained focused on our fight against Ebola.  </s>
<s> In Dallas, dozens of family, friends and others who had  </s>
<s> been in close contact with the first patient, Mr. Duncan,  </s>
<s> were declared free of Ebola-a reminder that  </s>
<s> this disease is actually very hard to catch.  </s>
<s> Across Dallas, others being monitored-including health care  </s>
<s> workers who were most at risk-were also  </s>
<s> declared Ebola-free.  </s>
<s> Two Americans-patients in Georgia and Nebraska who  </s>
<s> contracted the disease in West Africa-recovered and were  </s>
<s> released from the hospital.  </s>
<s> The first of the two Dallas nurses who were diagnosed-Nina  </s>
<s> Pham-was declared Ebola free, and yesterday I was proud to  </s>
<s> welcome her to the Oval Office and give her a big hug.  </s>
<s> The other nurse-Amber Vinson-continues  </s>
<s> to improve as well.  </s>
<s> And in Africa, the countries of Senegal and Nigeria  </s>
<s> were declared free of Ebola-a reminder that  </s>
<s> this disease can be contained and defeated.  </s>
<s> In New York City, medical personnel moved quickly  </s>
<s> to isolate and care for the patient there-a doctor  </s>
<s> who recently returned from West Africa.  </s>
<s> The city and state of New York have strong public health  </s>
<s> systems, and they've been preparing for this possibility.  </s>
<s> Because of the steps we've taken in recent weeks,  </s>
<s> our CDC experts were already at the hospital,  </s>
<s> helping staff prepare for this kind of situation.  </s>
<s> Before the patient was even diagnosed,  </s>
<s> we deployed one of our new CDC rapid response teams.  </s>
<s> And I've assured Governor Cuomo and Mayor de Blasio that they'll  </s>
<s> have all the federal support they need as they go forward.  </s>
<s> More broadly, this week we continued to step up our efforts  </s>
<s> across the country.  </s>
<s> New CDC guidelines and outreach is helping hospitals improve  </s>
<s> training and protect their health care workers.  </s>
<s> The Defense Department's new team of doctors,  </s>
<s> nurses and trainers will respond quickly if called upon to help.  </s>
<s> New travel measures are now directing all travelers from  </s>
<s> the three affected countries in West Africa into five  </s>
<s> U.S. airports where we're conducting additional screening.  </s>
<s> Starting this week, these travelers will be required  </s>
<s> to report their temperatures and any symptoms on a daily  </s>
<s> basis-for 21 days until we're confident they don't have Ebola.  </s>
<s> Here at the White House, my new Ebola response coordinator  </s>
<s> is working to ensure a seamless response across  </s>
<s> the federal government.  </s>
<s> And we have been examining the protocols for protecting our  </s>
<s> brave health care workers, and, guided by the science,  </s>
<s> we'll continue to work with state and local officials  </s>
<s> to take the necessary steps to ensure the safety and health  </s>
<s> of the American people.  </s>
<s> In closing, I want to leave you with some basic facts.  </s>
<s> First, you cannot get Ebola easily.  </s>
<s> You can't get it through casual contact with someone.  </s>
<s> Remember, down in Dallas, even Mr. Duncan's family-who lived  </s>
<s> with him and helped care for him-even they did not get Ebola.  </s>
<s> The only way you can get this disease is by coming into direct  </s>
<s> contact with the bodily fluids of someone with symptoms.  </s>
<s> That's the science.  </s>
<s> Those are the facts.  </s>
<s> Sadly, Mr. Duncan did not survive,  </s>
<s> and we continue to keep his family in our prayers.  </s>
<s> At the same time, it's important to remember that of the seven  </s>
<s> Americans treated so far for Ebola-the five who contracted  </s>
<s> it in West Africa, plus the two nurses from Dallas-all  </s>
<s> seven have survived.  </s>
<s> Let me say that again-seven Americans treated;  </s>
<s> all seven survived.  </s>
<s> I've had two of them in the Oval Office.  </s>
<s> And now we're focused on making sure the patient  </s>
<s> in New York receives the best care as well.  </s>
<s> Here's the bottom line.  </s>
<s> Patients can beat this disease.  </s>
<s> And we can beat this disease.  </s>
<s> But we have to stay vigilant.  </s>
<s> We have to work together at every level-federal,  </s>
<s> state and local.  </s>
<s> And we have to keep leading the global response,  </s>
<s> because the best way to stop this disease,  </s>
<s> the best way to keep Americans safe,  </s>
<s> is to stop it at its source-in West Africa.  </s>
<s> And we have to be guided by the science-we have to be guided  </s>
<s> by the facts, not fear.  </s>

<s> jobs and retain our edge as the world's engine of discovery and innovation.  </s>

<s> Because that's how we'll lead the world in this growing industry.  </s>

<s> The President: Hello, everybody.  </s>
<s> I'm speaking to you today from a UPS customer center in Landover,  </s>
<s> Maryland, where I came to talk about an issue that's affecting  </s>
<s> families and businesses just like this one --  </s>
<s> the rising price of gas, and what we can do as a country to  </s>
<s> reduce our dependence on foreign oil.  </s>
<s> This week, I released a Blueprint for a Secure Energy Future.  </s>
<s> It's a strategy to reduce the oil we import from around the  </s>
<s> world, and to make our economy stronger at home.  </s>
<s> Part of this strategy involves increasing our oil exploration  </s>
<s> right here in America.  </s>
<s> In fact, our oil production last year reached its highest level  </s>
<s> since 2003, and we want to encourage more safe,  </s>
<s> responsible drilling where we can.  </s>
<s> But the truth is, drilling alone is not a real strategy to  </s>
<s> replace our dependence on foreign oil.  </s>
<s> And that's because even though America uses 25% of the world's  </s>
<s> oil, we currently have only about 2% of the world's oil reserves.  </s>
<s> Even if we used every last drop of all the oil we have,  </s>
<s> it wouldn't be enough to meet our long-term energy needs.  </s>
<s> So, real energy security can only come if we find ways to use  </s>
<s> less oil -- if we invest in cleaner fuels and greater efficiency.  </s>
<s> That's what we've been doing since I took office.  </s>
<s> For example, we secured an agreement from all the major  </s>
<s> auto companies to raise the fuel efficiency standards of their  </s>
<s> cars and trucks.  </s>
<s> So if you buy a new car, the better gas mileage is going to  </s>
<s> save you about $3,000.  </s>
<s> Altogether, this will save us about 1.8 billion barrels of oil  </s>
<s> as a country.  </s>
<s> So we need to build on that progress.  </s>
<s> As we make our cars and trucks more efficient,  </s>
<s> we've got to harness new technologies to fuel our  </s>
<s> vehicles with everything from biofuels to natural gas to  </s>
<s> advanced batteries.  </s>
<s> And the good news is, these technologies aren't science  </s>
<s> fiction anymore.  </s>
<s> They exist today.  </s>
<s> Already, American car companies are producing electric vehicles  </s>
<s> that use little or no gas.  </s>
<s> And innovators across America are testing new products that  </s>
<s> hold incredible promise not just for new vehicles,  </s>
<s> but for countless new jobs.  </s>
<s> To help jumpstart this market, the federal government has  </s>
<s> doubled the number of clean energy vehicles that we have in our fleet.  </s>
<s> In the next few years, we're going to switch the entire fleet over.  </s>
<s> And I'm here at UPS because it's not just the government getting  </s>
<s> in on the action.  </s>
<s> Companies like UPS, FedEx, AT&amp;T, Verizon, and PepsiCo --  </s>
<s> firms with some of the largest fleets in the country --  </s>
<s> are switching to more efficient vehicles.  </s>
<s> And through our Clean Fleets Partnership,  </s>
<s> driven not by government, but by business,  </s>
<s> more companies are going to be switching to electric and  </s>
<s> alternative vehicles, too -- not out of the goodness of their  </s>
<s> hearts, but because it's good for their bottom lines.  </s>
<s> The goal is simple.  </s>
<s> When I was elected to this office,  </s>
<s> America imported 11 million barrels of oil a day.  </s>
<s> Through these and other steps, by a little more than a decade  </s>
<s> from now, we will have cut that by one third.  </s>
<s> And by doing so, we're going to make our economy less vulnerable  </s>
<s> to wild swings in oil prices.  </s>
<s> We're going to use cleaner sources of energy that don't  </s>
<s> imperil our climate.  </s>
<s> And we're going to spark new products and businesses all over  </s>
<s> the country by tapping America's greatest renewable resource: our ingenuity.  </s>
<s> We know how important this is.  </s>
<s> This week, we learned that the economy added 230,000 private  </s>
<s> sector jobs last month.  </s>

<s> 13 months.  </s>

<s> from school fully prepared for college and a career.  </s>

<s> The President: Last week, I spoke to you about my commitment to work with  </s>
<s> Congress to pass health care reform this year.  </s>
<s> Today, I'd like to speak about how that effort is essential to  </s>
<s> restoring fiscal responsibility.  </s>
<s> When it comes to the cost of health care,  </s>
<s> this much is clear: the status quo is unsustainable for  </s>
<s> families, businesses, and government.  </s>
<s> America spends nearly 50 percent more per person on health care  </s>
<s> than any other country.  </s>
<s> Health care premiums have doubled over the last decade,  </s>
<s> deductibles and out-of-pocket costs have skyrocketed,  </s>
<s> and many with preexisting conditions are denied coverage.  </s>
<s> More and more, Americans are being priced out of the  </s>
<s> care they need.  </s>
<s> These costs are also hurting business,  </s>
<s> as some big businesses are at a competitive disadvantage with  </s>
<s> their foreign counterparts, and some small businesses are forced  </s>
<s> to cut benefits, drop coverage, or even lay off workers.  </s>
<s> Meanwhile, Medicare and Medicaid pose one of the greatest threats  </s>
<s> to our federal deficit, and could leave our children with a  </s>
<s> mountain of debt that they cannot pay.  </s>
<s> We cannot continue down this path.  </s>
<s> I don't accept a future where Americans forego health care  </s>
<s> because they can't pay for it, and more and more families go  </s>
<s> without coverage at all.  </s>
<s> And I don't accept a future where American business is hurt  </s>
<s> and our government goes broke.  </s>
<s> We have a responsibility to act, and to act now.  </s>
<s> That's why I'm working with Congress to pass reform that  </s>
<s> lowers costs, improves quality and coverage,  </s>
<s> and protects consumer health care choices.  </s>
<s> I know some question whether we can afford to act this year.  </s>
<s> But the unmistakable truth is that it would be irresponsible  </s>
<s> to not act.  </s>
<s> We can't keep shifting a growing burden to future generations.  </s>
<s> With each passing year, health care costs consume a larger  </s>
<s> share of our nation's spending, and contribute to yawning  </s>
<s> deficits that we can't control.  </s>
<s> So let me be clear: health care reform is not part of the  </s>
<s> problem when it comes to our fiscal future,  </s>
<s> it's a fundamental part of the solution.  </s>
<s> Real reform will mean reductions in our long term budget.  </s>
<s> And I've made a firm commitment that health care reform will not  </s>
<s> add to the federal deficit over the next decade.  </s>
<s> To keep that commitment, my Administration has already  </s>
<s> identified how to pay for the historic $635 billion down  </s>
<s> payment on reform detailed in our budget.  </s>
<s> This includes over $300 billion that we will save through  </s>
<s> changes like reducing Medicare overpayments to private  </s>
<s> insurers, and rooting out waste in Medicare and Medicaid.  </s>
<s> However, any honest accounting must prepare for the fact that  </s>
<s> health care reform will require additional costs in the short  </s>
<s> term in order to reduce spending in the long-term.  </s>
<s> So today, I'm announcing an additional $313 billion in  </s>
<s> savings that will rein in unnecessary spending,  </s>
<s> and increase efficiency and the quality of care --  </s>
<s> savings that will ensure that we have nearly $950 billion set  </s>
<s> aside to offset the costs of health care reform over the next ten years.  </s>
<s> These savings will come from commonsense changes.  </s>
<s> For example -- if more Americans are insured,  </s>
<s> we can cut payments that help hospitals treat patients without  </s>
<s> health insurance.  </s>
<s> If the drug makers pay their fair share,  </s>
<s> we can cut government spending on prescription drugs.  </s>
<s> And if doctors have incentives to provide the best care instead  </s>
<s> of more care, we can help Americans avoid the unnecessary  </s>
<s> hospital stays, treatments, and tests that drive up costs.  </s>
<s> For more details about these and other savings,  </s>
<s> you can visit our website: www.whitehouse.gov  </s>
<s> These savings underscore the fact that securing quality,  </s>
<s> affordable health care for the American people is tied directly  </s>
<s> to insisting upon fiscal responsibility.  </s>
<s> And these savings are rooted in the same principle that must  </s>
<s> guide our broader approach to reform: we will fix what's  </s>
<s> broken, while building upon what works.  </s>
<s> If you like your plan and your doctor,  </s>
<s> you can keep them -- the only changes that you'll see are  </s>
<s> lower costs and better health care.  </s>
<s> For too long, we've stood by while our health care system has  </s>
<s> frayed at the seams.  </s>
<s> While there has been excuse after excuse to delay reform,  </s>
<s> the price of care has gone up for individuals, for business,  </s>
<s> and for the government.  </s>
<s> This time must be different.  </s>
<s> This is the moment when we must reform health care so that we  </s>
<s> can build a new foundation for our economy to grow;  </s>
<s> for our people to thrive; and for our country to pursue a  </s>
<s> responsible and sustainable path.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> The President: I recently heard from a small business owner from New Jersey  </s>
<s> who wrote that he employs eight people and provides health  </s>
<s> insurance for all of them.  </s>
<s> But his policy goes up at least 20% each year, and today,  </s>
<s> it costs almost $1,400 per family per month --  </s>
<s> his highest business expense beside employees' salaries.  </s>
<s> He's already had to let two of them go,  </s>
<s> and he may be forced to eliminate health insurance altogether.  </s>
<s> He wrote, simply: "I'm not looking for free health care,  </s>
<s> I would just like to get my premiums reduced enough to be  </s>
<s> able to afford it."  </s>
<s> Day after day, I hear from people just like him.  </s>
<s> Workers worried they may lose their coverage if they become  </s>
<s> too sick, or lose their job, or change jobs.  </s>
<s> Families who fear they may not be able to get insurance,  </s>
<s> or change insurance, if someone in their family has a  </s>
<s> pre-existing condition.  </s>
<s> And small business owners trying to make a living and do right by  </s>
<s> the people they employ.  </s>
<s> These are the mom and pop stores and restaurants,  </s>
<s> beauty shops and construction companies that support families  </s>
<s> and sustain communities.  </s>
<s> They're the tiny startups with big ideas,  </s>
<s> hoping to become the next Google or Apple or HP.  </s>
<s> And, as shown in a new report released today by the White  </s>
<s> House Council of Economic Advisers,  </s>
<s> right now they are getting crushed by skyrocketing health care costs.  </s>
<s> Because they lack the bargaining power that large businesses have  </s>
<s> and face higher administrative costs per person,  </s>
<s> small businesses pay up to 18% more for the very same health  </s>
<s> insurance plans -- costs that eat into their profits and get  </s>
<s> passed on to their employees.  </s>
<s> As a result, small businesses are much less likely to offer  </s>
<s> health insurance.  </s>
<s> Those that do tend to have less generous plans.  </s>
<s> In a recent survey, one third of small businesses reported  </s>
<s> cutting benefits.  </s>
<s> Many have dropped coverage altogether.  </s>
<s> And many have shed jobs, or shut their doors entirely.  </s>
<s> This is unsustainable, it's unacceptable,  </s>
<s> and it's going to change when I sign health insurance reform  </s>
<s> into law.  </s>
<s> Under the reform plans in Congress,  </s>
<s> small businesses will be able to purchase health insurance  </s>
<s> through an "insurance exchange," a marketplace where they can  </s>
<s> compare the price, quality and services of a wide variety of  </s>
<s> plans, many of which will provide better coverage at lower  </s>
<s> costs than the plans they have now.  </s>
<s> They can then pick the one that works best for them and their employees.  </s>
<s> Small businesses that choose to insure their employees will also  </s>
<s> receive a tax credit to help them pay for it.  </s>
<s> If a small business chooses not to provide coverage,  </s>
<s> its employees can purchase high quality,  </s>
<s> affordable coverage through the insurance exchange on their own.  </s>
<s> Low-income workers -- folks who are more likely to be working at  </s>
<s> small businesses -- will qualify for a subsidy to help them cover the costs.  </s>
<s> And no matter how you get your insurance,  </s>
<s> insurance companies will no longer be allowed to deny you  </s>
<s> coverage because of a pre-existing condition.  </s>
<s> They won't be able to drop your coverage if you get too sick or  </s>
<s> lose your job or change jobs.  </s>
<s> And we'll limit the amount your insurance company can force you  </s>
<s> to pay out of your own pocket.  </s>
<s> To view the new report and learn more about how health insurance  </s>
<s> reform will help small businesses,  </s>
<s> go to whitehouse.gov, and send us your questions and comments  </s>
<s> -- we'll answer as many of them as we can later this week.  </s>
<s> Over the past few months, I've been pushing hard to make sure  </s>
<s> we finally address the need for health insurance reform,  </s>
<s> which has been deferred year after year, decade after decade.  </s>
<s> And today, after a lot of hard work in Congress,  </s>
<s> we are closer than ever before to finally passing reform that  </s>
<s> will reduce costs, expand coverage,  </s>
<s> and provide more choices for our families and businesses.  </s>
<s> It's taken months to reach this point,  </s>
<s> and once this legislation passes,  </s>
<s> we'll need to move thoughtfully and deliberately to implement  </s>
<s> these reforms over a period of several years.  </s>
<s> That's why I feel such a sense of urgency about moving this  </s>
<s> process forward.  </s>
<s> Now I know there are those who are urging us to delay reform.  </s>
<s> And some of them have actually admitted that this is a tactic  </s>
<s> designed to stop any reform at all.  </s>
<s> Some have even suggested that, regardless of its merits,  </s>
<s> health care reform should be stopped as a way to inflict  </s>
<s> political damage on my Administration.  </s>
<s> I'll leave it to them to explain that to the American people.  </s>
<s> What I'm concerned about is the damage that's being done right  </s>
<s> now to the health of our families,  </s>
<s> the success of our businesses, and the long-term fiscal  </s>
<s> stability of our government.  </s>
<s> I'm concerned about hard working folks who want nothing more than  </s>
<s> the security that comes with knowing they can get the care  </s>
<s> they need, when they need it.  </s>
<s> I'm concerned about the small business owners who are asking  </s>
<s> for nothing more than a chance to seize their piece of the  </s>
<s> American Dream.  </s>
<s> I'm concerned about our children and our grandchildren who will  </s>
<s> be saddled with deficits that will continue piling up year  </s>
<s> after year unless we pass reform.  </s>
<s> This debate is not a political game for these Americans,  </s>
<s> and they cannot afford to keep waiting for reform.  </s>
<s> We owe it to them to finally get it done --  </s>
<s> and to get it done this year.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>

<s> The President: Last weekend, on the Fourth of July,  </s>

<s> and women and their families to the White House.  </s>
<s> They were just like the thousands of active duty  </s>
<s> personnel and veterans that I've met across this country and  </s>
<s> around the globe.  </s>
<s> Proud.  </s>
<s> Strong.  </s>
<s> Determined.  </s>
<s> Men and women with the courage to answer their country's call,  </s>
<s> and the character to serve the United States of America.  </s>
<s> Because of that service; because of the honor and heroism of our  </s>
<s> troops around the world; our people are safer,  </s>
<s> our nation is more secure, and we are poised to end our combat  </s>
<s> mission in Iraq by the end of August,  </s>
<s> completing a drawdown of more than 90,000 troops since last January.  </s>
<s> Still, we are a nation at war.  </s>
<s> For the better part of a decade, our men and women in uniform  </s>
<s> have endured tour after tour in distant and dangerous places.  </s>
<s> Many have risked their lives.  </s>
<s> Many have given their lives.  </s>
<s> And as a grateful nation, humbled by their service,  </s>
<s> we can never honor these American heroes or their  </s>
<s> families enough.  </s>
<s> Just as we have a solemn responsibility to train and  </s>
<s> equip our troops before we send them into harm's way,  </s>
<s> we have a solemn responsibility to provide our veterans and  </s>
<s> wounded warriors with the care and benefits they've earned when  </s>
<s> they come home.  </s>
<s> That's our sacred trust with all who serve --  </s>
<s> and it doesn't end when their tour of duty does.  </s>
<s> To keep that trust, we're building a 21st century VA,  </s>
<s> increasing its budget, and ensuring the steady stream of  </s>
<s> funding it needs to support medical care for our veterans.  </s>
<s> To help our veterans and their families pursue a college  </s>
<s> education, we're funding and implementing the post-9/11 GI Bill.  </s>
<s> To deliver better care in more places,  </s>
<s> we're expanding and increasing VA health care,  </s>
<s> building new wounded warrior facilities,  </s>
<s> and adapting care to better meet the needs of female veterans.  </s>
<s> To stand with those who sacrifice,  </s>
<s> we've dedicated new support for wounded warriors and the  </s>
<s> caregivers who put their lives on hold for a loved one's long recovery.  </s>
<s> And to do right by our vets, we're working to prevent and end  </s>
<s> veteran homelessness -- because in the United States of America,  </s>
<s> no one who served in our uniform should sleep on our streets.  </s>
<s> We also know that for many of today's troops and their  </s>
<s> families, the war doesn't end when they come home.  </s>
<s> Too many suffer from the signature injuries of today's  </s>
<s> wars: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder and Traumatic Brain Injury.  </s>
<s> And too few receive the screening and the treatment that they need.  </s>
<s> Now, in past wars, this wasn't something America always talked about.  </s>
<s> And as a result, our troops and their families often felt  </s>
<s> stigmatized or embarrassed when it came to seeking help.  </s>
<s> Today, we've made it clear up and down the chain of command  </s>
<s> that folks should seek help if they need it.  </s>
<s> In fact, we've expanded mental health counseling and services  </s>
<s> for our vets.  </s>
<s> But for years, many veterans with PTSD who have tried to seek  </s>
<s> benefits -- veterans of today's wars and earlier wars --  </s>
<s> have often found themselves stymied.  </s>
<s> They've been required to produce evidence proving that a specific  </s>
<s> event caused their PTSD.  </s>
<s> And that practice has kept the vast majority of those with PTSD  </s>
<s> who served in non-combat roles, but who still waged war,  </s>
<s> from getting the care they need.  </s>
<s> Well, I don't think our troops on the battlefield should have  </s>
<s> to keep notes just in case they need to apply for a claim.  </s>
<s> And I've met enough veterans to know that you don't have to  </s>
<s> engage in a firefight to endure the trauma of war.  </s>
<s> So we're changing the way things are done.  </s>
<s> On Monday, the Department of Veterans Affairs,  </s>
<s> led by Secretary Ric Shinseki, will begin making it easier for  </s>
<s> a veteran with PTSD to get the benefits he or she needs.  </s>
<s> This is a long-overdue step that will help veterans not just of  </s>
<s> the Afghan and Iraq Wars, but generations of their brave  </s>
<s> predecessors who proudly served and sacrificed in all our wars.  </s>
<s> It's a step that proves that America will always be there for  </s>
<s> our veterans, just as they've always been there for us.  </s>
<s> We won't let them down.  </s>
<s> We take care of our own.  </s>
<s> And as long as I'm Commander-in-Chief,  </s>
<s> that's what we're going to keep doing.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>

<s> The President: Hello everyone.  </s>
<s> Veterans' Day Weekend is a chance for all of us to say  </s>
<s> two simple words: "Thank you."  </s>
<s> Thank you to that greatest generation  </s>
<s> who fought island by island across the Pacific,  </s>
<s> and freed millions from fascism in Europe.  </s>
<s> Thank you to the heroes who risked everything  </s>
<s> through the bitter cold of Korea  </s>
<s> and the stifling heat of Vietnam.  </s>
<s> And thank you to all the heroes who have served since,  </s>
<s> most recently our 9/11 Generation of veterans  </s>
<s> from Iraq and Afghanistan.  </s>
<s> Now that more of them are coming home,  </s>
<s> we need to serve them as well as they served us.  </s>
<s> That requires more than a simple "thank you" -  </s>
<s> especially from those of us who've been elected to serve.  </s>
<s> I've often said that my top priority is growing the economy,  </s>
<s> creating new jobs, and restoring middle-class security.  </s>
<s> And a very important part of that is making sure  </s>
<s> that every veteran has every chance  </s>
<s> to share in the opportunity he or she has helped defend.  </s>
<s> In addition to the care and benefits they've earned -  </s>
<s> including good mental health care to stay strong -  </s>
<s> that means a good job, a good education,  </s>
<s> and a home to call their own.  </s>
<s> If you fight for your country overseas,  </s>
<s> you should never have to fight for a job when you come home.  </s>
<s> I've made sure the federal government leads by example,  </s>
<s> and since I took office,  </s>
<s> we've hired about 300,000 veterans  </s>
<s> to keep serving their country.  </s>
<s> Our new transition assistance program is helping veterans  </s>
<s> and their spouses find that new job and plan their career.  </s>

<s> to do the right thing and pass the Veterans Jobs Corps.  </s>

<s> Our troops gain unmatched skills while serving in harm's way.  </s>

<s> more businesses with highly-skilled veterans.  </s>

<s> More tools to connect veterans to job openings.  </s>

<s> and wounded warriors -  </s>

<s> And America's businesses have worked  </s>

<s> They've already hired or trained 290,000 veterans  </s>
<s> and military spouses,  </s>
<s> and they've committed to hiring over 400,000 more.  </s>
<s> We're also committed to giving today's veterans and their  </s>
<s> families the same shot at a great education this country  </s>
<s> gave my grandfather when he came home from World War II.  </s>
<s> We're helping more of them earn their degrees  </s>
<s> under the Post-9/11 GI Bill.  </s>
<s> We've worked with thousands of schools across the country  </s>
<s> to set new standards to protect against dishonest recruiting  </s>
<s> and predatory lending practices that target our veterans.  </s>
<s> And we're helping hundreds of community colleges  </s>
<s> and universities do more to welcome and encourage  </s>
<s> our veterans on campus.  </s>
<s> Thanks to these efforts,  </s>
<s> and the efforts of the private sector,  </s>
<s> we've made progress getting our vets back to work.  </s>
<s> But we've got a lot more work to do.  </s>
<s> And as more than a million of our troops  </s>
<s> return to civilian life,  </s>
<s> we're going to have to work even harder.  </s>
<s> Because the skill, dedication, and courage  </s>
<s> of our troops is unmatched -  </s>
<s> and when they come home,  </s>
<s> we all benefit from their efforts to build  </s>
<s> a stronger America and a brighter future for our kids.  </s>
<s> So to all our veterans, on behalf our entire nation,  </s>
<s> thank you for everything you've done  </s>
<s> and will continue to do for our country.  </s>
<s> As your Commander-in-Chief, I'm proud of your service,  </s>
<s> and grateful for your sacrifice.  </s>
<s> And as long as I'm your President,  </s>
<s> I will make it my mission to make sure  </s>
<s> that America has your back,  </s>
<s> not just on one day or one weekend,  </s>
<s> but 365 days a year.  </s>

<s> The President: 75 years ago today, in the midst of the Great Depression,  </s>
<s> Franklin Roosevelt signed Social Security into law,  </s>
<s> laying a cornerstone in the foundation of America's middle  </s>
<s> class, and assuring generations of America's seniors that after  </s>
<s> a lifetime of hard work, they'd have a chance to retire with dignity.  </s>
<s> We have an obligation to keep that promise;  </s>
<s> to safeguard Social Security for our seniors,  </s>
<s> people with disabilities, and for all Americans --  </s>
<s> today, tomorrow, and forever.  </s>
<s> Now, we've been talking for a long time about how to do that;  </s>
<s> about how to make sure Social Security is healthy enough to  </s>
<s> cover the higher costs that are kicking in now that baby boomers  </s>
<s> are retiring.  </s>
<s> And I'm committed to working with anyone,  </s>
<s> Democrat or Republican, who wants to strengthen Social Security.  </s>
<s> I'm also encouraged by the reports of serious bipartisan  </s>
<s> work being done on this and other issues in the fiscal  </s>
<s> commission that I set up several months ago.  </s>
<s> One thing we can't afford to do though is privatize Social  </s>
<s> Security -- an ill-conceived idea that would add trillions of  </s>
<s> dollars to our budget deficit while tying your benefits to the  </s>
<s> whims of Wall Street traders and the ups and downs of the stock market.  </s>
<s> A few years ago, we had a debate about privatizing Social Security.  </s>
<s> And I'd have thought that debate would've been put to rest once  </s>
<s> and for all by the financial crisis we've just experienced.  </s>
<s> I'd have thought, after being reminded how quickly the stock  </s>
<s> market can tumble, after seeing the wealth people worked a  </s>
<s> lifetime to earn wiped out in a matter of days,  </s>
<s> that no one would want to place bets with Social Security on  </s>
<s> Wall Street; that everyone would understand why we need to be  </s>
<s> prudent about investing the retirement money of tens of  </s>
<s> millions of Americans.  </s>
<s> But some Republican leaders in Congress don't seem to have  </s>
<s> learned any lessons from the past few years.  </s>
<s> They're pushing to make privatizing Social Security a  </s>
<s> key part of their legislative agenda if they win a majority in  </s>
<s> Congress this fall.  </s>
<s> It's right up there on their to-do list with repealing some  </s>
<s> of the Medicare benefits and reforms that are adding at least  </s>
<s> a dozen years to the fiscal health of Medicare --  </s>
<s> the single longest extension in history.  </s>
<s> That agenda is wrong for seniors, it's wrong for America,  </s>
<s> and I won't let it happen.  </s>
<s> Not while I'm President.  </s>
<s> I'll fight with everything I've got to stop those who would  </s>
<s> gamble your Social Security on Wall Street.  </s>
<s> Because you shouldn't be worried that a sudden downturn in the  </s>
<s> stock market will put all you've worked so hard for --  </s>
<s> all you've earned -- at risk.  </s>
<s> You should have the peace of mind of knowing that after  </s>
<s> meeting your responsibilities and paying into the system all  </s>

<s> The President: Hello, everybody.  </s>
<s> Today marks an historic anniversary-70 years since  </s>
<s> the Allied victory in Europe during World War II.  </s>
<s> On V-E Day after the Nazi surrender,  </s>
<s> people swarmed the streets of London and Paris and  </s>
<s> Moscow, and the cloud of fear that had hung for so  </s>
<s> many years finally lifted.  </s>
<s> Here at home, from small towns to Times Square,  </s>
<s> crowds gathered in celebration,  </s>
<s> singing and dancing with joy.  </s>
<s> There would still be three more months of deadly  </s>
<s> fighting in the Pacific.  </s>
<s> But for a few hours, the world rejoiced in the hope  </s>
<s> of peace.  </s>
<s> General Eisenhower announced the news with little  </s>
<s> fanfare.  </s>
<s> "The Mission of this Allied Force," he said,  </s>
<s> "was fulfilled."  </s>
<s> But his simple message belied the extraordinary  </s>
<s> nature of the Allied victory-and the staggering  </s>
<s> human loss.  </s>
<s> For over five years, brutal fighting laid waste to an  </s>
<s> entire continent.  </s>
<s> Mothers, fathers, children were murdered in  </s>
<s> concentration camps.  </s>
<s> By the time the guns fell silent in Europe,  </s>
<s> some 40 million people on the continent had  </s>
<s> lost their lives.  </s>
<s> Today, we pay tribute to all who served.  </s>
<s> They were patriots, like my grandfather who served in  </s>
<s> Patton's Army-soldiers, sailors, airmen, marines,  </s>
<s> coast guard, merchant marines-and the women of the  </s>
<s> WACs and the WAVES and every branch.  </s>
<s> They risked their lives, and gave their lives so that we,  </s>
<s> the people the world over, could live free.  </s>
<s> They were women who stepped up in unprecedented numbers,  </s>
<s> manning the home front, and-like my  </s>
<s> grandmother-building bombers on assembly lines.  </s>
<s> This was the generation that literally saved the  </s>
<s> world-that ended the war and laid a foundation for peace.  </s>
<s> This was the generation that traded in their uniforms for  </s>
<s> a college education so they could marry their  </s>
<s> sweethearts, buy homes, raise children and build the  </s>
<s> strongest middle class the world has ever known.  </s>
<s> This was the generation that included heroes like the  </s>
<s> Tuskegee Airmen, the Navajo Code Talkers and the  </s>
<s> Japanese-Americans of the 442nd Regiment-and who  </s>
<s> continued the fight for freedom here at home,  </s>
<s> expanding equality and opportunity and justice  </s>
<s> for minorities and women.  </s>
<s> We will be forever grateful for what these remarkable  </s>
<s> men and women did, for the selfless grace they showed  </s>
<s> in one of our darkest hours.  </s>
<s> But as we mark this 70th anniversary,  </s>
<s> let's not simply commemorate history.  </s>
<s> Let's rededicate ourselves to the freedoms for which  </s>
<s> they fought.  </s>
<s> Let's make sure that we keep striving to fulfill our  </s>
<s> founding ideals-that we're a country where no matter who  </s>
<s> we are or where we're from or what we look like or who  </s>
<s> we love, if we work hard and take responsibility,  </s>
<s> every American will have the opportunity to make of our  </s>
<s> lives what we will.  </s>
<s> Let's stand united with our allies,  </s>
<s> in Europe and beyond, on behalf of our common  </s>
<s> values-freedom, security, democracy, human rights,  </s>
<s> and the rule of law around the world-and against  </s>
<s> bigotry and hatred in all their forms so that we give  </s>
<s> meaning to that pledge: "Never forget.  </s>
<s> Never again."  </s>
<s> Most of all let's salute once more to that generation  </s>
<s> of Americans whose courage and sacrifice are the reason  </s>
<s> we're here today in peace and freedom.  </s>
<s> Their spirit lives on in our brave men and women in  </s>
<s> uniform and families who continue to defend the very  </s>
<s> freedoms our parents and grandparents fought for.  </s>
<s> As Americans grateful for their service let's truly  </s>
<s> honor them on this day and every day with the gratitude  </s>
<s> they have earned and the respect that they deserve.  </s>
<s> May God bless them and may he continue to bless the  </s>
<s> United States of America.  </s>

<s> The President: On Monday, we celebrate Labor Day.  </s>
<s> It's a chance to get together with families and friends,  </s>
<s> to throw some food on the grill, and have a good time.  </s>
<s> But it's also a day to honor the American worker --  </s>
<s> to reaffirm our commitment to the great American middle class  </s>
<s> that has, for generations, made our economy the envy of the world.  </s>
<s> That's especially important now.  </s>
<s> I don't have to tell you that this is a very tough time for  </s>
<s> our country.  </s>
<s> Millions of our neighbors have been swept up in the worst  </s>
<s> recession in our lifetimes.  </s>
<s> And long before this recession hit,  </s>
<s> the middle class had been taking some hard shots.  </s>
<s> Long before this recession, the values of hard work and  </s>
<s> responsibility that built this country had been given short shrift.  </s>
<s> For a decade, middle class families felt the sting of  </s>
<s> stagnant incomes and declining economic security.  </s>
<s> Companies were rewarded with tax breaks for creating jobs overseas.  </s>
<s> Wall Street firms turned huge profits by taking,  </s>
<s> in some cases, reckless risks and cutting corners.  </s>
<s> All of this came at the expense of working Americans,  </s>
<s> who were fighting harder and harder just to stay afloat --  </s>
<s> often borrowing against inflated home values to pay their bills.  </s>
<s> Ultimately, that house of cards collapsed.  </s>
<s> So this Labor Day, we should recommit ourselves to our  </s>
<s> time-honored values and to this fundamental truth: to heal our  </s>
<s> economy, we need more than a healthy stock market;  </s>
<s> we need bustling main streets and a growing,  </s>
<s> thriving middle class.  </s>
<s> That's why I'll keep working day-by-day to restore  </s>
<s> opportunity, economic security, and that basic American Dream  </s>

<s> We are a nation of immigrants.  </s>
<s> It has always given America a big advantage  </s>
<s> over other nations.  </s>
<s> It keeps our country young, dynamic, and entrepreneurial.  </s>
<s> But today, our immigration system is broken,  </s>
<s> and everybody knows it.  </s>
<s> That's why, nearly two years ago, I came  </s>
<s> to this school and laid out principles  </s>
<s> for immigration reform.  </s>
<s> And five months later, Democrats, Republicans,  </s>
<s> and Independents in the Senate came together  </s>
<s> to pass a commonsense compromise bill.  </s>
<s> That bill would have secured our border,  </s>
<s> while giving undocumented immigrants who already  </s>
<s> live here a pathway to citizenship if they  </s>
<s> paid a fine, started paying their taxes,  </s>
<s> and went to the back of the line.  </s>
<s> Independent experts said it would grow  </s>
<s> our economy, and shrink our deficits.  </s>
<s> Now, had the House of Representatives allowed  </s>
<s> a yes-or-no vote on that kind of bill,  </s>
<s> it would have passed with support from both parties.  </s>
<s> Today it would be the law.  </s>
<s> But for a year and a half, Republican leaders  </s>
<s> in the House have refused to allow that simple vote.  </s>
<s> Now, I still believe that the best way to solve this  </s>
<s> problem is by working together -- both parties --  </s>
<s> to pass that kind of bipartisan law.  </s>
<s> But until that happens, there are actions I have  </s>
<s> the legal authority to take as President --  </s>
<s> the same kinds of actions taken by Democratic  </s>
<s> and Republican Presidents before me --  </s>
<s> that will help make our immigration system  </s>
<s> more fair and more just.  </s>
<s> I took those actions this week.  </s>
<s> We're providing more resources at the border  </s>
<s> to help law enforcement personnel stop  </s>
<s> illegal crossings, and send home those who  </s>
<s> do cross over.  </s>
<s> We'll focus enforcement resources on people who  </s>
<s> are threats to our security -- felons, not families;  </s>
<s> criminals, not children.  </s>
<s> And we'll bring more undocumented immigrants  </s>
<s> out of the shadows so they can play by the rules,  </s>
<s> pay their full share of taxes, pass a criminal background  </s>
<s> check, and get right with the law.  </s>
<s> Nothing about this action will benefit anyone who  </s>
<s> has come to this country recently, or who might try  </s>
<s> and come to America illegally in the future.  </s>
<s> It does not grant citizenship, or the right to stay here  </s>
<s> permanently, or offer the same benefits  </s>
<s> that citizens receive.  </s>
<s> And it's certainly not amnesty,  </s>
<s> no matter how often the critics say it.  </s>
<s> Amnesty is the immigration system we have today --  </s>
<s> millions of people living here without paying  </s>
<s> their taxes, or playing by the rules.  </s>

<s> start fixing that.  </s>

<s> of Congress who question my authority to make  </s>
<s> our immigration system work better.  </s>

<s> The day I sign it into law, the actions I've taken  </s>
<s> to help solve this problem will no longer be necessary.  </s>
<s> In the meantime, we can't allow a disagreement over  </s>

<s> the next-generation planes that are lighter, faster,  </s>
<s> and more fuel-efficient.  </s>
<s> That last part is important.  </s>

<s> or filling up your gas tank, technology that helps us get  </s>

<s> money and reduce our dependence on foreign oil.  </s>
<s> The recent spike in gas prices has been another painful  </s>
<s> reminder of why we have to invest in this technology.  </s>

<s> plans for two-dollar gas: drill, drill, and drill some more.  </s>

<s> We've quadrupled the number of operating oil rigs,  </s>
<s> and opened up millions of acres for drilling.  </s>
<s> But you and I both know that with only 2% of the world's oil  </s>
<s> reserves, we can't just drill our way to lower gas prices --  </s>
<s> not when we consume 20% of the world's oil.  </s>
<s> We need an all-of-the-above strategy that relies less on  </s>
<s> foreign oil and more on American-made energy --  </s>
<s> solar, wind, natural gas, biofuels, and more.  </s>
<s> That's the strategy we're pursuing.  </s>
<s> It's why I went to a plant in North Carolina earlier this  </s>

<s> And it's why I've been focused on fuel efficient cars since I  </s>
<s> took office.  </s>
<s> Over the last few years, the annual number of miles driven by  </s>
<s> Americans has stayed roughly the same,  </s>
<s> but the total amount of gas we use has been going down.  </s>
<s> In other words, we're getting more bang for our buck.  </s>
<s> If we accelerate that trend, we can help drivers save a  </s>
<s> significant amount of money.  </s>

<s> The President: Over the last couple of weeks, I've been traveling around the  </s>
<s> country and talking with folks about my blueprint for an  </s>
<s> economy built to last.  </s>
<s> It's a blueprint that focuses on restoring the things we've  </s>
<s> always done best.  </s>
<s> Our strengths.  </s>
<s> American manufacturing.  </s>
<s> American energy.  </s>
<s> The skills and education of American workers.  </s>
<s> And most importantly, American values like fairness  </s>
<s> and responsibility.  </s>
<s> We know what happened when we strayed from those values over  </s>
<s> the past decade -- especially when it comes to our  </s>
<s> housing market.  </s>
<s> Lenders sold loans to families who couldn't afford them.  </s>
<s> Banks packaged those mortgages up and traded them for  </s>
<s> phony profits.  </s>
<s> It drove up prices and created an unsustainable bubble that  </s>
<s> burst -- and left millions of families who did everything  </s>
<s> right in a world of hurt.  </s>
<s> It was wrong.  </s>
<s> The housing crisis has been the single biggest drag on our  </s>
<s> recovery from the recession.  </s>
<s> It has kept millions of families in debt and unable to spend,  </s>
<s> and it has left hundreds of thousands of construction  </s>
<s> workers out of a job.  </s>
<s> But there's something even more important at stake.  </s>
<s> I've been saying this is a make-or-break moment for the  </s>
<s> middle class.  </s>
<s> And the housing crisis struck right at the heart of what it  </s>
<s> means to be middle-class in this country: owning a home.  </s>
<s> Raising our kids.  </s>
<s> Building our dreams.  </s>
<s> Right now, there are more than 10 million homeowners in this  </s>
<s> country who, because of a decline in home prices that is  </s>
<s> no fault of their own, owe more on their mortgages than their  </s>
<s> homes are worth.  </s>
<s> It's wrong for anyone to suggest that the only option for  </s>
<s> struggling, responsible homeowners is to sit and wait  </s>
<s> for the housing market to hit bottom.  </s>
<s> I don't accept that.  </s>
<s> None of us should.  </s>
<s> That's why we launched a plan a couple years ago that's helped  </s>
<s> nearly one million responsible homeowners refinance their  </s>
<s> mortgages and save an average of $300 on their  </s>
<s> payments each month.  </s>
<s> I'll be the first to admit it didn't help as many folks  </s>
<s> as we'd hoped.  </s>
<s> But that doesn't mean we shouldn't keep trying.  </s>
<s> That's why I'm sending Congress a plan that will give every  </s>
<s> responsible homeowner the chance to save about $3,000  </s>
<s> a year on their mortgages by refinancing at  </s>
<s> historically low rates.  </s>
<s> No more red tape.  </s>
<s> No more endless forms.  </s>
<s> And a small fee on the largest financial institutions will make  </s>
<s> sure it doesn't add a dime to the deficit.  </s>
<s> I want to be clear: this plan will not help folks who bought a  </s>
<s> house they couldn't afford and then walked away from it.  </s>
<s> It won't help folks who bought multiple houses just to turn  </s>
<s> around and sell them in speculation.  </s>
<s> What this plan will do is help millions of responsible  </s>
<s> homeowners who make their payments every month, but who,  </s>
<s> until now, couldn't refinance because their home values kept  </s>
<s> dropping or they got wrapped up in too much red tape.  </s>
<s> Here's the catch.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> Four years ago this month, a crisis that started out on Wall  </s>
<s> Street almost brought down our entire economy.  </s>
<s> The nation's biggest banks were days away from failing.  </s>
<s> The stock market -- and millions of American retirement accounts  </s>
<s> -- were in free-fall.  </s>
<s> Credit froze.  </s>
<s> Lending stopped.  </s>
<s> And businesses large and small didn't even know if they'd be  </s>
<s> able to make payroll.  </s>
<s> It was a moment the likes of which few Americans had  </s>
<s> seen before.  </s>
<s> Today, we know the biggest cause of that crisis was reckless  </s>
<s> behavior in the housing market.  </s>
<s> Millions of Americans who did the right and responsible thing  </s>
<s> -- who shopped for a home, secured a mortgage they could  </s>
<s> afford, and made their payments on time --  </s>
<s> were badly hurt by the irresponsible actions of others.  </s>
<s> By lenders who sold loans to families who couldn't afford  </s>
<s> them -- and buyers who knew they couldn't afford them.  </s>
<s> By speculators who were looking just to make a quick buck.  </s>
<s> And by banks that packaged and sold those risky mortgages for  </s>
<s> phony profits.  </s>
<s> When the party stopped, and the housing bubble burst,  </s>
<s> it pushed our entire economy into a historic recession --  </s>
<s> and left middle-class families holding the bag.  </s>
<s> Four years later, the housing market is healing.  </s>
<s> Home sales and construction are up.  </s>
<s> Prices are beginning to rise.  </s>
<s> And more than a million families who began this year owing more  </s>
<s> on their mortgages than their homes are worth,  </s>
<s> are now back above water.  </s>
<s> So we're moving in the right direction.  </s>
<s> But we're not there yet.  </s>
<s> There are still millions of Americans who are struggling  </s>
<s> with their mortgages, even at a time of historically low rates.  </s>
<s> Now, I know there are some who think that the only option for  </s>
<s> homeowners is to just stand by and hope that the market has  </s>
<s> hit bottom.  </s>
<s> I don't agree with that.  </s>
<s> That's why my Administration teamed up with state attorneys  </s>
<s> general to investigate the terrible way many homeowners  </s>
<s> were treated, and secured a settlement from the nation's  </s>
<s> biggest banks -- banks that were bailed out with taxpayer dollars  </s>
<s> -- to help families stay in their homes.  </s>
<s> And that's why we announced new steps to help responsible  </s>
<s> homeowners refinance their mortgages.  </s>
<s> Already, hundreds of thousands of Americans who were stuck in  </s>
<s> high-interest rate loans have been able to take advantage of  </s>
<s> lower rates and save thousands of dollars every year.  </s>
<s> That's not only good for those families;  </s>
<s> it's also good for our economy.  </s>
<s> When folks are spending less on mortgage payments,  </s>
<s> they're spending more at local businesses.  </s>
<s> And when those businesses have more customers,  </s>
<s> they start hiring more workers.  </s>
<s> But we can do even more if Congress is willing to  </s>
<s> do their part.  </s>
<s> Back in February, I sent Congress a plan to give every  </s>
<s> responsible homeowner the chance to save about $3,000 a year on  </s>
<s> their mortgages by refinancing at lower rates.  </s>
<s> It's a plan that has the support of independent,  </s>
<s> nonpartisan economists and leaders across the  </s>
<s> housing industry.  </s>
<s> But Republicans in Congress worked to keep it from even  </s>
<s> getting to a vote.  </s>

<s> still waiting on Congress to act.  </s>
<s> This makes no sense.  </s>
<s> Last week, mortgage rates were at historic lows.  </s>
<s> But instead of helping more and more hardworking families take  </s>
<s> advantage of those rates, Congress was away on break.  </s>
<s> Instead of worrying about you, they'd already gone home to  </s>
<s> worry about their campaigns.  </s>
<s> The truth is, it's going to take a while for our housing market  </s>
<s> to fully recover.  </s>

<s> The President: One of the fundamental challenges of our time is  </s>
<s> building an economy where everyone gets a fair shot,  </s>
<s> everybody does their fair share, and everybody plays by  </s>
<s> the same set of rules.  </s>
<s> And as many Americans rush to file their taxes this weekend,  </s>
<s> it's worth pointing out that we've got a tax system that  </s>
<s> doesn't always uphold the principle of everybody  </s>
<s> doing their part.  </s>
<s> This is not just about fairness.  </s>
<s> This is also about growth.  </s>
<s> It's about being able to make the investments we need to  </s>
<s> strengthen our economy and create jobs.  </s>
<s> And it's about whether we as a country are willing to pay for  </s>
<s> those investments.  </s>
<s> In a perfect world, of course, none of us would have to pay  </s>
<s> any taxes.  </s>
<s> We'd have no deficits to pay down.  </s>
<s> And we'd have all the resources we needed to invest in things  </s>
<s> like schools and roads and a strong military and new sources  </s>
<s> of energy -- investments that have always bolstered our  </s>
<s> economy and strengthened the middle class.  </s>
<s> But we live in the real world, with real choices and  </s>
<s> real consequences.  </s>
<s> Right now, we've got significant deficits to close.  </s>
<s> We've got serious investments to make to keep our  </s>
<s> economy growing.  </s>
<s> And we can't afford to keep spending more money on tax cuts  </s>
<s> for the wealthiest Americans who don't need them and didn't even  </s>
<s> ask for them.  </s>
<s> Warren Buffett is one of the world's wealthiest men.  </s>
<s> But he pays a lower tax rate than his secretary.  </s>
<s> That's just the way the system is set up.  </s>
<s> In fact, one in four millionaires pays a lower tax  </s>
<s> rate than millions of hardworking  </s>
<s> middle-class households.  </s>
<s> As Warren points out, that's not fair and it doesn't make sense.  </s>
<s> It's wrong that middle-class Americans pay a higher share of  </s>
<s> their income in taxes than some millionaires and billionaires.  </s>
<s> Now, this week, Members of Congress are going to have a  </s>
<s> chance to set things right.  </s>
<s> They get to vote on what we call the Buffett Rule.  </s>
<s> It's simple: If you make more than $1 million every year,  </s>
<s> you should pay at least the same percentage of your income in  </s>
<s> taxes as middle-class families do.  </s>
<s> On the other hand, if you make less than $250,000 a year --  </s>
<s> like 98% of American families do --  </s>
<s> your taxes shouldn't go up.  </s>
<s> That's all there is to it.  </s>
<s> It's pretty sensible.  </s>
<s> Most Americans support this idea.  </s>
<s> One survey found that two-thirds of millionaires do, too.  </s>
<s> So do nearly half of all Republicans.  </s>
<s> We just need some Republican politicians to get on board with  </s>
<s> where the country is.  </s>
<s> I know they'll say that this is all about wanting to raise  </s>
<s> people's taxes.  </s>
<s> They probably won't tell you that if you belong to a  </s>
<s> middle-class family, then I've cut your taxes each year that  </s>
<s> I've been in office, and I've cut taxes for small business  </s>
<s> owners 17 times.  </s>
<s> But the thing is, for most Americans like me,  </s>
<s> tax rates are near their lowest point in 50 years.  </s>
<s> In 2001 and 2003, the wealthiest Americans received two huge  </s>
<s> new tax cuts.  </s>
<s> We were told these tax cuts would lead to faster job growth.  </s>
<s> Instead, we got the slowest job growth in half a century,  </s>
<s> and the typical American family actually saw its income fall.  </s>
<s> On the flip side, when the most well-off Americans were asked to  </s>
<s> pay a little more in the 1990s, we were warned that it  </s>
<s> would kill jobs.  </s>
<s> Instead, tens of millions of jobs followed.  </s>
<s> So we've tried this trickle-down experiment before.  </s>
<s> It doesn't work.  </s>
<s> And middle class families have seen too much of their security  </s>
<s> eroded over the past few decades for us to tell them they're  </s>
<s> going to have to do more because the wealthiest Americans are  </s>
<s> going to do less.  </s>
<s> We can't stop investing in the things that will help grow our  </s>
<s> economy and create jobs -- things like education, research,  </s>
<s> new sources of energy -- just so folks like me can get  </s>
<s> another tax cut.  </s>
<s> So I hope you'll ask your Member of Congress to step up and echo  </s>
<s> that call this week by voting for the Buffett Rule.  </s>
<s> Remind them that in America, prosperity has never just  </s>
<s> trickled down from a wealthy few.  </s>
<s> Prosperity has always been built by a strong,  </s>
<s> thriving middle class.  </s>
<s> That's a principle worth reaffirming right now.  </s>

<s> to do that.  </s>
<s> One path -- pushed by Republicans in Congress and  </s>
<s> their nominee for President -- says that the best way to create  </s>
<s> prosperity is to let it trickle down from the top.  </s>
<s> They believe that if we spend trillions more on tax cuts for  </s>

<s> even if we have to pay for it by gutting education and training  </s>
<s> and by raising middle-class taxes.  </s>

<s> We already tried it that way for most of the last decade,  </s>
<s> and it didn't work.  </s>
<s> We're still paying for trillions of dollars in tax cuts that  </s>
<s> benefited the wealthiest Americans more than anyone else;  </s>
<s> tax cuts that didn't lead to the rise in wages and middle class  </s>
<s> jobs that we were promised; and that helped take us from record  </s>
<s> surpluses to record deficits.  </s>
<s> The last thing we need right now is more top-down economics.  </s>
<s> What we need are policies that will grow and strengthen the  </s>
<s> middle class; that will help create jobs,  </s>
<s> make education and training more affordable,  </s>
<s> and encourage businesses to start up and stay right here in  </s>
<s> the United States.  </s>
<s> Soon, we'll face a choice between these two  </s>
<s> different approaches.  </s>
<s> On January 1st, taxes are set to go up for tens of millions  </s>
<s> of Americans.  </s>

<s> middle-class families.  </s>
<s> That's why I've cut middle-class taxes every year that I've been  </s>

<s> immediately stop the January 1st tax hike from hitting any  </s>

<s> Under my plan, 98% of American families won't see their income  </s>
<s> taxes go up at all.  </s>
<s> But the other 2% of Americans will have to pay a little more  </s>
<s> on taxes on anything they make over $250,000.  </s>
<s> In other words, the wealthiest few Americans will go back to  </s>
<s> the income tax rates they were paying under Bill Clinton.  </s>
<s> And if you remember, that was when our economy created nearly  </s>
<s> 23 million new jobs, the biggest budget surplus in history,  </s>
<s> and millionaires were doing pretty well to boot.  </s>
