<s> plan warn that it would somehow hurt small businesses and  </s>
<s> job creators.  </s>
<s> Well, they're completely ignoring the facts.  </s>
<s> Under my plan, 97% of small business owners would avoid  </s>
<s> getting hit with any income tax hike whatsoever.  </s>
<s> In fact, I've cut taxes for small businesses eighteen times  </s>
<s> since I've been President.  </s>
<s> And just this week, I ordered a series of new steps to help our  </s>
<s> small businesses grow and hire.  </s>
<s> So the only place Republicans and I disagree is whether we  </s>
<s> keep giving tax cuts to the wealthiest 2% of Americans.  </s>
<s> Republicans in Washington want more of those tax cuts.  </s>

<s> But even if we disagree on the tax cuts for the wealthiest  </s>

<s> That's what compromise is all about.  </s>

<s> Let's skip the unnecessary drama,  </s>

<s> here to serve.  </s>

<s> Today, there are 2.2 million people behind bars in  </s>
<s> America and millions more on parole or probation.  </s>
<s> Every year, we spend $80 billion in taxpayer dollars  </s>
<s> to keep people incarcerated.  </s>
<s> Many are non-violent offenders serving  </s>
<s> unnecessarily long sentences.  </s>
<s> I believe we can disrupt the pipeline from underfunded  </s>
<s> schools to overcrowded jails.  </s>
<s> I believe we can address the disparities in the  </s>
<s> application of criminal justice,  </s>
<s> from arrest rates to sentencing to incarceration.  </s>
<s> And I believe we can help those who have served their  </s>
<s> time and earned a second chance get the support they  </s>
<s> need to become productive members of society.  </s>
<s> That's why over the course of this year,  </s>
<s> I've been talking to folks around the country about  </s>
<s> reforming our criminal justice system to make it  </s>
<s> smarter, fairer, and more effective.  </s>
<s> In February, I sat down in the Oval Office with police  </s>
<s> officers from around the country.  </s>
<s> In the spring, I met with police officers and young  </s>
<s> people in Camden, New Jersey,  </s>
<s> where they're using community policing and data  </s>
<s> to drive down crime.  </s>
<s> Over the summer, I visited a prison in Oklahoma to talk  </s>
<s> with inmates and corrections officers about  </s>
<s> rehabilitating prisoners, and preventing more people  </s>
<s> from ending up there in the first place.  </s>
<s> Two weeks ago, I visited West Virginia to meet with  </s>
<s> families battling prescription drug and heroin  </s>
<s> abuse, as well as people who are working on new solutions  </s>
<s> for treatment and rehabilitation.  </s>
<s> Last week, I traveled to Chicago to thank police  </s>
<s> chiefs from across the country for all that their  </s>
<s> officers do to protect Americans,  </s>
<s> to make sure they get the resources to get the job  </s>
<s> done, and to call for common sense gun safety  </s>
<s> reforms that would make officers and their  </s>
<s> communities safer.  </s>
<s> We know that having millions of people in the  </s>
<s> criminal justice system, without any ability to find  </s>

<s> efforts have resulted in a secure future,  </s>
<s> including a secure retirement.  </s>
<s> For this recession has not only led to the loss of jobs,  </s>
<s> but also the loss of savings.  </s>
<s> The drop in home values, for example,  </s>
<s> has also meant a drop in the value of the single largest  </s>
<s> investment most families have.  </s>
<s> And the decline in the financial markets has led to a decline in  </s>
<s> the value of 401(k)s and other sources of savings and  </s>
<s> retirement security.  </s>
<s> As a result, over the past two years,  </s>
<s> the American people have lost about $2 trillion in retirement savings.  </s>
<s> This carries a painful toll.  </s>
<s> I've heard from so many who've had to put off retirement,  </s>
<s> or come out of retirement, to make ends meet.  </s>
<s> I've heard from seniors who worked hard their whole lives  </s>
<s> but now, in their golden years, are unsure of where to turn to  </s>
<s> pay the bills, afford the prescriptions,  </s>
<s> or keep the home in which they raised a family.  </s>
<s> And having too little in savings not only leaves people  </s>
<s> financially ill-prepared for retirement,  </s>
<s> but also for whatever challenges life brings.  </s>
<s> It places in jeopardy so many dreams,  </s>
<s> from owning a home to attending college.  </s>
<s> The fact is, even before this recession hit,  </s>
<s> the savings rate was essentially zero,  </s>
<s> while borrowing had risen and credit card debt had increased.  </s>
<s> Many were simply struggling to stay afloat as incomes were  </s>
<s> stagnant -- or falling -- and jobs were scarce;  </s>
<s> that's important to remember.  </s>
<s> But there were also those who spent beyond their means.  </s>
<s> And more broadly, tens of millions of families have been,  </s>
<s> for a variety of reasons, unable to put away enough money for a  </s>
<s> secure retirement.  </s>
<s> Half of America's workforce doesn't have access to a  </s>
<s> retirement plan at work.  </s>
<s> And fewer than 10% of those without workplace retirement  </s>
<s> plans have one of their own.  </s>
<s> We cannot continue on this course.  </s>
<s> And we certainly can't go back to an economy based on inflated  </s>
<s> profits and maxed-out credit cards;  </s>
<s> the cycles of speculative boom and painful busts;  </s>
<s> a system that put the interests of the short-term ahead of the  </s>
<s> needs of long-term.  </s>
<s> We have to revive this economy and rebuild it stronger than before.  </s>
<s> And making sure that folks have the opportunity and incentive to  </s>
<s> save -- for a home or college, for retirement or a rainy day --  </s>
<s> is essential to that effort.  </s>
<s> If you work hard and meet your responsibilities,  </s>
<s> this country is going to honor our collective responsibility to  </s>
<s> you: to ensure that you can save and secure your retirement.  </s>
<s> That's why we're announcing several common-sense changes  </s>
<s> that will help families put away money for the future.  </s>
<s> First, we're going to make it easier for small businesses to  </s>
<s> do what large businesses do: allow workers to automatically  </s>
<s> enroll in a 401(k) or an individual retirement account.  </s>
<s> We know that automatic enrollment has made a big  </s>
<s> difference in participation rates by making it simpler for  </s>
<s> workers to save -- and that's why we're going to expand it to  </s>
<s> more people.  </s>
<s> Second, we'll make it easier for people to save their federal tax  </s>
<s> refunds, which 100 million families receive.  </s>
<s> Today, if you have a retirement account,  </s>
<s> you can have your refund deposited directly into your account.  </s>
<s> With this change, we'll make it easier for those without  </s>
<s> retirement plans to save their refunds as well.  </s>
<s> You'll be able to check a box on your tax return to receive your  </s>
<s> refund as a savings bond.  </s>
<s> Third, we'll make it possible for employees to put payments  </s>
<s> for unused vacation and sick days into their retirement plans  </s>
<s> if they wish.  </s>
<s> Right now, most workers don't have that option.  </s>
<s> And fourth, the IRS and the Treasury Department are creating  </s>
<s> a plain-English, easy-to-follow guide, as well as a website,  </s>
<s> to help folks navigate what are often very complicated waters,  </s>
<s> especially for workers changing jobs who often are unsure how  </s>
<s> best to continue saving for retirement.  </s>
<s> Because the rules ought to be written to encourage people to  </s>
<s> save -- instead of discouraging them.  </s>
<s> We'll also build on these steps by working with Congress.  </s>
<s> As part of my budget, I've proposed ensuring that nearly  </s>
<s> every American has access to a retirement savings account  </s>
<s> through his or her job.  </s>
<s> This plan would make it possible for workers to automatically  </s>
<s> enroll in IRAs through payroll contributions.  </s>
<s> And the budget simplifies and expands a tax credit for  </s>
<s> millions of families, matching half of a family's savings up to  </s>
<s> $1,000 per year and depositing the tax credit directly into a  </s>
<s> retirement account.  </s>
<s> This is a difficult time for our country.  </s>
<s> But I'm confident that we can meet the challenges we face and  </s>
<s> leave behind something better; that we're ready to take  </s>
<s> responsibility for our future once again --  </s>
<s> as individuals and as a nation.  </s>
<s> I hope that all of you have the chance to enjoy this Labor Day  </s>
<s> weekend with family and friends.  </s>
<s> But my larger hope and expectation is that next Labor  </s>
<s> Day, the economic storms we're weathering now will have given  </s>
<s> way to brighter and more prosperous times.  </s>
<s> Thank you.  </s>

<s> The President: This weekend marks the fourth anniversary of Hurricane  </s>
<s> Katrina's devastation of the Gulf Coast.  </s>
<s> As we remember all that was lost,  </s>
<s> we must take stock of the work being done on recovery,  </s>
<s> while preparing for future disasters.  </s>
<s> That's what I want to speak with you about today.  </s>
<s> None of us can forget how we felt when those winds battered  </s>
<s> the shore, the floodwaters began to rise,  </s>
<s> and Americans were stranded on rooftops and in stadiums.  </s>
<s> Over a thousand people would lose their lives.  </s>
<s> Over a million people were displaced.  </s>
<s> Whole neighborhoods of a great American city were left in ruins.  </s>
<s> Communities across the Gulf Coast were forever changed.  </s>
<s> And many Americans questioned whether government could fulfill  </s>
<s> its responsibilities to respond in a crisis,  </s>
<s> or contribute to a recovery that covered parts of four states.  </s>
<s> Since taking office in January, my Administration has focused on  </s>
<s> helping citizens finish the work of rebuilding their lives and  </s>
<s> communities, while taking steps to prevent similar catastrophes  </s>
<s> going forward.  </s>
<s> Our approach is simple: government must keep its  </s>
<s> responsibility to the people, so that Americans have the  </s>
<s> opportunity to take responsibility for their own future.  </s>
<s> That's the work that we're doing.  </s>
<s> To date, eleven members of my Cabinet have visited the Gulf  </s>
<s> Coast, and I'm looking forward to going to New Orleans later this year.  </s>
<s> To complete a complex recovery that addresses nearly every  </s>
<s> sector of society, we've prioritized coordination among  </s>
<s> different federal agencies, and with state and local governments.  </s>
<s> No more turf wars -- all of us need to move forward together,  </s>
<s> because there's much more work to be done.  </s>
<s> I've also made it clear that we will not tolerate the red tape  </s>
<s> that stands in the way of progress,  </s>
<s> or the waste that can drive up the bill.  </s>
<s> Government must be a partner -- not an opponent --  </s>
<s> in getting things done.  </s>

<s> resolution programs to expedite recovery efforts,  </s>
<s> and have freed up hundreds of millions of dollars of federal  </s>
<s> assistance that had not been distributed.  </s>

<s> across the Gulf Coast -- building and improving schools;  </s>
<s> investing in public health and safety;  </s>
<s> and repairing broken roads, bridges and homes.  </s>
<s> And this effort has been dramatically amplified by the  </s>
<s> Recovery Act, which has put thousands of Gulf Coast  </s>
<s> residents to work.  </s>
<s> As we complete this effort, we see countless stories of  </s>
<s> citizens holding up their end of the bargain.  </s>
<s> In New Orleans, hundreds of kids just started the school year at  </s>
<s> Langston Hughes elementary, the first school built from scratch  </s>
<s> since Katrina.  </s>
<s> The St. Bernard Project has drawn together volunteers to  </s>
<s> rebuild hundreds of homes, where people can live with dignity and security.  </s>
<s> To cite just one hopeful indicator,  </s>
<s> New Orleans is the fastest growing city in America,  </s>
<s> as many who've been displaced are now coming home.  </s>
<s> As we rebuild and recover, we must also learn the lessons of  </s>
<s> Katrina, so that our nation is more protected and resilient in  </s>
<s> the face of disaster.  </s>
<s> That means continuing to rebuild hundreds of miles of levees and  </s>
<s> floodwalls around New Orleans, and working to strengthen the  </s>
<s> wetlands and barrier islands that are the Gulf Coast's first  </s>

<s> On this anniversary, we are focused on the threat from hurricanes.  </s>

<s> The President: Over the past two years, we've won a number of battles to  </s>
<s> defend the interests of the middle class.  </s>
<s> One of the most important victories we achieved was the  </s>
<s> passage of Wall Street Reform.  </s>
<s> This was a bill designed to rein in the secret deals and reckless  </s>
<s> gambling that nearly brought down the financial system.  </s>
<s> It set new rules so that taxpayers would never again be  </s>
<s> on the hook for a bailout if a big financial company went under.  </s>
<s> And reform included the strongest consumer protections  </s>
<s> in history to put an end to a lot of the hidden fees,  </s>
<s> deceptive mortgages, and other abusive practices used to tilt  </s>
<s> the table against ordinary people in their financial dealings.  </s>
<s> It was a tough fight.  </s>
<s> The special interests poured millions into a lobbying  </s>
<s> campaign to prevent us from reforming the system --  </s>
<s> a system that worked a lot better for them than for middle  </s>
<s> class families.  </s>
<s> Some in the financial industry were eager to protect a status  </s>
<s> quo that basically allowed them to play by their own rules --  </s>
<s> and these interests held common cause with Republican leaders in  </s>
<s> Washington who were looking to score a political victory in an  </s>
<s> election year.  </s>
<s> But their efforts failed, and we succeeded in passing reform in  </s>
<s> the hopes of ensuring that we never again face a crisis like  </s>
<s> the one we've been through -- a crisis that unleashed an  </s>
<s> economic downturn as deep as any since the Great Depression.  </s>
<s> Even today, we're still digging out of the damage it unleashed  </s>
<s> on our economy.  </s>
<s> Millions of people are still out of work.  </s>
<s> Millions of families are still hurting.  </s>
<s> We're also seeing the reverberations of this crisis  </s>
<s> with the rise in foreclosures, and recently we've seen problems  </s>
<s> in foreclosure proceedings -- mistakes that have led to  </s>
<s> disruptions in the housing markets.  </s>
<s> This is only one more piece of evidence as to why Wall Street  </s>
<s> reform is so necessary.  </s>
<s> In fact, as part of reform, a new consumer watchdog is now  </s>
<s> standing up.  </s>
<s> It will have just one job -- looking out for ordinary  </s>
<s> consumers in the financial system.  </s>
<s> And this watchdog will have the authority to guard against  </s>
<s> unfair practices in mortgage transactions and foreclosures.  </s>

<s> The President: On Wednesday, I addressed a joint session of Congress and  </s>
<s> the American people about why we need health insurance reform and  </s>
<s> what it will take to do it.  </s>
<s> Since then, I've continued to hear from many Americans across  </s>
<s> the country about why this is so urgent and important.  </s>
<s> I've heard from Americans who can't get health coverage;  </s>
<s> men and women who worry that one accident or illness could drive  </s>
<s> them into bankruptcy.  </s>
<s> And I've heard from Americans with insurance who thought that  </s>
<s> "the uninsured" always referred to someone else --  </s>
<s> but between skyrocketing costs and insurance company practices;  </s>
<s> they're beginning to worry that they could find themselves  </s>
<s> uninsured too.  </s>
<s> It's an anxiety that's keeping more and more Americans awake at night.  </s>
<s> Over the last twelve months, nearly six million more  </s>
<s> Americans lost their health coverage --  </s>
<s> that's 17,000 men and women every single day.  </s>
<s> We're not just talking about Americans in poverty, either --  </s>
<s> we're talking about middle-class Americans.  </s>
<s> In other words, it can happen to anyone.  </s>
<s> And based on a brand-new report from the Treasury Department,  </s>
<s> we can expect that about half of all Americans under 65 will lose  </s>
<s> their health coverage at some point over the next ten years.  </s>
<s> If you're under the age of 21 today,  </s>
<s> chances are more than half that you'll find yourself uninsured  </s>
<s> at some point in that time.  </s>
<s> And more than one-third of Americans will go without  </s>
<s> coverage for longer than one year.  </s>
<s> I refuse to allow that future to happen.  </s>
<s> In the United States of America, no one should have to worry that  </s>
<s> they'll go without health insurance --  </s>
<s> not for one year, not for one month, not for one day.  </s>
<s> And once I sign my health reform plan into law -- they won't.  </s>
<s> My plan will provide more security and stability to those  </s>
<s> who have health insurance; offer quality,  </s>
<s> affordable choices to those who currently don't;  </s>
<s> and bring health care costs for our families, our businesses,  </s>
<s> and our government under control.  </s>
<s> First of all, if you are among the hundreds of millions of  </s>
<s> Americans who already have insurance through your job,  </s>
<s> or Medicare, or Medicaid, or the VA,  </s>
<s> nothing in my plan will require you or your employer to change  </s>
<s> the coverage or the doctor you have.  </s>
<s> What my plan will do is make the insurance you have work better for you.  </s>
<s> We'll make it illegal for insurance companies to deny you  </s>
<s> coverage because of a pre-existing condition,  </s>
<s> or drop your coverage when you get sick,  </s>
<s> or water it down when you need it the most.  </s>
<s> They'll no longer be able to place some arbitrary cap on the  </s>
<s> amount of coverage you can receive in a given year or over  </s>
<s> a lifetime, and we will place a limit on how much you can be  </s>
<s> charged for out-of-pocket expenses --  </s>
<s> because no one should go broke just because they get sick.  </s>
<s> Second, if you're one of the more than thirty million  </s>
<s> Americans who can't get coverage,  </s>
<s> you'll finally have quality, affordable choices.  </s>
<s> If you lose your job, change your job,  </s>
<s> or start your own business, you will be able to get coverage.  </s>
<s> And as I've said over and over again,  </s>
<s> I will not sign a plan that adds one dime to our deficits -- period.  </s>
<s> This plan will be paid for.  </s>
<s> The middle-class will realize greater security,  </s>
<s> not higher taxes.  </s>
<s> And if we can successfully slow the growth of health care costs  </s>
<s> by just one-tenth of 1% each year,  </s>
<s> it will actually reduce the deficit by $4 trillion over the long term.  </s>
<s> Affordable, quality care within reach for the tens of millions  </s>
<s> of Americans who don't have it today.  </s>
<s> Stability and security for the hundreds of millions who do.  </s>
<s> That's the reform we seek.  </s>
<s> We have had a long and important debate.  </s>
<s> But now is the time for action.  </s>
<s> Because every day we wait, more Americans will lose their health  </s>
<s> care, their businesses, and their homes --  </s>
<s> but also the dreams they've worked for and the peace of mind  </s>
<s> they deserve.  </s>
<s> They are why we have to succeed.  </s>
<s> So if you're willing to put country before party and the  </s>
<s> interests of our children above our own;  </s>

<s> some form of higher education.  </s>
<s> But at a moment when a higher education  </s>
<s> has never been more important,  </s>
<s> it's also never been more expensive.  </s>
<s> That's why, over the past four years,  </s>
<s> we've helped make college more affordable  </s>
<s> for millions of students and families with grants and loans  </s>
<s> that go farther from before.  </s>
<s> But students and families and taxpayers cannot just keep  </s>
<s> subsidizing college costs that keep going up and up.  </s>

<s> more than $26,000 in debt.  </s>
<s> We cannot price the middle class out of a college education.  </s>
<s> That's why I proposed major new reforms to make college more  </s>
<s> affordable and make it easier for folks  </s>
<s> to pay for their education.  </s>
<s> First, we're going to start rating colleges  </s>
<s> based on opportunity -  </s>
<s> are they helping students  </s>
<s> from all kinds of backgrounds succeed,  </s>
<s> and on outcomes - their value to students and parents.  </s>
<s> In time, we'll use those ratings to make sure that the colleges  </s>
<s> that keep their tuition down are the ones  </s>
<s> that will see their taxpayer funding go up.  </s>
<s> Second, we're going to jumpstart competition between colleges  </s>
<s> over innovations that help more students graduate in less time,  </s>
<s> at less cost, while maintaining quality.  </s>
<s> A number of schools are already testing new approaches,  </s>
<s> like putting more courses online or basing course credit  </s>
<s> on competence, not just hours spent in the classroom.  </s>
<s> And third, we're going to help more students  </s>
<s> responsibly manage their debt,  </s>
<s> by making more of them eligible  </s>
<s> for a loan repayment program called Pay-As-You-Earn,  </s>
<s> which caps your loan payments at 10 percent of what you make.  </s>
<s> And we'll reach out directly to students to make sure  </s>
<s> they know that this program exists.  </s>
<s> These reforms won't be popular with everybody.  </s>
<s> But the path we're on now is unsustainable  </s>
<s> for our students and our economy.  </s>
<s> Higher education shouldn't be a luxury, or a roll of the dice;  </s>
<s> it's an economic imperative that every family in America  </s>

<s> a little closer to that goal.  </s>

<s> in Congress came together to pass the Fair Housing Act.  </s>
<s> It's a law that says landlords can't turn away tenants  </s>
<s> solely because of their race, religion, sex, national  </s>
<s> origin, or disability.  </s>
<s> And it made a difference in this country.  </s>

<s> Just a few weeks ago, the Supreme Court ruled that  </s>
<s> policies segregating minorities in poor  </s>
<s> neighborhoods, even unintentionally,  </s>
<s> are against the law.  </s>
<s> The Court recognized what many people know to be true  </s>
<s> from their own lives: that too often, where people  </s>
<s> live determines what opportunities they  </s>
<s> have in life.  </s>
<s> In some cities, kids living just blocks apart lead  </s>
<s> incredibly different lives.  </s>
<s> They go to different schools, play in different parks,  </s>
<s> shop in different stores, and walk down different streets.  </s>

<s> shot in life.  </s>

<s> their own goals.  </s>

<s> The President: 45 years ago, we made a solemn compact as a nation that senior  </s>
<s> citizens would not go without the health care they need.  </s>
<s> This is the promise we made when Medicare was born.  </s>
<s> And it's the responsibility of each generation to keep that promise.  </s>
<s> That's why a report issued this week by the Trustees who oversee  </s>
<s> Medicare was such good news.  </s>
<s> According to this report, the steps we took this year to  </s>
<s> reform the health care system have put Medicare on a sounder  </s>
<s> financial footing.  </s>
<s> Reform has actually added at least a dozen years to the  </s>
<s> solvency of Medicare -- the single longest extension in  </s>
<s> history -- while helping to preserve Medicare for  </s>
<s> generations to come.  </s>
<s> We've made Medicare more solvent by going after waste, fraud,  </s>
<s> and abuse -- not by changing seniors' guaranteed benefits.  </s>
<s> In fact, seniors are starting to see that because of health  </s>
<s> reform, their benefits are getting better all the time.  </s>
<s> Seniors who fall into the "doughnut hole" --  </s>
<s> the gap in Medicare Part D drug coverage --  </s>
<s> are eligible right now for a $250 rebate to help cover the  </s>
<s> cost of their prescriptions.  </s>
<s> Now, I know for people facing drug costs far higher than that,  </s>
<s> they need more help.  </s>
<s> So starting next year, if you fall in the doughnut hole,  </s>
<s> you'll get a 50% discount on the brand-name medicine you need.  </s>
<s> And in the coming years, this law will close the doughnut hole  </s>
<s> completely once and for all.  </s>
<s> Already, we've put insurance companies on notice that we have  </s>
<s> the authority to review and reject unreasonable rate  </s>
<s> increases for Medicare Advantage plans.  </s>
<s> And we've made it clear to the insurers that we won't hesitate  </s>
<s> to use this authority to protect seniors.  </s>
<s> Beginning next year, preventive care --  </s>
<s> including annual physicals, wellness exams,  </s>
<s> and tests like mammograms -- will be free for seniors as well.  </s>
<s> That'll make it easier for folks to stay healthy.  </s>
<s> But it will also mean that doctors can catch things  </s>
<s> earlier, so treatment may be less invasive and less expensive.  </s>
<s> And as reform ramps up in the coming years,  </s>
<s> we expect seniors to save an average of $200 per year in  </s>
<s> premiums and more than $200 each year in out of pocket costs, too.  </s>
<s> This is possible in part through reforms that target waste and  </s>
<s> abuse and redirect those resources to where they're  </s>
<s> supposed to go: our seniors.  </s>
<s> We're already on track to cut improper payments in half --  </s>
<s> including money that goes to criminals who steal taxpayer  </s>
<s> dollars by setting up insurance scams and other frauds.  </s>
<s> And we won't stop there.  </s>
<s> Because by preventing the loss of these tax dollars,  </s>
<s> we can both address the runaway costs of Medicare and improve  </s>
<s> the quality of care seniors receive --  </s>
<s> and we can crack down on those who prey on seniors and take  </s>
<s> advantage of people.  </s>
<s> So we are no longer accepting business as usual.  </s>
<s> We're making tough decisions to meet the challenges of our time.  </s>
<s> And as a result, Medicare is stronger and more secure.  </s>
<s> That's important.  </s>
<s> Because Medicare isn't just a program.  </s>
<s> It's a commitment to America's seniors --  </s>
<s> that after working your whole life,  </s>
<s> you've earned the security of quality health care you can afford.  </s>
<s> As long as I am President, that's a commitment this country  </s>
<s> is going to keep.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> This Monday, I'm heading to Alaska for a three-day tour  </s>
<s> of the state.  </s>
<s> I've been looking forward to this for a long time.  </s>
<s> Not only because Alaska is one of the most beautiful  </s>
<s> places in a country that's full of beautiful places -  </s>
<s> but because I'll have several opportunities to  </s>
<s> meet with everyday Alaskans about what's going  </s>
<s> on in their lives.  </s>
<s> I'll travel throughout the state, meeting with Alaskans  </s>
<s> who live above the Arctic Circle, with Alaska natives,  </s>
<s> and with folks who earn their livelihoods through  </s>
<s> fishing and tourism.  </s>
<s> And I expect to learn a lot.  </s>
<s> One thing I've learned so far is that a lot of these  </s>
<s> conversations begin with climate change.  </s>
<s> And that's because Alaskans are already living  </s>
<s> with its effects.  </s>
<s> More frequent and extensive wildfires.  </s>
<s> Bigger storm surges as sea ice melts faster.  </s>
<s> Some of the swiftest shoreline erosion in the  </s>
<s> world - in some places, more than three feet a year.  </s>
<s> Alaska's glaciers are melting faster too,  </s>
<s> threatening tourism and adding to rising seas.  </s>
<s> And if we do nothing, Alaskan temperatures are  </s>
<s> projected to rise between six and twelve degrees by  </s>
<s> the end of the century, changing all sorts of  </s>
<s> industries forever.  </s>
<s> This is all real.  </s>
<s> This is happening to our fellow Americans right now.  </s>
<s> In fact, Alaska's governor recently told me that four  </s>
<s> villages are in "imminent danger" and have  </s>
<s> to be relocated.  </s>
<s> Already, rising sea levels are beginning to swallow  </s>
<s> one island community.  </s>
<s> Think about that.  </s>
<s> If another country threatened to wipe out  </s>
<s> an American town, we'd do everything in our power  </s>
<s> to protect ourselves.  </s>
<s> Climate change poses the same threat, right now.  </s>
<s> That's why one of the things I'll do while I'm in Alaska  </s>
<s> is to convene other nations to meet this threat.  </s>
<s> Several Arctic nations have already committed to action.  </s>
<s> Since the United States and China worked together to set  </s>
<s> ambitious climate targets last year, leading by  </s>
<s> example, many of the world's biggest emitters have come  </s>
<s> forward with new climate plans of their own.  </s>
<s> And that's a good sign as we approach this December's  </s>
<s> global climate negotiations in Paris.  </s>
<s> Now, one of the ways America is leading is by  </s>
<s> transitioning away from dirty energy sources that  </s>
<s> threaten our health and our environment, and by going  </s>
<s> all-in on clean, renewable energy sources like wind  </s>
<s> and solar.  </s>
<s> And Alaska has the natural resources to be a global  </s>
<s> leader in this effort.  </s>
<s> Now even as we accelerate this transition, our  </s>
<s> economy still has to rely on oil and gas.  </s>
<s> As long as that's the case, I believe we should rely  </s>
<s> more on domestic production than on foreign imports, and  </s>
<s> we should demand the highest safety standards in the  </s>
<s> industry - our own.  </s>
<s> Still, I know there are Americans who are concerned  </s>
<s> about oil companies drilling in environmentally  </s>
<s> sensitive waters.  </s>
<s> Some are also concerned with my administration's decision  </s>
<s> to approve Shell's application to drill a well  </s>
<s> off the Alaskan coast, using leases they purchased before  </s>
<s> I took office.  </s>
<s> I share people's concerns about offshore drilling.  </s>
<s> I remember the BP spill in the Gulf of  </s>
<s> Mexico all too well.  </s>
<s> That's precisely why my administration has worked to  </s>
<s> make sure that our oil exploration conducted under  </s>
<s> these leases is done at the highest standards possible,  </s>
<s> with requirements specifically tailored to  </s>
<s> the risks of drilling off Alaska.  </s>
<s> We don't rubber-stamp permits.  </s>
<s> We made it clear that Shell has to meet our high  </s>
<s> standards in how they conduct their operations -  </s>
<s> and it's a testament to how rigorous we've applied those  </s>
<s> standards that Shell has delayed and limited its  </s>
<s> exploration off Alaska while trying to meet them.  </s>
<s> The bottom line is, safety has been and will continue  </s>
<s> to be my administration's top priority when it comes  </s>
<s> to oil and gas exploration off America's precious  </s>
<s> coasts - even as we push our economy and the world to  </s>
<s> ultimately transition off of fossil fuels.  </s>
<s> So I'm looking forward to talking with Alaskans  </s>
<s> about how we can work together to make America the global  </s>
<s> leader on climate change around the globe.  </s>
<s> And we're going to offer unique and engaging ways for  </s>
<s> you to join me on this trip all week at  </s>

<s> It's our wakeup call.  </s>

<s> the world to meet the threat of climate change before  </s>
<s> it's too late.  </s>

<s> The President: Each and every day in this country,  </s>
<s> Americans are grappling with health care premiums that are  </s>
<s> growing three times the rate of wages and insurance company  </s>
<s> policies that limit coverage and raise out-of-pocket costs.  </s>
<s> Thousands are losing their insurance coverage each day.  </s>
<s> Without real reform, the burdens on America's families and  </s>
<s> businesses will continue to multiply.  </s>
<s> We've had a vigorous debate about health insurance reform,  </s>
<s> and rightly so.  </s>
<s> This is an issue of vital concern to every American,  </s>
<s> and I'm glad that so many are engaged.  </s>
<s> But it also should be an honest debate,  </s>
<s> not one dominated by willful misrepresentations and outright  </s>
<s> distortions, spread by the very folks who would benefit the most  </s>
<s> by keeping things exactly as they are.  </s>
<s> So today, I want to spend a few minutes debunking some of the  </s>
<s> more outrageous myths circulating on the internet,  </s>
<s> on cable TV, and repeated at some town halls across this country.  </s>
<s> Let's start with the false claim that illegal immigrants will get  </s>
<s> health insurance under reform.  </s>
<s> That's not true.  </s>
<s> Illegal immigrants would not be covered.  </s>
<s> That idea has never even been on the table.  </s>
<s> Some are also saying that coverage for abortions would be  </s>
<s> mandated under reform.  </s>
<s> Also false.  </s>
<s> When it comes to the current ban on using tax dollars for  </s>
<s> abortions, nothing will change under reform.  </s>
<s> And as every credible person who has looked into it has said,  </s>
<s> there are no so-called "death panels" --  </s>
<s> an offensive notion to me and to the American people.  </s>
<s> These are phony claims meant to divide us.  </s>
<s> And we've all heard the charge that reform will somehow bring  </s>
<s> about a government takeover of health care.  </s>
<s> I know that sounds scary to many folks.  </s>
<s> It sounds scary to me, too.  </s>
<s> But here's the thing: it's not true.  </s>
<s> I no sooner want government to get between you and your doctor  </s>
<s> than I want insurance companies to make arbitrary decisions  </s>
<s> about what medical care is best for you, as they do today.  </s>
<s> As I've said from the beginning, under the reform we seek,  </s>
<s> if you like your doctor, you can keep your doctor.  </s>
<s> If you like your private health insurance plan,  </s>
<s> you can keep your plan.  </s>
<s> Period.  </s>
<s> Now, the source of a lot of these fears about government-run  </s>
<s> health care is confusion over what's called the public option.  </s>
<s> This is one idea among many to provide more competition and  </s>
<s> choice, especially in the many places around the country where  </s>
<s> just one insurer thoroughly dominates the marketplace.  </s>
<s> This alternative would have to operate as any other insurer,  </s>
<s> on the basis of the premiums it collects.  </s>
<s> And let me repeat -- it would just be an option;  </s>
<s> those who prefer their private insurers would be under no  </s>
<s> obligation to shift to a public plan.  </s>
<s> The insurance companies and their allies don't like this  </s>
<s> idea, or any that would promote greater competition.  </s>
<s> I get that.  </s>
<s> And I expect there would be a lot of discussion about it when  </s>
<s> Congress returns.  </s>
<s> But this one aspect of the health care debate shouldn't  </s>
<s> overshadow the other important steps we can and must take to  </s>
<s> reduce the increasing burdens families and businesses face.  </s>
<s> So let me stress them again: If you don't have insurance,  </s>
<s> you will finally have access to quality coverage you can afford.  </s>
<s> If you do have coverage, you will benefit from more security  </s>
<s> and more stability when it comes to your insurance.  </s>
<s> If you move, lose your job, or change jobs,  </s>
<s> you will not have to worry about losing health coverage.  </s>
<s> And we will set up tough consumer protections that will  </s>
<s> hold insurance companies accountable and stop them from  </s>
<s> exploiting you with unfair practices.  </s>
<s> We'll prohibit insurance companies from denying coverage  </s>
<s> because of a person's medical history.  </s>
<s> They will not be able to drop your coverage if you get sick.  </s>
<s> They will not be able to water down your coverage when you need it most.  </s>
<s> They will no longer be able to place some arbitrary cap on the  </s>
<s> amount of coverage you can receive in a given year or a lifetime.  </s>
<s> We'll place a limit on how much you can be charged for  </s>
<s> out-of-pocket expenses, because no one in America should go  </s>
<s> broke because they get sick.  </s>
<s> And we will require insurance companies to cover routine  </s>
<s> checkups and preventive care, like mammograms and colonoscopies.  </s>
<s> There's no reason we shouldn't be catching diseases like breast  </s>
<s> cancer and colon cancer on the front end.  </s>
<s> That makes sense, it saves lives,  </s>
<s> and it will also save money over the long-run.  </s>
<s> Taken together, the reforms we're seeking will help bring  </s>
<s> down skyrocketing costs, which will mean real savings for  </s>
<s> families, businesses, and government.  </s>
<s> We know what a failure to act would bring: More of the same.  </s>
<s> More of the same exploding costs.  </s>
<s> More of the same diminished coverage.  </s>
<s> If we fail to act, the crisis will grow.  </s>
<s> More families will go without coverage.  </s>
<s> More businesses will be forced to drop or water down their plans.  </s>
<s> So we can push off the day of reckoning and fail to deal with  </s>
<s> the flaws in the system, just as Washington has done,  </s>
<s> year after year, decade after decade.  </s>
<s> Or we can take steps that will provide every American family  </s>
<s> and business a measure of security and stability that they  </s>
<s> lack today.  </s>
<s> It's never been easy, moving this nation forward.  </s>
<s> There are always those who oppose it,  </s>
<s> and those who use fear to block change.  </s>
<s> But what has always distinguished America is that  </s>
<s> when all the arguments have been heard,  </s>
<s> and all the concerns have been voiced,  </s>
<s> and the time comes to do what must be done,  </s>
<s> we rise above our differences, grasp each others' hands,  </s>
<s> and march forward as one nation and one people,  </s>
<s> some of us Democrats, some of us Republicans,  </s>
<s> all of us Americans.  </s>
<s> This is our chance to march forward.  </s>
<s> I can't promise you that the reforms we seek will be perfect  </s>
<s> or make a difference overnight.  </s>
<s> But I can promise you this: if we pass health insurance reform,  </s>
<s> we will look back many years from now and say,  </s>
<s> this was the moment we summoned what's best in each of us to  </s>
<s> make life better for all of us.  </s>
<s> This was the moment when we built a health care system  </s>
<s> worthy of the nation and the people we love.  </s>
<s> This was the moment we earned our place alongside the greatest generations.  </s>

<s> those they lost endures not just in their own memories,  </s>

<s> The President: This week, Congress passed -- and I signed into law --  </s>
<s> an essential economic package that will help grow our economy,  </s>
<s> spur businesses, and jumpstart job creation.  </s>
<s> Instead of a New Years Day tax hike on the vast majority of  </s>
<s> Americans, two million Americans who've lost their jobs through  </s>
<s> no fault of their own will now know with certainty that they  </s>
<s> won't lose their emergency unemployment insurance at the  </s>
<s> end of the month.  </s>
<s> Eight million college students who'd otherwise face a tuition  </s>
<s> hike next semester will continue having access to the American  </s>
<s> Opportunity Tax Credit.  </s>
<s> 12 million families with 24 million children will benefit  </s>
<s> from extensions of the Earned Income Tax Credit and the Child  </s>
<s> Tax Credit.  </s>
<s> And millions of entrepreneurs who've been waiting to invest in  </s>
<s> their businesses will receive new tax incentives to help them  </s>
<s> expand, buy new equipment, or make upgrades,  </s>
<s> freeing up money to hire new workers.  </s>
<s> This package, which is so important for our economy at  </s>
<s> this pivotal time, was the product of hard negotiations.  </s>

<s> best for middle class families across this country,  </s>

<s> Before Congress breaks for the holidays,  </s>

<s> national priority -- and that is,  </s>
<s> the new START treaty that will reduce the world's nuclear  </s>
<s> arsenals and make America more secure.  </s>
<s> 25 years ago, the Soviet Union and the United States each had  </s>
<s> about 25,000 nuclear weapons.  </s>
<s> In the decades since, that number has been reduced by over  </s>
<s> 70%, and we've had on-site inspections of Russian nuclear facilities.  </s>
<s> That progress would not have been possible without strategic  </s>
<s> arms control treaties.  </s>
<s> During the past year, however, our old treaty with Russia  </s>
<s> expired, and without a new one, we won't be able to verify  </s>
<s> Russia's nuclear arsenal, which would undercut President  </s>
<s> Reagan's call to trust, but verify,  </s>
<s> when it comes to nuclear weapons.  </s>
<s> Without a new treaty, we'll risk turning back the progress we've  </s>
<s> made in our relationship with Russia,  </s>
<s> which is essential to enforce strong sanctions against Iran,  </s>
<s> secure vulnerable nuclear materials from terrorists,  </s>
<s> and resupply our troops in Afghanistan.  </s>
<s> And we'll risk undermining American leadership not only on  </s>
<s> nuclear proliferation, but a host of other challenges around the world.  </s>
<s> Ratifying a treaty like START isn't about winning a victory  </s>
<s> for an administration or a political party.  </s>
<s> It's about the safety and security of the United States of America.  </s>
<s> That's why this treaty is supported by both Presidents  </s>
<s> Bill Clinton and George H.W. Bush.  </s>
<s> That's why it's supported by every living Republican  </s>
<s> Secretary of State, by our NATO allies,  </s>
<s> and the leadership of the United States military.  </s>
<s> Indeed, the Vice-Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff,  </s>
<s> General Hoss Cartwright, said this week that the military  </s>
<s> needs this treaty, and they need it badly.  </s>
<s> And that's why every President since Ronald Reagan has pursued  </s>
<s> a treaty like START, and every one that has been reviewed by  </s>
<s> the Senate has passed with strong bipartisan support.  </s>
<s> We've taken the time to get this right.  </s>
<s> The START treaty has now been under review by the Senate for  </s>
<s> over seven months.  </s>
<s> It's gone through 18 hearings.  </s>
<s> Nearly 1,000 questions have been asked -- and answered.  </s>
<s> Several Republican Senators have come out in support of ratification.  </s>
<s> Meanwhile, further delay comes at a cost.  </s>
<s> Every minute we drag our feet is a minute that we have no  </s>
<s> inspectors on the ground at those Russian nuclear sites.  </s>
<s> It's time to get this done.  </s>
<s> It's time to show the same spirit of common purpose on our  </s>
<s> security that we showed this week on our economy.  </s>
<s> It's time to remember the old saying that politics stops at  </s>
<s> the water's edge.  </s>

<s> the dawn of the Cold War.  </s>
<s> Today, over 60 years later, when we're threatened not only by  </s>
<s> nuclear weapons, but an array of other dangers,  </s>

<s> The President: On Friday, we received better news than we expected about the  </s>
<s> state of our economy.  </s>
<s> We learned that we lost 247,000 jobs in July --  </s>
<s> some 200,000 fewer jobs than we lost in June,  </s>
<s> and far fewer than the nearly 700,000 a month we were losing  </s>
<s> at the beginning of the year.  </s>
<s> Of course, this is little comfort to anyone who saw their  </s>
<s> job disappear in July, and to the millions of Americans who  </s>
<s> are looking for work.  </s>
<s> And I will not rest until anyone who's looking for work can find a job.  </s>
<s> Still, this month's jobs numbers are a sign that we've begun to  </s>
<s> put the brakes on this recession and that the worst may be behind us.  </s>
<s> But we must do more than rescue our economy from this immediate  </s>
<s> crisis; we must rebuild it stronger than before.  </s>
<s> We must lay a new foundation for future growth and prosperity,  </s>
<s> and a key pillar of a new foundation is health insurance  </s>
<s> reform -- reform that we are now closer to achieving than ever before.  </s>
<s> There are still details to be hammered out.  </s>
<s> There are still differences to be reconciled.  </s>
<s> But we are moving toward a broad consensus on reform.  </s>
<s> Four committees in Congress have produced legislation --  </s>
<s> an unprecedented level of agreement on a difficult and  </s>
<s> complex challenge.  </s>
<s> In addition to the ongoing work in Congress,  </s>
<s> providers have agreed to bring down costs.  </s>
<s> Drug companies have agreed to make prescription drugs more  </s>
<s> affordable for seniors.  </s>
<s> The AARP supports reform because of the better care it will offer  </s>
<s> to seniors.  </s>
<s> And the American Nurses Association and the American  </s>
<s> Medical Association, which represent the millions of nurses  </s>
<s> and doctors who know our health care system best,  </s>
<s> all support reform, as well.  </s>
<s> As we draw close to finalizing -- and passing --  </s>
<s> real health insurance reform, the defenders of the status quo  </s>
<s> and political point-scorers in Washington are growing fiercer  </s>
<s> in their opposition.  </s>
<s> In recent days and weeks, some have been using misleading  </s>
<s> information to defeat what they know is the best chance of  </s>
<s> reform we have ever had.  </s>
<s> And that's why it's important, especially now,  </s>
<s> as Senators and Representatives head home and meet with their  </s>
<s> constituents, for you, the American people,  </s>
<s> to have all the facts.  </s>
<s> So, let me explain what reform will mean for you.  </s>
<s> And let me start by dispelling the outlandish rumors that  </s>
<s> reform will promote euthanasia, or cut Medicaid,  </s>
<s> or bring about a government takeover of health care.  </s>
<s> That's simply not true.  </s>
<s> This isn't about putting government in charge of your  </s>
<s> health insurance; it's about putting you in charge of your  </s>
<s> health insurance.  </s>
<s> Under the reforms we seek, if you like your doctor,  </s>
<s> you can keep your doctor.  </s>
<s> If you like your health care plan,  </s>
<s> you can keep your health care plan.  </s>
<s> And while reform is obviously essential for the 46 million  </s>
<s> Americans who don't have health insurance,  </s>
<s> it will also provide more stability and security to the  </s>
<s> hundreds of millions who do.  </s>
<s> Right now, we have a system that works well for the insurance  </s>
<s> industry, but that doesn't always work well for you.  </s>
<s> What we need, and what we will have when we pass health  </s>
<s> insurance reform, are consumer protections to make sure that  </s>
<s> those who have insurance are treated fairly and that  </s>
<s> insurance companies are held accountable.  </s>
<s> We'll require insurance companies to cover routine  </s>
<s> checkups and preventive care, like mammograms and  </s>
<s> colonoscopies, or eye and foot exams for diabetics,  </s>
<s> so we can avoid chronic illnesses that cost too many  </s>
<s> lives and too much money.  </s>
<s> We'll stop insurance companies from denying coverage because of  </s>
<s> a person's medical history.  </s>
<s> I'll never forget watching my own mother,  </s>
<s> as she fought cancer in her final days,  </s>
<s> worrying about whether her insurer would claim her illness  </s>
<s> was a preexisting condition.  </s>
<s> I've met so many Americans who worry about the same thing.  </s>
<s> And that's why, under these reforms,  </s>
<s> insurance companies will no longer be able to deny coverage  </s>
<s> because of a previous illness or injury.  </s>
<s> And insurance companies will no longer be allowed to drop or  </s>
<s> water down coverage for someone who has become seriously ill.  </s>
<s> Your health insurance ought to be there for you when it counts  </s>
<s> -- and reform will make sure it is.  </s>
<s> With reform, insurance companies will also have to limit how much  </s>
<s> you can be charged for out-of-pocket expenses.  </s>
<s> And we will stop insurance companies from placing arbitrary  </s>
<s> caps on the amount of coverage you can receive in a given year  </s>
<s> or a lifetime because no one in America should go broke because  </s>
<s> of an illness.  </s>
<s> In the end, the debate about health insurance reform boils  </s>
<s> down to a choice between two approaches.  </s>
<s> The first is almost guaranteed to double health care costs over  </s>
<s> the next decade, leave millions more Americans without  </s>
<s> insurance, leave those with insurance vulnerable to  </s>
<s> arbitrary denials of coverage, and bankrupt state and federal governments.  </s>
<s> That's the status quo.  </s>
<s> That's the health care system we have right now.  </s>
<s> So, we can either continue this approach,  </s>
<s> or we can choose another one -- one that will protect people  </s>
<s> against unfair insurance practices; provide quality,  </s>
<s> affordable insurance to every American;  </s>
<s> and bring down rising costs that are swamping families,  </s>
<s> businesses, and our budgets.  </s>
<s> That's the health care system we can bring about with reform.  </s>
<s> There are those who are focused on the so-called politics of  </s>
<s> health care; who are trying to exploit differences or concerns  </s>
<s> for political gain.  </s>
<s> And that's to be expected.  </s>
<s> That's Washington.  </s>

<s> This is about people's lives.  </s>
<s> This is about people's businesses.  </s>
<s> This is about America's future.  </s>
<s> That's what's at stake.  </s>
<s> And that's why health insurance reform is so important.  </s>
<s> That's why we have to get this done --  </s>
<s> and why we will get this done -- by the end of this year.  </s>

<s> President Obama: Today, I'd like to speak to you about an issue that is  </s>
<s> fundamental to America's national security: the need  </s>
<s> for the Senate to approve the New START Treaty this year.  </s>
<s> This Treaty is rooted in a practice that dates back  </s>
<s> to Ronald Reagan.  </s>
<s> The idea is simple - as the two nations with over 90 percent of  </s>
<s> the world's nuclear weapons, the United States and Russia have a  </s>
<s> responsibility to work together to reduce our arsenals.  </s>
<s> And to ensure that our national security is protected,  </s>
<s> the United States has an interest in tracking Russia's  </s>
<s> nuclear arsenal through a verification effort that puts  </s>
<s> U.S. inspectors on the ground.  </s>
<s> As President Reagan said when he signed a nuclear arms treaty  </s>
<s> with the Soviet Union in 1987, "Trust, but verify."  </s>
<s> That is precisely what the new START Treaty does.  </s>
<s> After nearly a full year of negotiations,  </s>
<s> we completed an agreement earlier this year that cuts by a  </s>
<s> third the number of long-range nuclear weapons and delivery  </s>
<s> vehicles that the United States and Russia can deploy,  </s>
<s> while ensuring that America retains a strong nuclear  </s>
<s> deterrent, and can put inspectors back on the  </s>
<s> ground in Russia.  </s>
<s> The Treaty also helped us reset our relations with Russia,  </s>
<s> which leads to concrete benefits.  </s>
<s> For instance, Russia has been indispensable to our efforts  </s>
<s> to enforce strong sanctions on Iran,  </s>
<s> to secure loose nuclear materials from terrorists,  </s>
<s> and to equip our troops in Afghanistan.  </s>
<s> All of this will be put at risk if the Senate does not pass the  </s>
<s> New START Treaty.  </s>
<s> Without ratification this year, the United States will have no  </s>
<s> inspectors on the ground, and no ability to verify  </s>
<s> Russian nuclear activities.  </s>
<s> So those who would block this treaty are breaking President  </s>
<s> Reagan's rule - they want to trust, but not verify.  </s>
<s> Without ratification, we put at risk the coalition that we have  </s>
<s> built to put pressure on Iran, and the transit routes through  </s>
<s> Russia that we use to equip our troops in Afghanistan.  </s>
<s> And without ratification, we risk undoing decades of American  </s>
<s> leadership on nuclear security, and decades of bipartisanship  </s>
<s> on this issue.  </s>
<s> Our security and our position in the world are at stake.  </s>
<s> Indeed, since the Reagan years, every President has pursued a  </s>
<s> negotiated, verified, arms reduction treaty.  </s>
<s> And every time that these treaties have been reviewed  </s>
<s> by the Senate, they have passed with over 85 votes.  </s>
<s> Bipartisan support for new START could not be stronger.  </s>
<s> It has been endorsed by Republicans from the Reagan  </s>
<s> Administration and both Bush Administrations - including  </s>
<s> Colin Powell, George Shultz, Jim Baker, and Henry Kissinger.  </s>
<s> And it was approved by the Senate Foreign Relations  </s>
<s> Committee by a strong bipartisan vote of 14-4.  </s>
<s> Over the last several months, several questions have been  </s>
<s> asked about New START, and we have answered every single one.  </s>
<s> Some have asked whether it will limit our missile  </s>
<s> defense - it will not.  </s>
<s> Some, including Senator Jon Kyl, have asked that we modernize our  </s>
<s> nuclear infrastructure for the 21st century - we are doing so,  </s>
<s> and plan to invest at least $85 billion in that effort over the  </s>
<s> next ten years - a significant increase  </s>
<s> from the Bush Administration.  </s>
<s> Finally, some make no argument against the Treaty - they just  </s>
<s> ask for more time.  </s>
<s> But remember this: it has already been 11 months since  </s>
<s> we've had inspectors in Russia, and every day that goes by  </s>
<s> without ratification is a day that we lose confidence  </s>
<s> in our understanding of Russia's nuclear weapons.  </s>
<s> If the Senate doesn't act this year - after six months,  </s>
<s> 18 hearings, and nearly a thousand questions answered -  </s>
<s> it would have to start over from scratch in January.  </s>
<s> The choice is clear: a failure to ratify new START would be  </s>
<s> a dangerous gamble with America's national security,  </s>
<s> setting back our understanding of Russia's nuclear weapons,  </s>
<s> as well as our leadership in the world.  </s>
<s> That is not what the American people sent  </s>
<s> us to Washington to do.  </s>
<s> There is enough gridlock, enough bickering.  </s>
<s> If there is one issue that should unite us - as Republicans  </s>
<s> and Democrats - it should be our national security.  </s>
<s> Some things are bigger than politics.  </s>
<s> As Republican Dick Lugar said the other day,  </s>
<s> "Every Senator has an obligation in the national security  </s>
<s> interest to take a stand, to do his or her duty."  </s>
<s> Senator Lugar is right.  </s>
<s> And if the Senate passes this treaty,  </s>
<s> it will not be an achievement for Democrats or Republicans -  </s>
<s> it will be a win for America.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> The President: As the political season heats up,  </s>
<s> Americans are already being inundated with the usual phone  </s>
<s> calls and mailings and TV ads from campaigns all across the country.  </s>
<s> But this summer, they're also seeing a flood of attack ads run  </s>
<s> by shadowy groups with harmless-sounding names.  </s>
<s> We don't know who's behind these ads and we don't know who's  </s>
<s> paying for them.  </s>
<s> The reason this is happening is because of a decision by the  </s>
<s> Supreme Court in the Citizens United case --  </s>
<s> a decision that now allows big corporations to spend unlimited  </s>
<s> amounts of money to influence our elections.  </s>
<s> They can buy millions of dollars worth of TV ads --  </s>
<s> and worst of all, they don't even have to reveal who is  </s>
<s> actually paying for them.  </s>
<s> You don't know if it's a foreign-controlled corporation.  </s>
<s> You don't know if it's BP.  </s>
<s> You don't know if it's a big insurance company or a Wall Street Bank.  </s>
<s> A group can hide behind a phony name like "Citizens for a Better  </s>
<s> Future," even if a more accurate name would be "Corporations for  </s>
<s> Weaker Oversight."  </s>
<s> We tried to fix this last month.  </s>
<s> There was a proposal supported by Democrats and Republicans  </s>
<s> that would've required corporate political advertisers to reveal  </s>
<s> who's funding their activities.  </s>
<s> When special interests take to the airwaves,  </s>
<s> whoever is running and funding the ad would have to appear in  </s>
<s> the advertisement and take responsibility for it --  </s>
<s> like a company's CEO or an organization's biggest contributor.  </s>
<s> And foreign-controlled corporations and entities would  </s>
<s> be restricted from spending money to influence American  </s>
<s> elections -- just as they were in the past.  </s>
<s> You would think that making these reforms would be a matter  </s>
<s> of common sense.  </s>
<s> You'd think that reducing corporate and even foreign  </s>
<s> influence over our elections wouldn't be a partisan issue.  </s>
<s> But the Republican leaders in Congress said no.  </s>
<s> In fact, they used their power to block the issue from even  </s>
<s> coming up for a vote.  </s>

<s> to keep the public in the dark.  </s>
<s> They don't want you to know which interests are paying for the ads.  </s>
<s> The only people who don't want to disclose the truth are people  </s>
<s> with something to hide.  </s>
<s> Well, we cannot allow the corporate takeover of our democracy.  </s>
<s> So we're going to continue to fight for reform and transparency.  </s>
<s> And I urge all of you to take up the same fight.  </s>
<s> Let's challenge every elected official who benefits from these  </s>
<s> ads to defend this practice or join us in stopping it.  </s>
<s> At a time of such challenge for America,  </s>
<s> we can't afford these political games.  </s>
<s> Millions of Americans are struggling to get by,  </s>
<s> and their voices shouldn't be drowned out by millions of  </s>
<s> dollars in secret, special interest advertising.  </s>
<s> Their voices should be heard.  </s>
<s> Let's not forget that a century ago,  </s>
<s> it was a Republican President -- Teddy Roosevelt --  </s>
<s> who first tried to tackle the issue of corporate influence on  </s>
<s> our elections.  </s>
<s> He actually called it "one of the principal sources of  </s>
<s> corruption in our political affairs."  </s>
<s> And he proposed strict limits on corporate influence in elections.  </s>
<s> "Every special interest is entitled to justice," he said.  </s>
<s> "but not one is entitled to a vote in Congress,  </s>
<s> to a voice on the bench, or to representation in any public office."  </s>
<s> We now face a similar challenge, and a similar opportunity to  </s>
<s> prevent special interests from gaining even more clout in Washington.  </s>
<s> This shouldn't be a Democratic issue or a Republican issue.  </s>
<s> This is an issue that goes to whether or not we have a  </s>
<s> democracy that works for ordinary Americans --  </s>
<s> a government of, by, and for the people.  </s>
<s> Let's show the cynics and the special interests that we still can.  </s>

<s> Every year around this time, American car companies start  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> As President and Commander in Chief, my greatest  </s>
<s> responsibility is the safety of the American people.  </s>
<s> And in our fight against terrorists, we need to use  </s>
<s> every effective tool at our disposal -- both to defend  </s>
<s> our security and to protect the freedoms and civil  </s>
<s> liberties enshrined in our Constitution.  </s>
<s> But tomorrow -- Sunday, at midnight -- some important  </s>
<s> tools we use against terrorists will expire.  </s>
<s> That's because Congress has not renewed them, and  </s>
<s> because legislation that would -- the USA Freedom Act  </s>
<s> -- is stuck in the Senate.  </s>
<s> I want to be very clear about what this means.  </s>
<s> Today, when investigating terrorist networks, our  </s>
<s> national security professionals can seek a  </s>
<s> court order to obtain certain business records.  </s>
<s> Our law enforcement professionals can seek a  </s>
<s> roving wiretap to keep up with terrorists when they  </s>
<s> switch cell phones.  </s>
<s> We can seek a wiretap on so-called lone wolves --  </s>
<s> suspected terrorists who may not be directly tied to a  </s>
<s> terrorist group.  </s>
<s> These tools are not controversial.  </s>
<s> Since 9/11, they have been renewed numerous times.  </s>
<s> FBI Director James Comey says they are "essential"  </s>
<s> and that losing them would "severely" impact terrorism  </s>
<s> investigations.  </s>
<s> But if Congress doesn't act by tomorrow at midnight,  </s>
<s> these tools go away as well.  </s>
<s> The USA Freedom Act also accomplishes something I  </s>
<s> called for a year and a half ago: it ends the bulk  </s>
<s> metadata program -- the bulk collection of phone records  </s>
<s> -- as it currently exists and puts in place new  </s>
<s> reforms.  </s>
<s> The government will no longer hold these records;  </s>
<s> telephone providers will.  </s>
<s> The Act also includes other changes to our surveillance  </s>
<s> laws -- including more transparency -- to help  </s>
<s> build confidence among the American people that your  </s>
<s> privacy and civil liberties are being protected.  </s>
<s> But if Congress doesn't act by midnight tomorrow, these  </s>
<s> reforms will be in jeopardy, too.  </s>
<s> It doesn't have to be this way.  </s>
<s> The USA Freedom Act reflects ideas from privacy  </s>
<s> advocates, our private sector partners and our  </s>
<s> national security experts.  </s>
<s> It already passed the House of Representatives with  </s>
<s> overwhelming bipartisan support -- Republicans and  </s>
<s> Democrats.  </s>
<s> A majority of the Senate -- Republicans and Democrats --  </s>
<s> have voted to move it forward.  </s>
<s> So what's the problem?  </s>
<s> A small group of senators is standing in the way.  </s>
<s> And, unfortunately, some folks are trying to use this  </s>
<s> debate to score political points.  </s>
<s> But this shouldn't and can't be about politics.  </s>
<s> This is a matter of national security.  </s>
<s> Terrorists like al Qaeda and ISIL aren't suddenly going  </s>
<s> to stop plotting against us at midnight tomorrow.  </s>
<s> And we shouldn't surrender the tools that help keep us  </s>
<s> safe.  </s>
<s> It would be irresponsible.  </s>
<s> It would be reckless.  </s>
<s> And we shouldn't allow it to happen.  </s>
<s> So today, I'm calling on Americans to join me in  </s>
<s> speaking with one voice to the Senate.  </s>
<s> Put the politics aside.  </s>
<s> Put our national security first.  </s>
<s> Pass the USA Freedom Act -- now.  </s>
<s> And let's protect the security and civil liberties  </s>
<s> of every American.  </s>
<s> Thanks very much.  </s>

<s> That's the idea behind the American Jobs Act.  </s>

<s> who are working.  </s>

<s> This jobs bill puts teachers back in the classroom,  </s>
<s> and keeps cops and firefighters on our streets.  </s>
<s> This jobs bill gives tax credits to companies that hire our  </s>
<s> veterans, because if you sign up to fight for our country,  </s>
<s> the last thing you should have to do is fight for a job when  </s>
<s> you come home.  </s>
<s> This jobs bill connects the long-term unemployed to  </s>
<s> temporary work to keep their skills sharp while they look for  </s>
<s> a job, and it gives hundreds of thousands of young people the  </s>
<s> hope of a job next summer.  </s>
<s> This jobs bill cuts taxes for every small business owner  </s>
<s> in America.  </s>
<s> It cuts them even more for small business owners that hire new  </s>
<s> workers and raise workers' salaries.  </s>
<s> And it cuts taxes for every working family in America so  </s>
<s> that you'll have more money in your pockets,  </s>
<s> and businesses know they'll have more customers to buy  </s>
<s> what they sell.  </s>
<s> That's the American Jobs Act, and you can check it out for  </s>
<s> yourself on WhiteHouse.gov.  </s>
<s> It will create new jobs.  </s>
<s> It'll cut taxes for every worker and small business in  </s>
<s> the country.  </s>
<s> And it will not add to the deficit.  </s>
<s> It will be paid for.  </s>
<s> On Monday, I'll lay out my plan for how we'll do that --  </s>

<s> The President: Over the last few months, I've been talking about a choice we  </s>
<s> face as a country.  </s>
<s> We can either settle for an economy where a few people do  </s>
<s> really well and everybody else struggles to get by,  </s>
<s> or we can build an economy where hard work pays off again,  </s>
<s> Where everyone gets a fair shot.  </s>
<s> Everyone does their fair share.  </s>
<s> And everyone plays by the same rules.  </s>
<s> That's up to us.  </s>
<s> And today, I want to talk to you about the idea that everyone in  </s>
<s> this country should do their fair share.  </s>
<s> Now, if this were a perfect world,  </s>
<s> we'd have unlimited resources -- no one would ever have to pay  </s>
<s> any taxes and we could spend as much as we wanted.  </s>
<s> But we live in the real world --  </s>
<s> we don't have unlimited resources.  </s>
<s> We have a deficit that needs to be paid down.  </s>
<s> And we also have to pay for investments that will help our  </s>
<s> economy grow and keep our country safe: Education;  </s>
<s> research and technology; a strong military;  </s>
<s> and retirement programs like Medicare and Social Security.  </s>
<s> That means we have to make choices.  </s>
<s> When it comes to paying down the deficit and investing in our  </s>
<s> future, should we ask middle-class Americans to pay even more  </s>
<s> at a time when their budgets are already stretched to the  </s>
<s> breaking point?  </s>
<s> Or should we ask some of the wealthiest Americans to pay  </s>
<s> their fair share?  </s>
<s> That's the choice.  </s>
<s> Over the last decade, we've spent hundreds of billions of  </s>
<s> dollars on what was supposed to be a temporary tax cut for the  </s>
<s> wealthiest 2% of Americans.  </s>
<s> Now we're scheduled to spend almost $1 trillion more.  </s>
<s> Today, the wealthiest Americans are paying taxes at one of the  </s>
<s> lowest rates in 50 years.  </s>
<s> Warren Buffett is paying a lower rate than his secretary.  </s>
<s> Meanwhile, over the last 30 years,  </s>
<s> the tax rates for middle-class families have barely budged.  </s>
<s> That's not fair.  </s>
<s> It doesn't make any sense.  </s>
<s> Do we want to keep giving tax breaks to the wealthiest  </s>
<s> Americans -- folks like myself or Warren Buffett or Bill Gates,  </s>
<s> people who don't need them and never asked for them?  </s>
<s> Or do we want to keep investing in the things that will grow our  </s>
<s> economy and keep us secure?  </s>
<s> Because we can't afford to do both.  </s>
<s> Now, some people call this class warfare.  </s>
<s> But I think asking a billionaire to pay at least the same tax  </s>
<s> rate as his secretary is just common sense.  </s>
<s> We don't envy success in this country; we aspire to it.  </s>
<s> But we also believe that anyone who does well for themselves  </s>
<s> should do their fair share in return so that more people have  </s>
<s> the opportunity to get ahead -- not just a few.  </s>
<s> That's the America I believe in, and in the next few weeks,  </s>
<s> members of Congress will get a chance to show you  </s>
<s> where they stand.  </s>
<s> Congress is going to vote on what's called the Buffett Rule.  </s>
<s> If you make more than $1 million a year,  </s>
<s> you should pay at least the same percentage of your income in  </s>
<s> taxes as middle-class families do.  </s>
<s> On the other hand, if you make under $250,000 a year --  </s>
<s> like 98% of American families do --  </s>
<s> your taxes shouldn't go up.  </s>

<s> You're the ones who deserve a break.  </s>
<s> So every member of Congress is going to go on record.  </s>

<s> rewarded, and that everybody plays by the same rules.  </s>
<s> First, we're helping more Americans retire with  </s>
<s> security and dignity.  </s>
<s> Right now, if you go to a retirement advisor for  </s>
<s> investment advice, some of them don't have to act in  </s>
<s> your best interest.  </s>
<s> Instead of telling you the best way to save your  </s>
<s> hard-earned money, these advisors can get backdoor  </s>
<s> payments from big companies for steering you toward  </s>
<s> investments that cost more and earn you less.  </s>
<s> As a result, when you retire,  </s>
<s> you might be missing out on tens of thousands of dollars  </s>
<s> - because your advisor got paid more to give you bad  </s>
<s> advice.  </s>

<s> That's why, this week, the Treasury Department made it  </s>

<s> stick the rest of us with the tab.  </s>

<s> Because I believe that rather than double down on  </s>

<s> says if you put in a lifetime of hard work,  </s>

<s> you get sick.  </s>

<s> getting rid of wasteful spending in the health care system and  </s>

<s> They remind us of our responsibilities  </s>
<s> to God and, as God's children, our responsibilities  </s>
<s> to one another.  </s>

<s> for reflection and renewal.  </s>

<s> the scorn of the crowds, the agony of the cross -  </s>

<s> This week, I traveled across the country to talk about my  </s>
<s> all-of-the-above energy strategy for America --  </s>
<s> a strategy where we produce more oil and gas here at home,  </s>
<s> but also more biofuels and fuel-efficient cars;  </s>
<s> more solar power and wind power and other sources of clean,  </s>

<s> and will continue to be, a key part of my energy strategy.  </s>

<s> other time in the last eight years.  </s>

<s> And we've added enough oil and gas pipeline to circle the  </s>
<s> entire Earth and then some.  </s>
<s> Those are the facts.  </s>

<s> even though America uses around 20% of the world's oil,  </s>

<s> we'd still be relying on other countries for oil.  </s>

<s> More solar power.  </s>
<s> More wind power.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> One of the most consequential  </s>
<s> responsibilities our Constitution grants a  </s>
<s> President is appointing a Supreme Court Justice.  </s>
<s> The men and women who sit on the Supreme Court safeguard  </s>
<s> our rights.  </s>
<s> They ensure that ours is a system of laws, not of men.  </s>
<s> And they're given the essential task of applying  </s>
<s> the principles written into our founding documents to  </s>
<s> the most challenging questions of today.  </s>
<s> So this is a duty I take very seriously.  </s>
<s> It requires me to set aside short-term politics in order  </s>
<s> to maintain faith with our founders.  </s>
<s> And on Wednesday, after weeks of consultations with  </s>
<s> Republicans, Democrats, and leaders across the country,  </s>
<s> I selected a nominee whose unmatched experience and  </s>
<s> integrity have earned him the respect and admiration  </s>
<s> of both parties - Chief Judge Merrick Garland.  </s>
<s> Judge Garland grew up in my hometown of Chicago, with  </s>
<s> parents who taught him to work hard and deal fairly.  </s>
<s> As a young lawyer, he left a lucrative private firm to  </s>
<s> work for half as much in public service.  </s>
<s> Eventually, he oversaw the federal response to the  </s>
<s> Oklahoma City bombing, working side-by-side with  </s>
<s> first responders, victims, and their families to bring  </s>
<s> justice for an unspeakable crime.  </s>
<s> And everywhere he went during that investigation,  </s>
<s> he carried with him in his briefcase the program from  </s>
<s> the memorial service with each of the victims'  </s>
<s> names inside.  </s>
<s> For the last 19 years, Judge Garland has served on what's  </s>
<s> known as "the second highest court in the land" - the  </s>
<s> D.C. Circuit Court - including the last three  </s>
<s> years as Chief Judge.  </s>
<s> On the bench, he's shown a dedication to protecting our  </s>
<s> basic rights.  </s>
<s> A conviction that powerful voices must not be allowed  </s>
<s> to drown out those of everyday Americans.  </s>
<s> An understanding that justice isn't simply  </s>
<s> abstract legal theory; it affects people's daily lives.  </s>
<s> And a spirit of decency, modesty, and even-handedness  </s>
<s> in his work.  </s>
<s> Judge Garland is admired for his courtesy, his devotion  </s>
<s> to family, and his civic-mindedness - for the  </s>
<s> past 18 years, he's served as a tutor for young  </s>
<s> students at a local D.C. elementary school.  </s>
<s> During my time as President, through three separate  </s>
<s> Supreme Court appointments, in conversations with  </s>
<s> Republicans and Democrats alike, one name came up more  </s>
<s> than any other - Merrick Garland.  </s>
<s> I understand that we're in the middle of an especially  </s>
<s> noisy and volatile political season.  </s>
<s> But at a time when our politics are so polarized;  </s>
<s> when norms and customs of our political rhetoric seem  </s>
<s> to be corroding - this is precisely the time we should  </s>
<s> treat the appointment of a Supreme Court justice with  </s>
<s> the seriousness it deserves.  </s>
<s> Because our Supreme Court is supposed to be above  </s>
<s> politics, not an extension of politics.  </s>
<s> And it should stay that way.  </s>
<s> So I ask Republicans in the Senate to give Judge Garland  </s>
<s> the respect he has earned.  </s>
<s> Give him a hearing.  </s>
<s> Give him an up-or-down vote.  </s>
<s> To deny it would be an abdication of the Senate's  </s>
<s> Constitutional duty.  </s>
<s> It would indicate a process for nominating and  </s>
<s> confirming judges that is beyond repair.  </s>
<s> It would make it increasingly impossible for  </s>
<s> any President, Republican or Democrat, to carry out their  </s>
<s> Constitutional function.  </s>
<s> To go down that path would jeopardize our system of  </s>
<s> justice, it would hurt our democracy, and betray the  </s>
<s> vision of our founding.  </s>
<s> I fulfilled my Constitutional duty.  </s>
<s> Now it's time for Senators to do theirs.  </s>
<s> I hope that they take the time to reflect on the  </s>
<s> importance of this process to our country.  </s>
<s> I hope that they'll act fairly.  </s>
<s> And I hope they'll work in a bipartisan fashion to  </s>
<s> confirm Merrick Garland to the Supreme Court.  </s>
<s> That's how we can uphold our pledge to liberty and  </s>
<s> justice for all - for our time and for generations  </s>
<s> to come.  </s>
<s> Thanks everybody.  </s>
<s> Have a good weekend.  </s>

<s> The President: Leaders of the world's largest economies will gather next week  </s>
<s> in Pittsburgh for the second time this year.  </s>
<s> The first meeting of the G20 nations in April came at the  </s>
<s> height of the global financial crisis --  </s>
<s> a crisis that required unprecedented international  </s>
<s> cooperation to jumpstart the world's economies and help break  </s>
<s> the downward spiral that enveloped all our nations.  </s>
<s> At next week's summit, we'll have, in effect,  </s>
<s> a five-month checkup to review the steps each nation has taken  </s>
<s> -- separately and together -- to break the back of this  </s>
<s> economic crisis.  </s>
<s> And the good news is that we've made real progress since the  </s>
<s> last time we met -- here at home and around the world.  </s>
<s> In February, we enacted a Recovery Act,  </s>
<s> providing relief to Americans who need it, preventing layoffs,  </s>
<s> and putting Americans back to work.  </s>
<s> We've worked to unlock frozen credit markets,  </s>
<s> spurring lending to Americans looking to buy homes or cars,  </s>
<s> take out student loans, or finance small businesses.  </s>
<s> And we've challenged other nations to join us not only to  </s>
<s> spur global demand, but to address the underlying problems  </s>
<s> that caused such a deep global recession in the first place.  </s>
<s> Because of the steps taken by our nations and all nations,  </s>
<s> we can now say that we've stopped our economic freefall.  </s>
<s> But we also know that stopping the bleeding isn't  </s>
<s> nearly enough.  </s>
<s> Our work is far from over.  </s>
<s> We know we still have a lot to do here at home to build an  </s>
<s> economy that is producing good jobs for all those who are  </s>
<s> looking for work today.  </s>
<s> And we know we still have a lot to do,  </s>
<s> in conjunction with the nations around the world,  </s>
<s> to strengthen the rules governing financial markets and  </s>
<s> ensure that we never again find ourselves in the precarious  </s>
<s> situation we found ourselves in just one year ago.  </s>
<s> As I told leaders of our financial community in New York  </s>
