<s> breed complacency.  </s>
<s> To protect our economy and people from another market  </s>
<s> meltdown, our government needs to fundamentally reform the  </s>
<s> rules governing financial firms and markets to meet the  </s>
<s> challenges of the 21st century.  </s>
<s> We can't allow the thirst for reckless schemes that produce  </s>
<s> quick profits and fat executive bonuses to override the security  </s>
<s> of our entire financial system and leave taxpayers on the hook  </s>
<s> for cleaning up the mess.  </s>
<s> And as the world's largest economy, we must lead,  </s>
<s> not just by word, but by example,  </s>
<s> understanding that in the 21st century,  </s>
<s> financial crises know no borders.  </s>
<s> All of us need to act more responsibly on behalf of a  </s>
<s> better economic future.  </s>
<s> That's why, at next week's G20 summit,  </s>
<s> we'll discuss some of the steps that are required to safeguard  </s>
<s> our global financial system and close gaps in regulation around  </s>
<s> the world -- gaps that permitted the kinds of reckless  </s>
<s> risk-taking and irresponsibility that led to the crisis.  </s>
<s> And that's why I've called on Congress to put in place a  </s>
<s> series of tough, common-sense rules of the road that will  </s>
<s> protect consumers from abuse, let markets function fairly and  </s>
<s> freely, and help prevent a crisis like this from ever  </s>
<s> happening again.  </s>
<s> Central to these reforms is a new Consumer Financial  </s>
<s> Protection Agency.  </s>
<s> Part of what led to this crisis were not just decisions made on  </s>
<s> Wall Street, but also unsustainable mortgage loans  </s>
<s> made across the country.  </s>
<s> While many folks took on more than they knew they could  </s>
<s> afford, too often folks signed contracts they didn't fully  </s>
<s> understand offered by lenders who didn't always  </s>
<s> tell the truth.  </s>
<s> That's why we need clear rules, clearly enforced.  </s>
<s> And that's what this agency will do.  </s>
<s> Consumers shouldn't have to worry about loan contracts  </s>
<s> written to confuse, hidden fees attached to their mortgages,  </s>
<s> and financial penalties -- whether through a credit card or  </s>
<s> debit card -- that appear without a clear warning on  </s>
<s> their statements.  </s>
<s> And responsible lenders, including community banks,  </s>
<s> trying to do the right thing shouldn't have to worry about  </s>
<s> ruinous competition from unregulated and unscrupulous competitors.  </s>
<s> Not surprisingly, lobbyists for big Wall Street banks are hard  </s>
<s> at work trying to stop reforms that would hold them accountable  </s>
<s> and they want to keep things just the way they are.  </s>
<s> But we can't let politics as usual triumph so business as  </s>
<s> usual can reign.  </s>
<s> We can't let the narrow interests of a few come before  </s>
<s> the interests of all of us.  </s>
<s> We can't forget how close we came to the brink,  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> Five years ago, after the worst financial crisis in decades,  </s>
<s> we passed historic Wall Street reform to end the era of  </s>
<s> bailouts and too big to fail.  </s>
<s> As part that reform, we created an independent Consumer  </s>
<s> Financial Protection Bureau with one mission: to protect American  </s>
<s> consumers from some of the worst practices of the  </s>
<s> financial industry.  </s>
<s> They've already put $5 billion back in the pockets of more than  </s>
<s> 15 million families.  </s>
<s> And this week, they took an important first step towards  </s>
<s> cracking down on some of the most abusive practices involving  </s>
<s> payday loans.  </s>
<s> Millions of Americans take out these loans every year.  </s>
<s> In Alabama, where I visited this week,  </s>
<s> there are four times as many payday lending stores as there  </s>
<s> are McDonald's.  </s>
<s> But while payday loans might seem like easy money,  </s>
<s> folks often end up trapped in a cycle of debt.  </s>
<s> If you take out a $500 loan, it's easy to wind up paying more  </s>
<s> than $1,000 in interest and fees.  </s>
<s> The step the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau announced this  </s>
<s> week is designed to change that.  </s>
<s> The idea is pretty common sense: if you're a payday lender  </s>
<s> preparing to give a loan, you should make sure that the  </s>
<s> borrower can afford to pay it back first.  </s>
<s> As Americans, we believe there's nothing wrong with making  </s>
<s> a profit.  </s>
<s> But there is something wrong with making that profit by  </s>
<s> trapping hard-working men and women in a vicious cycle  </s>
<s> of debt.  </s>
<s> Protecting working Americans' paychecks shouldn't be a  </s>
<s> partisan issue.  </s>
<s> But the budget Republicans unveiled last week would make it  </s>
<s> harder, not easier, to crack down on financial fraud  </s>
<s> and abuse.  </s>
<s> And this week, when Republicans rolled out their next economic  </s>
<s> idea, it had nothing to do with the middle class.  </s>
<s> It was a new, more-than-$250 billion tax cut for the top  </s>
<s> one-tenth of the top one percent of Americans.  </s>
<s> That would mean handing out an average tax cut of $4 million a  </s>
<s> year to just 4,000 Americans per year,  </s>
<s> and leaving the rest of the country to pay for it.  </s>
<s> I don't think our top economic priority should be helping a  </s>
<s> tiny number of Americans who are already doing extraordinarily  </s>
<s> well, and asking everybody else to foot the bill.  </s>
<s> I think our top priority should be helping everybody who works  </s>
<s> hard get ahead.  </s>
<s> This country does best when everyone gets their fair shot,  </s>
<s> everyone does their fair share, and everyone plays by the same  </s>
<s> set of rules.  </s>
<s> That's what middle-class economics is all about,  </s>
<s> and as long as I'm your President,  </s>
<s> that's what I'll keep on fighting to do.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> It's now been four years since a crisis that began on Wall Street  </s>
<s> spread to Main Street, hammering middle-class families and  </s>
<s> ultimately costing our economy 9 million jobs.  </s>
<s> Since then, we've fought our way back.  </s>
<s> Our businesses have added more than 5 million new jobs.  </s>
<s> The unemployment rate has fallen to the lowest level since I  </s>
<s> took office.  </s>
<s> Home values are rising again.  </s>
<s> And our assembly lines are humming once more.  </s>
<s> And to make sure America never goes through a crisis like that  </s>
<s> again, we passed tough new Wall Street reform to end  </s>
<s> taxpayer-funded bailouts for good.  </s>
<s> Wall Street reform also created the first-ever independent  </s>
<s> consumer watchdog, whose sole job is to look out for you.  </s>
<s> That means making sure you've got all the information you need  </s>
<s> to make important financial decisions like buying a home or  </s>
<s> paying for college.  </s>
<s> And it means going after anyone who tries to take advantage of  </s>
<s> you, or rip you off.  </s>
<s> Starting this month, that includes the folks who come up  </s>
<s> with your credit score.  </s>
<s> If you haven't checked out your credit score  </s>
<s> recently, you should.  </s>
<s> It can have a major impact on your life.  </s>
<s> It can determine whether or not you qualify for a loan or what  </s>
<s> kind of interest you have to pay.  </s>
<s> It can even affect your chances of renting an apartment or  </s>
<s> getting a job.  </s>
<s> But here's the thing: the companies that put your credit  </s>
<s> score together can make mistakes.  </s>
<s> They may think you had a loan or a credit card that was  </s>
<s> never yours.  </s>
<s> They may think you were late making a payment when you  </s>
<s> were on time.  </s>
<s> And when they mess up, you're the one who suffers.  </s>
<s> Until this week, if you had a complaint,  </s>
<s> you took it to the company.  </s>
<s> Sometimes they listened.  </s>
<s> Sometimes they didn't.  </s>
<s> But that was pretty much it.  </s>
<s> They were your only real hope.  </s>
<s> Well, not anymore.  </s>
<s> If you have a complaint about your credit score that hasn't  </s>
<s> been properly addressed, you can go to  </s>
<s> ConsumerFinance.gov/complaint and let the consumer  </s>
<s> watchdog know.  </s>
<s> Not only will they bring your complaint directly to the  </s>
<s> company in question, they'll give you a tracking number,  </s>
<s> so you can check back and see exactly what's being done on  </s>
<s> your behalf.  </s>
<s> And fixing your credit score isn't the only thing they  </s>
<s> can help with.  </s>
<s> If you're opening a bank account,  </s>
<s> trying to get a student loan, or applying for a credit card and  </s>
<s> something doesn't seem right, you can let them know and  </s>
<s> they'll check it out.  </s>
<s> If you're looking to buy a home, and you want to know if you're  </s>
<s> getting a fair deal on your mortgage,  </s>
<s> you can give them a call and they'll get you an answer.  </s>
<s> Their only mission is to fight for you.  </s>
<s> And when needed, they'll take action.  </s>
<s> For example, alongside other regulators,  </s>
<s> they recently ordered three big credit card companies to return  </s>
<s> more than $400 million to folks who were deceived or misled into  </s>
<s> buying things they didn't want or didn't understand.  </s>
<s> That's what Wall Street reform is all about --  </s>
<s> looking out for working families and making sure that everyone is  </s>
<s> playing by the same rules.  </s>
<s> Sadly, that hasn't been enough to stop Republicans in Congress  </s>

<s> The President: This week, together with our allies  </s>
<s> and partners, partners, we reached an historic  </s>
<s> understanding with Iran, which, if fully implemented,  </s>
<s> will prevent it from obtaining a nuclear weapon and make  </s>
<s> our country, our allies, and our world safer.  </s>
<s> This framework is the result of tough,  </s>
<s> principled diplomacy.  </s>
<s> It's a good deal -- a deal that meets our core  </s>
<s> objectives, including strict limitations  </s>
<s> on Iran's program and cutting off every pathway that  </s>
<s> Iran could take to develop a nuclear weapon.  </s>
<s> This deal denies Iran the plutonium necessary  </s>
<s> to build a bomb.  </s>
<s> It shuts down Iran's path to a bomb using  </s>
<s> enriched uranium.  </s>
<s> Iran has agreed that it will not stockpile  </s>
<s> the materials needed to build a weapon.  </s>
<s> Moreover, international inspectors will have  </s>
<s> unprecedented access to Iran's nuclear program  </s>
<s> because Iran will face more inspections than  </s>
<s> any other country in the world.  </s>
<s> If Iran cheats, the world will know it.  </s>
<s> If we see something suspicious,  </s>
<s> we will inspect it.  </s>
<s> So this deal is not based on trust, it's based  </s>
<s> on unprecedented verification.  </s>
<s> And this is a long-term deal, with strict limits  </s>
<s> on Iran's program for more than a decade and  </s>
<s> unprecedented transparency measures that will last  </s>
<s> for 20 years or more.  </s>
<s> And as a member of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation  </s>
<s> Treaty, Iran will never be permitted to develop  </s>
<s> a nuclear weapon.  </s>
<s> In return for Iran's actions, the international  </s>
<s> community, including the United States, has agreed  </s>
<s> to provide Iran with phased relief from  </s>
<s> certain sanctions.  </s>
<s> If Iran violates the deal, sanctions  </s>
<s> can be snapped back into place.  </s>
<s> Meanwhile, other American sanctions  </s>
<s> on Iran for its support of terrorism, its human rights  </s>
<s> abuses, its ballistic missile program, all will continue  </s>
<s> to be enforced.  </s>
<s> As I said this week, many key details will need  </s>
<s> to be finalized over the next three months,  </s>
<s> and nothing is agreed to until everything is agreed.  </s>
<s> And if there is backsliding, there  </s>
<s> will be no deal.  </s>
<s> Here in the United States, I expect a robust debate.  </s>
<s> We'll keep Congress and the American people fully  </s>
<s> briefed on the substance of the deal.  </s>
<s> As we engage in this debate, let's remember-we  </s>
<s> really only have three options for dealing with  </s>
<s> Iran's nuclear program: bombing Iran's nuclear  </s>
<s> facilities-which will only set its program back  </s>
<s> a few years-while starting another war in the  </s>
<s> Middle East; abandoning negotiations and hoping  </s>
<s> for the best with sanctions-even though  </s>
<s> that's always led to Iran making more progress  </s>
<s> in its nuclear program; or a robust and verifiable  </s>
<s> deal like this one that peacefully prevents Iran  </s>
<s> from obtaining a nuclear weapon.  </s>
<s> As President and Commander in Chief, I firmly believe  </s>
<s> that the diplomatic option-a comprehensive,  </s>
<s> long-term deal like this-is by far the  </s>
<s> best option.  </s>
<s> For the United States.  </s>
<s> For our allies.  </s>
<s> And for the world.  </s>
<s> Our work -- this deal -- is not yet done.  </s>
<s> Diplomacy is painstaking work.  </s>
<s> Success is not guaranteed.  </s>
<s> But today we have an historic opportunity  </s>
<s> to prevent the spread of nuclear weapons in Iran,  </s>
<s> and to do so peacefully, with the international  </s>
<s> community firmly behind us.  </s>
<s> And this will be our work in the days and months  </s>
<s> ahead in keeping with the best traditions of  </s>
<s> American leadership.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> The right to vote is one of the most fundamental rights  </s>
<s> of any democracy.  </s>
<s> Yet for too long, too many of our fellow citizens were  </s>
<s> denied that right, simply because of the color of  </s>
<s> their skin.  </s>
<s> Fifty years ago this week, President Lyndon Johnson  </s>
<s> signed a law to change that.  </s>
<s> The Voting Rights Act broke down legal barriers that  </s>
<s> stood between millions of African Americans and their  </s>
<s> constitutional right to cast ballot.  </s>
<s> It was, and still is, one of the greatest victories in  </s>
<s> our country's struggle for civil rights.  </s>
<s> But it didn't happen overnight.  </s>
<s> Countless men and women marched and organized, sat  </s>
<s> in and stood up, for our most basic rights.  </s>
<s> For this they were called agitators and un-American,  </s>
<s> they were jailed and beaten.  </s>
<s> Some were even killed.  </s>
<s> But in the end, they reaffirmed the idea at the  </s>
<s> very heart of America: that people who love this country  </s>
<s> can change it.  </s>
<s> Our country is a better place because of all those  </s>
<s> heroes did for us.  </s>
<s> But as one of those heroes, Congressman John Lewis,  </s>
<s> reminded us in Selma this past March, "There's still  </s>
<s> work to be done."  </s>
<s> Fifty years after the Voting Rights Act, there are still  </s>
<s> too many barriers to vote, and too many people trying  </s>
<s> to erect new ones.  </s>
<s> We've seen laws that roll back early voting, force  </s>
<s> people to jump through hoops to cast a ballot, or lead to  </s>
<s> legitimate voters being improperly purged  </s>
<s> from the rolls.  </s>
<s> Over the years, we have seen provisions specifically  </s>
<s> designed to make it harder for some of our fellow  </s>
<s> citizens to vote.  </s>
<s> In a democracy like ours, with a history like ours,  </s>
<s> that's a disgrace.  </s>
<s> That's why, as we celebrate the 50th Anniversary of the  </s>
<s> Voting Rights Act, I'm calling on Congress to pass  </s>
<s> new legislation to make sure every American has equal  </s>
<s> access to the polls.  </s>
<s> It's why I support the organizers getting folks  </s>
<s> registered in their communities.  </s>
<s> And it's why, no matter what party you support, my  </s>
<s> message to every American is simple: get out there and  </s>
<s> vote - not just every four years, but every chance you get.  </s>
<s> Because your elected officials will only heed  </s>
<s> your voice if you make your voice heard.  </s>
<s> The promise that all of us are created equal is written  </s>
<s> into our founding documents - but it's up to us to make  </s>
<s> that promise real.  </s>

<s> let's keep marching forward, keep perfecting our union,  </s>
<s> and keep building a better country for our kids.  </s>

<s> The President: This week, I've been traveling across our country to discuss  </s>
<s> health insurance reform and to hear directly from folks like  </s>
<s> you -- your questions, your concerns, and your stories.  </s>
<s> Now, I know there's been a lot of attention paid to some of the  </s>
<s> town hall meetings that are going on around the country --  </s>
<s> especially those where tempers have flared.  </s>
<s> You know how TV loves a ruckus.  </s>
<s> But what you haven't seen -- because it's not as exciting --  </s>
<s> are the many constructive meetings going on all over the  </s>
<s> country where Americans are airing their hopes and concerns  </s>
<s> about this very important issue.  </s>
<s> I've been holding some of my own,  </s>
<s> and the stories I've heard have really underscored why I believe  </s>
<s> so strongly that health insurance reform is a challenge  </s>
<s> we can't ignore.  </s>
<s> They're stories like Lori Hitchcock's,  </s>
<s> who I met in New Hampshire this week.  </s>
<s> Lori's got a pre-existing condition,  </s>
<s> so no insurance company will cover her.  </s>
<s> She's self-employed, and in this economy,  </s>
<s> she can't find a job that offers health care --  </s>
<s> so she's been uninsured for two years.  </s>
<s> Or they're stories like Katie Gibson's, who I met in Montana.  </s>
<s> When Katie tried to change insurance companies,  </s>
<s> she was sure to list her pre-existing conditions on the  </s>
<s> application and even called her new company to confirm she'd  </s>
<s> be covered.  </s>
<s> Two months later, she was dropped --  </s>
<s> after she'd already gone off her other insurance.  </s>
<s> These are stories that aren't being told --  </s>
<s> stories of a health care system that works better for the  </s>
<s> insurance industry than it does for the American people.  </s>
<s> And that's why we are going to pass health insurance reform  </s>
<s> that finally holds the insurance companies accountable.  </s>
<s> But now's the hard part.  </s>
<s> Because the history is clear -- every time we come close to  </s>
<s> passing health insurance reform, the special interests with a  </s>
<s> stake in the status quo use their influence and political  </s>
<s> allies to scare and mislead the American people.  </s>
<s> As an example, let's look at one of the scarier-sounding and more  </s>
<s> ridiculous rumors out there -- that so-called "death panels"  </s>
<s> would decide whether senior citizens get to live or die.  </s>
<s> That rumor began with the distortion of one idea in a  </s>
<s> Congressional bill that would allow Medicare to cover  </s>
<s> voluntary visits with your doctor to discuss your  </s>
<s> end-of-life care -- if and only if you decide to have  </s>
<s> those visits.  </s>
<s> It had nothing to do with putting government in control of  </s>
<s> your decisions; in fact, it would give you all the  </s>
<s> information you need -- if you want it --  </s>
<s> to put you in control of your decisions.  </s>
<s> When a conservative Republican Senator who supported this idea  </s>
<s> -- in fact, had long-fought for even more far-reaching proposals  </s>
<s> -- found out how folks were twisting the idea,  </s>
<s> he called their misrepresentation --  </s>
<s> and I quote -- "nuts."  </s>
<s> So when folks with a stake in the status quo keep inventing  </s>
<s> these boogeymen in an effort to scare people,  </s>
<s> it's disappointing -- but it's not surprising.  </s>
<s> We've seen it before.  </s>
<s> When President Roosevelt was working to create Social  </s>
<s> Security, opponents warned it would open the door to "federal  </s>
<s> snooping" and force Americans to wear dog tags.  </s>
<s> When President Kennedy and President Johnson were working  </s>
<s> to create Medicare, opponents warned of "socialized medicine."  </s>
<s> Sound familiar?  </s>
<s> Not only were those fears never realized, but more importantly,  </s>
<s> those programs have saved the lives of tens of millions of  </s>
<s> seniors, the disabled, and the disadvantaged.  </s>
<s> Those who would stand in the way of reform will say almost  </s>
<s> anything to scare you about the cost of action.  </s>
<s> But they won't say much about the cost of inaction.  </s>
<s> If you're worried about rationed care, higher costs,  </s>
<s> denied coverage, or bureaucrats getting between you and your  </s>
<s> doctor, then you should know that that's what's  </s>
<s> happening right now.  </s>
<s> In the past three years, over 12 million Americans were  </s>
<s> discriminated against by insurance companies due to a  </s>
<s> preexisting condition, or saw their coverage denied or dropped  </s>
<s> just when they got sick and needed it most.  </s>
<s> Americans whose jobs and health care are secure today just don't  </s>
<s> know if they'll be next to join the 14,000 who lose their health  </s>
<s> insurance every single day.  </s>
<s> And if we don't act, average family premiums will keep rising  </s>
<s> to more than $22,000 within a decade.  </s>
<s> On the other hand, here's what a reformed health care system will  </s>
<s> mean for you.  </s>
<s> First, no matter what you've heard,  </s>
<s> if you like the doctor or the health care plan you have,  </s>
<s> you can keep it.  </s>
<s> If you don't have insurance, you'll finally be able to  </s>
<s> afford insurance.  </s>
<s> And everyone will have the security and stability that's  </s>
<s> missing today.  </s>
<s> Insurance companies will be prohibited from denying you  </s>
<s> coverage because of your medical history,  </s>
<s> dropping your coverage if you get sick,  </s>
<s> or watering down your coverage when it counts --  </s>
<s> because there's no point in having health insurance if it's  </s>
<s> not there when you need it.  </s>
<s> Insurance companies will no longer be able to place some  </s>
<s> arbitrary cap on the amount of coverage you can receive in a  </s>
<s> given year or a lifetime, and we will place a limit on how much  </s>
<s> you can be charged for out-of-pocket expenses --  </s>
<s> because no one in America should go broke just because  </s>
<s> they get sick.  </s>
<s> Finally, we'll require insurance companies to cover routine  </s>
<s> checkups and preventive care, like mammograms and  </s>
<s> colonoscopies -- because there's no reason we shouldn't be saving  </s>
<s> lives and dollars by catching diseases like breast cancer and  </s>
<s> prostate cancer on the front end.  </s>
<s> So that's what reform means.  </s>
<s> For all the chatter and the noise out there,  </s>
<s> what every American needs to know is this: If you don't have  </s>
<s> health insurance, you will finally have quality,  </s>
<s> affordable options once we pass reform.  </s>
<s> If you do have health insurance, we will make sure that no  </s>
<s> insurance company or government bureaucrat gets between you and  </s>
<s> the care that you need.  </s>
<s> And we will deliver this in a fiscally responsible way.  </s>
<s> Now, I know there's plenty of real concern and  </s>
<s> skepticism out there.  </s>
<s> I know that in a time of economic upheaval,  </s>
<s> the idea of change can be unsettling,  </s>
<s> and I know that there are folks who believe that government  </s>
<s> should have no role at all in solving our problems.  </s>
<s> These are legitimate differences worthy of the real discussion  </s>
<s> that America deserves -- one where we lower our voices,  </s>
<s> listen to one another, and talk about differences that  </s>
<s> really exist.  </s>
<s> Because while there may be disagreements over how to go  </s>
<s> about it, there is widespread agreement on the urgent need to  </s>
<s> reform a broken system and finally hold insurance  </s>
<s> companies accountable.  </s>
<s> Nearly 50 years ago, in the midst of the noisy early battles  </s>
<s> to create what would become Medicare,  </s>
<s> President Kennedy said, "I refuse to see us live on the  </s>
<s> accomplishments of another generation.  </s>
<s> I refuse to see this country, and all of us,  </s>
<s> shrink from these struggles which are our responsibility  </s>
<s> in our time."  </s>
<s> Now it falls to us to meet the challenges of our time.  </s>
<s> And if we can come together, and listen to one another;  </s>
<s> I believe, as I always have, that we will rise to this  </s>
<s> moment, we will build something better for our children,  </s>
<s> and we will secure America's future in this new century.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>

<s> Today, here's the three-minute version.  </s>
<s> After four years of economic growth with eight million new  </s>
<s> private sector jobs, our unemployment rate is the lowest  </s>
<s> it's been in more than five years.  </s>
<s> And with the economy speeding up,  </s>
<s> companies say they intend to hire more people this year.  </s>
<s> But while those at the top are doing better than ever,  </s>
<s> average wages have barely budged.  </s>
<s> Inequality has deepened.  </s>
<s> Too many Americans are working harder and harder  </s>
<s> just to get by.  </s>
<s> And too many still aren't working at all.  </s>
<s> Our job is to reverse those trends.  </s>
<s> It's time to restore opportunity for all people - the idea that  </s>
<s> no matter who you are, if you work hard and live up to your  </s>
<s> responsibilities, you can make it if you try.  </s>
<s> The opportunity agenda I laid out on Tuesday has four parts.  </s>
<s> This week, I took them on the road.  </s>
<s> Job one is more new jobs: jobs in construction  </s>
<s> and manufacturing, jobs in innovation and energy.  </s>
<s> In Wisconsin, I talked with plant workers at GE about  </s>
<s> part two: training more Americans with the skills  </s>
<s> to fill those new jobs.  </s>
<s> In Tennessee, I talked with students about part three:  </s>
<s> guaranteeing every child access to a world-class education,  </s>
<s> from early childhood, through college,  </s>
<s> and right into a career.  </s>
<s> And with steelworkers in Pittsburgh,  </s>
<s> and retail workers in Maryland, I laid out part four:  </s>
<s> making sure hard work pays off for men and women,  </s>
<s> with wages you can live on, savings you can retire on,  </s>
<s> and health insurance that's there for you when you need it.  </s>
<s> These ideas will strengthen the middle class and help more  </s>
<s> people work their way into the middle class.  </s>
<s> Some of them will require Congress.  </s>
<s> But wherever I can take steps to expand opportunity for more  </s>
<s> families on my own, I will.  </s>
<s> I'm going to ask business leaders, education leaders,  </s>
<s> and philanthropic leaders to partner with  </s>
<s> us to advance these goals.  </s>
<s> And every single day, I'm going to fight for these priorities -  </s>
<s> to shift the odds back in favor of more working and middle-class  </s>
<s> families, and to keep America a place where you can always make  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> In this year of action, I'm doing everything  </s>
<s> I can, with or without Congress, to expand  </s>
<s> opportunity for more Americans.  </s>
<s> This week, I ordered a review of our nation's  </s>
<s> overtime rules, to give more Americans the chance  </s>
<s> to earn the overtime pay they've worked for.  </s>
<s> Here's why this matters.  </s>
<s> Our businesses have created 8.7 million  </s>
<s> new jobs over the past four years.  </s>
<s> But in many ways, the trends that have battered  </s>
<s> the middle class for decades  </s>
<s> have grown even starker.  </s>
<s> While those at the top are doing better than ever,  </s>
<s> average wages have barely budged.  </s>
<s> Too many Americans are working harder than ever  </s>
<s> just to keep up.  </s>
<s> We've got to build an economy that works  </s>
<s> for everybody, not just a fortunate few.  </s>
<s> We know from our history that our economy grows  </s>
<s> best from the middle out, when growth  </s>
<s> is more widely shared.  </s>
<s> So we've got to restore opportunity  </s>
<s> for all - the idea that with hard work and responsibility,  </s>
<s> you can get ahead.  </s>
<s> Now, for more than 75 years,  </s>
<s> the 40-hour workweek and the overtime protections  </s>
<s> that come with it have helped countless  </s>
<s> workers climb the ladder of success.  </s>
<s> But today, an overtime exception originally meant  </s>
<s> for highly-paid employees now applies to workers who  </s>
<s> earn as little as $23,660 a year.  </s>
<s> It doesn't matter if you do mostly physical labor,  </s>
<s> or if you work 50, 60, even 70 hours a week.  </s>
<s> Your employer may not have  </s>
<s> to pay you a single extra dime.  </s>
<s> In some cases, this rule makes it possible for  </s>
<s> workers earning a salary to actually be paid less  </s>
<s> than the minimum wage.  </s>
<s> And it means that business owners who treat their  </s>
<s> employees fairly can be undercut  </s>
<s> by competitors who don't.  </s>
<s> That's not right.  </s>
<s> So we're going to update those overtime rules  </s>
<s> to restore that basic principle that if you have  </s>
<s> to work more, you should be able to earn more.  </s>
<s> And we'll do it by consulting workers  </s>
<s> and businesses, and simplifying the system  </s>
<s> so it's easier for everyone.  </s>
<s> Americans have spent too long working more and  </s>

<s> The President: I'm speaking to you from Caminada Bay in Grand Isle,  </s>
<s> Louisiana, one of the first places to feel the devastation  </s>
<s> wrought by the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.  </s>
<s> While I was here, at Camerdelle's Live Bait shop,  </s>
<s> I met with a group of local residents and small business owners.  </s>
<s> Folks like Floyd Lasseigne, a fourth-generation oyster fisherman.  </s>
<s> This is the time of year when he ordinarily earns a lot of his income.  </s>
<s> But his oyster bed, along the north side of Grand Isle,  </s>
<s> has likely been destroyed by the spill.  </s>
<s> Terry Vegas has a similar story.  </s>
<s> He quit the 8th grade to become a shrimper with his grandfather.  </s>
<s> Ever since, he's earned his living during shrimping season  </s>
<s> -- working long, grueling days so that he could earn enough  </s>
<s> money to support himself year round.  </s>
<s> But today, the waters where he's spent his years are closed.  </s>
<s> And every day, as the spill worsens,  </s>
<s> he loses hope that he'll be able to return to the life he built.  </s>
<s> "You can put a price on a lost season," he's said.  </s>
<s> "But not a lost heritage."  </s>
<s> The effects of the spill reach beyond the shoreline.  </s>
<s> I spoke with Patti Rigaud.  </s>
<s> For 30 years, she's owned a small convenience store --  </s>
<s> a store opened by her father.  </s>
<s> She depends on the sales generated by tourism each summer.  </s>
<s> But this year, most of the boats that would line these docks are  </s>
<s> nowhere to be seen.  </s>
<s> Dudley Gaspard, who owns the Sand Dollar Marina and Hotel,  </s>
<s> has been hit hard as well.  </s>
<s> Normally, this time of year, rooms are filling up and tackle  </s>
<s> is flying off the shelves.  </s>

<s> the suspension of fishing in the waters off the Louisiana Coast.  </s>

<s> throughout the Gulf region.  </s>
<s> Often families have been here for generations,  </s>
<s> earning a living, and making a life,  </s>
<s> that's tied to the water -- that's tied to the magnificent  </s>
<s> coasts and the natural bounty of this place.  </s>
<s> Here, this spill has not just damaged livelihoods.  </s>
<s> It's upended whole communities.  </s>
<s> And the fury people feel is not just about the money they've lost.  </s>
<s> They've been through tough times before.  </s>
<s> It's about the wrenching recognition that this time their  </s>
<s> lives may never be the same.  </s>
<s> These folks work hard.  </s>
<s> They meet their responsibilities.  </s>
<s> But now because of a manmade catastrophe --  </s>
<s> one that's not their fault and beyond their control --  </s>
<s> their lives have been thrown into turmoil.  </s>
<s> It's brutally unfair.  </s>
<s> It's wrong.  </s>
<s> And what I told these men and women --  </s>
<s> and what I have said since the beginning of this disaster --  </s>
<s> is that I'm going to stand with the people of the Gulf Coast  </s>
<s> until they are made whole.  </s>
<s> That's why from the beginning, we mobilized on every front to  </s>
<s> contain and clean up this spill.  </s>
<s> I've authorized the deployment of 17,000 National Guard troops  </s>
<s> to aid in the response.  </s>
<s> More than 20,000 people are currently working around the  </s>
<s> clock to protect waters and coastlines.  </s>
<s> We've convened hundreds of top scientists and engineers from  </s>
<s> around the world.  </s>
<s> More than 1,900 vessels are in the Gulf assisting in the clean up.  </s>
<s> And more than 4.3 million feet of boom have been deployed with  </s>
<s> another 2.9 million feet of boom available --  </s>
<s> enough to stretch over 1,300 miles.  </s>
<s> 17 staging areas are in place across Louisiana, Mississippi,  </s>
<s> Alabama, and Florida to rapidly defend sensitive shorelines.  </s>
<s> In short, this is the largest response to an environmental  </s>
<s> disaster of its kind in the history of the country.  </s>
<s> We've also ordered BP to pay economic injury claims,  </s>
<s> and we will make sure they pay every single dime owed to the  </s>
<s> people along the Gulf Coast.  </s>
<s> The Small Business Administration has stepped in to  </s>
<s> help businesses by approving loans and allowing deferrals of  </s>
<s> existing loan payments.  </s>
<s> And this week, the federal government sent BP a preliminary  </s>
<s> bill for $69 million to pay back American taxpayers for some of  </s>
<s> the costs of the response so far.  </s>
<s> In addition, after an emergency safety review,  </s>
<s> we're putting in place aggressive new operating  </s>
<s> standards for offshore drilling.  </s>
<s> And I've appointed a bipartisan commission to look into the  </s>
<s> causes of this spill.  </s>
<s> If laws are inadequate -- laws will be changed.  </s>
<s> If oversight was lacking -- it will be strengthened.  </s>
<s> And if laws were broken -- those responsible will be brought to justice.  </s>
<s> Now, over the last few days BP has placed a cap over the well,  </s>
<s> and it appears they're making some progress in trying to pump  </s>
<s> oil to the surface to keep it from leaking into the water.  </s>
<s> But has -- has been the case since the beginning of this  </s>
<s> crisis, we're prepared for the worst,  </s>
<s> even if we hope that BP's efforts bring better news  </s>
<s> than we've received before.  </s>
<s> We also know that regardless of the outcome of this attempt,  </s>
<s> there will still to be some slippage until the relief wells  </s>
<s> are completed.  </s>
<s> And there will continue to be a massive cleanup ahead of us.  </s>
<s> These are hard times in Louisiana and across the Gulf  </s>
<s> Coast, an area that's seen more than its fair share of trouble.  </s>
<s> But what I've seen are communities absolutely  </s>
<s> determined to fight through this disaster as they have before,  </s>
<s> to preserve not just a way to make a living but a way of life.  </s>
<s> And we will fight alongside them,  </s>
<s> until the awful damage that has been done is reversed,  </s>
<s> people are back on their feet, and the great natural bounty of  </s>
<s> the Gulf Coast is restored.  </s>

<s> President Obama: It has now been more than a week since the  </s>
<s> attempted act of terrorism aboard that flight to Detroit on Christmas Day. On Thursday,  </s>
<s> I received the preliminary findings of the reviews that I ordered into our terrorist  </s>
<s> watchlist system and air travel screening. I've directed my counterterrorism and homeland  </s>
<s> security advisor at the White House, John Brennan, to lead these reviews going forward  </s>
<s> and to present the final results and recommendations to me in the days to come. As I said this  </s>
<s> week, I will do everything in my power to make sure our hard-working men and women in  </s>
<s> our intelligence, law enforcement and homeland security communities have the tools and resources  </s>
<s> they need to keep America safe. This includes making sure these communities, and the people  </s>
<s> in them, are coordinating effectively and are held accountable at every level. And as  </s>
<s> President, that is what I will do. Meanwhile, the investigation into the Christmas Day incident  </s>
<s> continues, and we're learning more about the suspect. We know that he traveled to Yemen,  </s>
<s> a country grappling with crushing poverty and deadly insurgencies. It appears that he  </s>
<s> joined an affiliate of al Qaeda, and that this group, al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula, trained  </s>
<s> him, equipped him with those explosives and directed him to attack that plane headed for  </s>
<s> America. This is not the first time this group has targeted us. In recent years, they have  </s>
<s> bombed Yemeni government facilities and Western hotels, restaurants and embassies; including  </s>
<s> our embassy in 2008, killing one American. So, as President, I've made it a priority  </s>
<s> to strengthen our partnership with the Yemeni government -- training and equipping their  </s>
<s> security forces, sharing intelligence and working with them to strike al Qaeda terrorists.  </s>
<s> And even before Christmas Day, we had seen the results. Training camps have been struck;  </s>
<s> leaders eliminated; plots disrupted. And all those involved in the attempted act of terrorism  </s>
<s> on Christmas must know -- you too will be held to account. But these efforts are only part  </s>
<s> of a wider cause. It's been nearly a year since I stood on the steps of the U.S. Capitol  </s>
<s> and took the oath of office as your President. And with that oath came the solemn responsibility  </s>
<s> that I carry with me every moment of every day, the responsibility to protect the safety  </s>
<s> and security of the American people. On that day I also made it very clear, our nation  </s>
<s> is at war against a far-reaching network of violence and hatred, and that we will do whatever  </s>
<s> it takes to defeat them and defend our country, even as we uphold the values that have always  </s>
<s> distinguished America among nations. And make no mistake, that's exactly what we've  </s>
<s> been doing. It's why I refocused the fight, bringing to a responsible end the war in Iraq, which  </s>
<s> had nothing to do with the 9/11 attacks, and dramatically increasing our resources in the  </s>
<s> region where al Qaeda is actually based, in Afghanistan and Pakistan. It's why I've  </s>
<s> set a clear and achievable mission to disrupt, dismantle and defeat al Qaeda and its extremist  </s>
<s> allies and prevent their return to either country. And it's why we've forged new  </s>
<s> partnerships, as in Yemen, and put unrelenting pressure on these extremists wherever they  </s>
<s> plot and train, from East Africa to Southeast Asia, from Europe to the Persian Gulf. And  </s>
<s> though often out of sight, our progress has been unmistakable. Along with our partners,  </s>
<s> we've disrupted terrorist financing, cut off recruiting chains, inflicted major losses  </s>
<s> on al Qaeda's leadership, thwarted plots here in the United States, and saved countless  </s>
<s> American lives. Yet as the Christmas Day attempt illustrates, and as we were reminded this  </s>
<s> week by the sacrifices of more brave Americans in Afghanistan—including those seven dedicated  </s>
<s> men and women of the CIA, the hard work of protecting our nation is never done. So as  </s>
<s> our reviews continue, let us ask the questions that need to be asked. Let us make the changes  </s>
<s> that need to be made. Let us debate the best way to protect the country we all love. That  </s>
<s> is the right and responsibility of every American and every elected official. But as we go forward,  </s>
<s> let us remember this, our adversaries are those who would attack our country, not our  </s>
<s> fellow Americans, not each other. Let's never forget what has always carried us through  </s>
<s> times of trial, including those attacks eight Septembers ago. Instead of giving in to fear  </s>
<s> and cynicism, let's renew that timeless American spirit of resolve and confidence  </s>
<s> and optimism. Instead of succumbing to partisanship and division, let's summon the unity that  </s>

<s> a dad in your life,  </s>
<s> because I grew up without my father around.  </s>
<s> I felt the weight of his absence.  </s>
<s> So for Michelle and our girls, I try every  </s>
<s> day to be the husband and father my family didn't  </s>
<s> have when I was young.  </s>

<s> to get more involved in their children's lives,  </s>

<s> to have a child - it's the courage to raise one.  </s>

<s> I've met with a lot of young people who don't have  </s>
<s> a father figure around.  </s>
<s> And while there's nothing that can replace a parent,  </s>
<s> any of us can do our part to be a mentor, a sounding  </s>

<s> called My Brother's Keeper - an all-hands-on-deck  </s>

<s> men reach their full potential.  </s>

<s> in a young person's life.  </s>

<s> or mentor is a choice that we, as individuals,  </s>
<s> have to make.  </s>

<s> The President: Back in January, in my State of the Union Address,  </s>
<s> I warned of the danger posed by a Supreme Court ruling called  </s>
<s> Citizens United.  </s>
<s> This decision overturned decades of law and precedent.  </s>
<s> It gave the special interests the power to spend without limit  </s>
<s> -- and without public disclosure --  </s>
<s> to run ads in order to influence elections.  </s>
<s> Now, as an election approaches, it's not just a theory.  </s>
<s> We can see for ourselves how destructive to our democracy  </s>
<s> this can become.  </s>
<s> We've seen it in the flood of deceptive attack ads sponsored  </s>
<s> by special interests using front groups with misleading names.  </s>
<s> We don't know who's behind these ads or who's paying for them.  </s>
<s> Even foreign-controlled corporations seeking to  </s>
<s> influence our democracy are able to spend freely in order to  </s>
<s> swing an election toward a candidate they prefer.  </s>
<s> We've tried to fix this with a new law --  </s>
<s> one that would simply require that you say who you are and  </s>
<s> who's paying for your ad.  </s>
<s> This way, voters are able to make an informed judgment about  </s>
<s> a group's motivations.  </s>
<s> Anyone running these ads would have to stand by their claims.  </s>
<s> And foreign-controlled corporations would be restricted  </s>
<s> from spending money to influence elections,  </s>
<s> just as they were before the Supreme Court opened up this loophole.  </s>
<s> This is common sense.  </s>
<s> In fact, this is the kind of proposal that Democrats and  </s>
<s> Republicans have agreed on for decades.  </s>
<s> Yet, the Republican leaders in Congress have so far said "no."  </s>
<s> They've blocked this bill from even coming up for a vote in the Senate.  </s>
<s> It's politics at its worst.  </s>
<s> But it's not hard to understand why.  </s>
<s> Over the past two years, we've fought back against the  </s>
<s> entrenched special interests -- weakening their hold on the  </s>
<s> levers of power in Washington.  </s>
<s> We've taken a stand against the worst abuses of the  </s>
<s> financial industry and the health insurance companies.  </s>
<s> We've rolled back tax breaks for companies that ship jobs overseas.  </s>
<s> And we've restored enforcement of common sense rules to protect  </s>
<s> clean air and clean water.  </s>
<s> In other words, we've refused to go along with business as usual.  </s>
<s> Now, the special interests want to take Congress back,  </s>
<s> and return to the days when lobbyists wrote the laws.  </s>
<s> And a partisan minority in Congress is hoping their defense  </s>
<s> of these special interests and the status quo will be rewarded  </s>
<s> with a flood of negative ads against their opponents.  </s>
<s> It's a power grab, pure and simple.  </s>
<s> They're hoping they can ride this wave of unchecked influence  </s>
<s> all the way to victory.  </s>
<s> What's clear is that Congress has a responsibility to act.  </s>
<s> But the truth is, any law will probably come too late to  </s>
<s> prevent the damage that's already been done this election season.  </s>
<s> And that's why, any time you see an attack ad by one of these  </s>
<s> shadowy groups, you should ask yourself,  </s>
<s> who is paying for this ad?  </s>
<s> Is it the health insurance lobby?  </s>
<s> The oil industry?  </s>
<s> The credit card companies?  </s>
<s> More than that, you can make sure that the tens of millions  </s>
<s> of dollars spent on misleading ads don't drown out your voice.  </s>
<s> Because no matter how many ads they run --  </s>
<s> no matter how many elections they try to buy --  </s>
<s> the power to determine the fate of this country doesn't lie in their hands.  </s>
<s> It lies in yours.  </s>
<s> It's up to all of us to defend that most basic American  </s>
<s> principle of a government of, by, and for the people.  </s>
<s> What's at stake is not just an election.  </s>
<s> It's our democracy itself.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>

<s> We bridged differences to get things done.  </s>

<s> Folks know that issues are complicated,  </s>
<s> and that people with different ideas might  </s>

<s> politics hasn't gotten better, but worse.  </s>

<s> have fought to secure.  </s>

<s> One thing I focused on, for example,  </s>

<s> Because when more of us vote,  </s>

<s> our children.  </s>
<s> Nine years after I first announced for this office,  </s>

<s> for all the imperfections of our democracy;  </s>

<s> The President: Over the past week,  </s>
<s> the United States has continued to lead our friends and allies  </s>
<s> in the strategy to degrade and ultimately destroy  </s>
<s> the terrorist group known as ISIL.  </s>
<s> As I've said before, our intelligence community  </s>
<s> has not yet detected specific plots from these  </s>
<s> terrorists against America.  </s>
<s> Right now, they pose a threat to the people of Iraq, Syria,  </s>
<s> and the broader Middle East.  </s>
<s> But its leaders have threatened America and our allies.  </s>
<s> And if left unchecked, they could pose a growing threat  </s>
<s> to the United States.  </s>
<s> So, last month, I gave the order for our military  </s>
<s> to begin taking targeted action against ISIL.  </s>
<s> Since then, American pilots have flown more than  </s>
<s> 170 airstrikes against these terrorists in Iraq.  </s>
<s> And France has now joined us in these airstrikes.  </s>
<s> Going forward, we won't hesitate to take action against these  </s>
<s> terrorists in Iraq or in Syria.  </s>
<s> But this is not America's fight alone.  </s>
<s> I won't commit our troops to fighting another ground war  </s>
<s> in Iraq, or in Syria.  </s>
<s> It's more effective to use our capabilities to help partners  </s>
<s> on the ground secure their own country's futures.  </s>
<s> We will use our air power.  </s>
<s> We will train and equip our partners.  </s>
<s> We will advise and we will assist.  </s>
<s> And we'll lead a broad coalition of nations who  </s>
<s> have a stake in this fight.  </s>
<s> This isn't America vs.  </s>
<s> ISIL.  </s>
<s> This is the people of that region vs.  </s>
<s> ISIL.  </s>
<s> It's the world vs ISIL.  </s>
<s> We've been working to secure bipartisan support for this  </s>
<s> strategy here at home, because I believe that we are strongest  </s>
<s> as a nation when the President and Congress work together.  </s>
<s> We've been consulting closely with Congress.  </s>
<s> And last week, Secretary of State Kerry,  </s>

<s> to gain their support for our strategy.  </s>

<s> ISIL in Syria.  </s>

<s> This is an effort that America has the unique ability to lead.  </s>

<s> it calls on America.  </s>

<s> Right now, the United States Senate  </s>
<s> is debating a bipartisan, commonsense bill  </s>
<s> that would be an important step  </s>
<s> toward fixing our broken  immigration system.  </s>
<s> It's a bill that would continue  </s>
<s> to strengthen security at our borders,  </s>
<s> and hold employers more accountable  </s>
<s> if they knowingly hire  undocumented workers,  </s>
<s> so they won't have an unfair advantage  </s>
<s> over businesses that follow the law.  </s>
<s> It's a bill that would modernize  </s>
<s> the legal immigration system so that,  </s>
<s> as we train American workers for the jobs of tomorrow,  </s>
<s> we're also attracting the highly skilled entrepreneurs  </s>
<s> and engineers who grow our economy for everyone.  </s>
<s> It's a bill that would provide a pathway  </s>
<s> to earned citizenship for the 11 million individuals  </s>
<s> who are in this country illegally -  </s>
<s> a pathway that includes passing a background check,  </s>
<s> learning English, paying taxes and a penalty,  </s>
<s> then going to the back of the line  </s>
<s> behind everyone trying to come here legally.  </s>
<s> And, a few days ago,  </s>
<s> a report from the Congressional Budget Office definitively  </s>
<s> showed that this bipartisan, commonsense bill will help  </s>
<s> the middle class grow our economy and shrink our deficits,  </s>
<s> by making sure that every worker in America  </s>
<s> plays by the same set of rules  </s>
<s> and pays taxes like everyone else.  </s>
<s> According to this independent report,  </s>
<s> reforming our immigration system would reduce  </s>
<s> our deficits by almost a trillion dollars  </s>
<s> over the next two decades.  </s>
<s> And it will boost our economy by more than 5 percent,  </s>
<s> in part because of businesses created, investments made,  </s>
<s> and technologies invented by immigrants.  </s>
<s> This comes on the heels of another report  </s>
<s> from the independent office  </s>
<s> that monitors Social Security's finances,  </s>
<s> which says that this immigration bill  </s>
<s> would actually strengthen  the long-term health and solvency  </s>
<s> of Social Security for future generations.  </s>
<s> Because with this bill, millions of additional people  </s>
<s> will start paying more in taxes for things  </s>
<s> like Social Security and education.  </s>
<s> That'll make the economy fairer for middle-class families.  </s>

<s> A pathway to earned citizenship.  </s>
<s> A more vibrant, growing economy that's fairer  </s>
<s> on the middle class.  </s>

<s> like getting hit with a new tax coming right out of your pocket.  </s>
<s> Over the past four years, as part of our all-of-the-above  </s>
<s> energy strategy, we've taken steps to soften that blow by  </s>
<s> making sure our cars use less gas.  </s>
<s> We've put in place the toughest fuel economy standards in our  </s>
<s> history so that by the middle of the next decade,  </s>
<s> our cars will go twice as far on a gallon of gas.  </s>

<s> than $8,000 at the pump.  </s>
<s> But the only way we're going to break this cycle of spiking gas  </s>
<s> prices for good is to shift our cars and trucks off of  </s>
<s> oil for good.  </s>
<s> That's why, in my State of the Union Address,  </s>
<s> I called on Congress to set up an Energy Security Trust to fund  </s>
<s> research into new technologies that will help us  </s>
<s> reach that goal.  </s>
<s> Here's how it would work.  </s>
<s> Much of our energy is drawn from lands and waters that we,  </s>
<s> the public, own together.  </s>
<s> So I'm proposing that we take some of our oil and gas revenues  </s>
<s> from public lands and put it towards research that will  </s>
<s> benefit the public, so that we can support American ingenuity  </s>
<s> without adding a dime to our deficit.  </s>
<s> We can support scientists who are designing new engines that  </s>
<s> are more energy efficient; developing cheaper batteries  </s>

<s> and devising new ways to fuel our cars and trucks with new  </s>

<s> and admirals.  </s>
<s> So let's take their advice and free our families and our  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> In the next few days,  </s>
<s> America will take an important step  </s>
<s> towards fixing our broken immigration system.  </s>
<s> The entire United States Senate will begin debating  </s>
<s> a commonsense immigration reform bill  </s>
<s> that has bipartisan support.  </s>
<s> We define ourselves as a nation of immigrants.  </s>
<s> The promise we find in those who come from every corner  </s>
<s> of the globe has always been one of our greatest strengths.  </s>
<s> It's kept our workforce vibrant and dynamic.  </s>
<s> It's kept our businesses on the cutting edge.  </s>
<s> And it's helped build the greatest economic engine  </s>
<s> the world has ever known.  </s>
<s> But for years, our out-of-date immigration system has actually  </s>
<s> harmed our economy and threatened our security.  </s>
<s> Now, over the past four years, we've taken steps  </s>
<s> to try and patch up some of the worst cracks in the system.  </s>
<s> We strengthened security on the southern border  </s>
<s> by putting more boots on the ground  </s>
<s> than at any time in our history.  </s>
<s> And, in part, by using technology more effectively -  </s>
<s> today, illegal crossings  </s>
<s> are near their lowest level in decades.  </s>
<s> We focused enforcement efforts on criminals  </s>
<s> who are here illegally -  </s>
<s> who endanger our communities -  </s>
<s> and today, we deport more criminals than ever before.  </s>
<s> And we took up the cause of "Dreamers," the young people  </s>
<s> who were brought to this country as children.  </s>
<s> We said that if they're able to meet certain criteria,  </s>
<s> we'd consider offering them the chance  </s>
<s> to come out of the shadows  so they can continue to work here,  </s>
<s> and study here, and contribute  to our communities legally.  </s>
<s> But if we're going to truly fix a broken system,  </s>
<s> we need Congress to act in a comprehensive way.  </s>
<s> And that's why what's happening next week is so important.  </s>
<s> Now, the bill before the Senate isn't perfect.  </s>
<s> It's a compromise.  </s>
<s> Nobody will get everything they want -  </s>
<s> not Democrats, not Republicans, not me.  </s>
<s> But it is a bill that's largely consistent with the principles  </s>
<s> I've repeatedly laid out for commonsense immigration reform.  </s>
<s> This bill would continue  </s>
<s> to strengthen security at our borders,  </s>
<s> increase criminal penalties  </s>
<s> against smugglers and traffickers,  </s>
<s> and hold employers more accountable  </s>
<s> if they knowingly hire undocumented workers.  </s>
<s> If enacted, it would represent  </s>
<s> the most ambitious enforcement  plan in recent memory.  </s>
<s> This bill would provide a pathway to earned citizenship  </s>
<s> for the 11 million individuals  </s>
<s> who are in this country illegally -  </s>
<s> a pathway that includes passing a background check,  </s>
<s> learning English, paying taxes and a penalty,  </s>
<s> and then going to the back of the line  </s>
<s> behind everyone who's playing by the rules  </s>
<s> and trying to come here legally.  </s>
<s> This bill would modernize the legal immigration system  </s>
<s> so that, alongside training American workers  </s>
<s> for the jobs of tomorrow,  </s>
<s> we're also attracting highly-skilled entrepreneurs  </s>
<s> and engineers who will grow our economy.  </s>
<s> And so that our people don't have to wait years before their  </s>
<s> loved ones are able to join them in this country we love.  </s>
<s> That's what immigration reform looks like.  </s>
<s> Smarter enforcement.  </s>
<s> A pathway to earned citizenship.  </s>
<s> Improvements to the legal immigration system.  </s>
<s> They're all commonsense steps.  </s>
<s> They've got broad support - from Republicans and Democrats,  </s>
<s> CEOs and labor leaders, law enforcement and clergy.  </s>
<s> So there is no reason that Congress can't work together  </s>
<s> to send a bill to my desk by the end of the summer.  </s>
<s> We know the opponents of reform are going to do  </s>
<s> everything they can to prevent that.  </s>
<s> They'll try to stoke fear and create division.  </s>
<s> They'll try to play politics with an issue  </s>
<s> that the vast majority of Americans want addressed.  </s>
<s> And if they succeed, we will lose this chance to finally fix  </s>
<s> an immigration system that is badly broken.  </s>
<s> So if you agree that now is the time for commonsense reform,  </s>
<s> reach out to your Representatives.  </s>
<s> Tell them we have to get this done so that everyone  </s>
<s> is playing by the same rules.  </s>
<s> Tell them we have the power to do this in a way that lives up  </s>
<s> to our traditions as a nation of laws,  </s>

<s> goods and services Made in America to the rest  </s>
<s> of the world.  </s>
<s> Now, our businesses already sell goods and services  </s>
<s> in other countries at record levels.  </s>
<s> Our farmers, our factory workers,  </s>
<s> and our small businesses are exporting more  </s>
<s> than ever before - and exporters tend  </s>
<s> to pay their workers higher wages.  </s>
<s> More small businesses are using the internet  </s>
<s> to grow their business by reaching new customers  </s>
<s> they couldn't reach before, too.  </s>
<s> As an example, nine in ten American small businesses  </s>
<s> that use eBay as a platform to sell their products  </s>
<s> are exporters - with customers in more than 30 different  </s>
<s> countries on average.  </s>
<s> But there's a lot of room for growth.  </s>
<s> After all, 95% of the world's potential  </s>
<s> customers live outside our borders.  </s>
<s> Many of them live in the Asia-Pacific - the world's  </s>
<s> fastest-growing region.  </s>
<s> And as we speak, China is trying to write  </s>
<s> the rules for trade in the 21st century.  </s>
<s> That would put our workers and our businesses  </s>
<s> at a massive disadvantage.  </s>
<s> We can't let that happen.  </s>
<s> We should write those rules.  </s>
<s> That's why Congress should act on something  </s>
<s> called "trade promotion authority."  </s>
<s> This is bipartisan legislation that would  </s>
<s> protect American workers, and promote American  </s>
<s> businesses, with strong new trade deals from Asia  </s>
<s> to Europe that aren't just free, but are fair.  </s>
<s> It would level the playing field for American workers.  </s>
<s> It would hold all countries to the same high labor and  </s>
<s> environmental standards to which we hold ourselves.  </s>
<s> Now, I'm the first to admit that past trade deals  </s>
<s> haven't always lived up to the hype.  </s>
<s> And that's why we've successfully gone after  </s>
<s> countries that break the rules at our workers' expense.  </s>
<s> But that doesn't mean we should close ourselves  </s>
<s> off from new opportunities, and sit on the sidelines  </s>
<s> while other countries write our future for us.  </s>
<s> We should seize those opportunities.  </s>
<s> We should make sure the future is written by us.  </s>
<s> And if we do, we won't just keep creating good  </s>
<s> new jobs for decades to come - we'll make sure that  </s>
<s> this century is another all-American century.  </s>

<s> The President: As Commander in Chief,  </s>

<s> States will find no safe haven.  </s>
<s> Thanks to our military and counterterrorism professionals,  </s>
<s> we took out Osama bin Laden, much of al Qaeda's leadership  </s>
<s> in Afghanistan and Pakistan, and leaders of al Qaeda  </s>
<s> affiliates in Yemen and Somalia.  </s>
<s> We've prevented terrorist attacks,  </s>
<s> saved American lives and made our homeland more secure.  </s>
<s> Today, the terrorist threat is more diffuse,  </s>
<s> from al Qaeda affiliates and other extremists-like ISIL  </s>
<s> in Syria and Iraq.  </s>
<s> As I said this week, our intelligence community has  </s>
<s> not yet detected specific ISIL plots against our homeland.  </s>

<s> threat beyond the Middle East, including to the United States.  </s>
<s> So we're staying vigilant.  </s>
<s> And we're moving ahead with our strategy to degrade  </s>
<s> and ultimately destroy this terrorist organization.  </s>
<s> To meet a threat like this, we have to be smart.  </s>
<s> We have to use our power wisely.  </s>
<s> And we have to avoid the mistakes of the past.  </s>
<s> American military power is unmatched,  </s>
<s> but this can't be America's fight alone.  </s>

<s> in the heart of the Middle East.  </s>

<s> In fact, it would only risk fueling extremism even more.  </s>

<s> and more support to forces that are fighting these  </s>
<s> terrorists on the ground.  </s>

<s> these terrorists, and we're prepared to take action  </s>
<s> against ISIL in Syria as well.  </s>

<s> help Iraqi and Kurdish forces with the training,  </s>

<s> We're working with Congress to expand our efforts to train  </s>

<s> And we'll keep providing the humanitarian relief to help  </s>

<s> The President: Today, I want to take a few minutes  </s>
<s> to speak with you-directly and clearly-about Ebola:  </s>
<s> what we're doing about it, and what you need to know.  </s>
<s> Because meeting a public health challenge  </s>
<s> like this isn't just a job for government.  </s>
<s> All of us-citizens, leaders, the media-have  </s>
<s> a responsibility and a role to play.  </s>
<s> This is a serious disease, but we can't give in to hysteria  </s>
<s> or fear-because that only makes it harder to get  </s>
<s> people the accurate information they need.  </s>
<s> We have to be guided by the science.  </s>
<s> We have to remember the basic facts.  </s>
<s> First, what we're seeing now is not an "outbreak"  </s>
<s> or an "epidemic" of Ebola in America.  </s>
<s> We're a nation of more than 300 million people.  </s>
<s> To date, we've seen three cases of Ebola diagnosed here -  </s>
<s> the man who contracted the disease in Liberia,  </s>
<s> came here and sadly died; the two courageous nurses who  </s>
<s> were infected while they were treating him.  </s>
<s> Our thoughts and our prayers are with them,  </s>
<s> and we're doing everything we can to give them  </s>
<s> the best care possible.  </s>
<s> Now, even one infection is too many.  </s>
<s> At the same time, we have to keep this in perspective.  </s>
<s> As our public health experts point out,  </s>
<s> every year thousands of Americans die from the flu.  </s>
<s> Second, Ebola is actually a difficult disease to catch.  </s>
<s> It's not transmitted through the air like the flu.  </s>
<s> You cannot get it from just riding on a plane or a bus.  </s>
<s> The only way that a person can contract the disease  </s>
<s> is by coming into direct contact with the bodily fluids  </s>
<s> of somebody who is already showing symptoms.  </s>
<s> I've met and hugged some of the doctors  </s>
<s> and nurses who've treated Ebola patients.  </s>
<s> I've met with an Ebola patient who recovered,  </s>
<s> right in the Oval Office.  </s>
<s> And I'm fine.  </s>
<s> Third, we know how to fight this disease.  </s>
<s> We know the protocols.  </s>
<s> And we know that when they're followed, they work.  </s>
<s> So far, five Americans who got infected with Ebola  </s>
<s> in West Africa have been brought back  </s>
<s> to the United States-and all five have been treated  </s>
<s> safely, without infecting healthcare workers.  </s>
<s> And this week, at my direction,  </s>
<s> we're stepping up our efforts.  </s>
<s> Additional CDC personnel are on the scene  </s>
<s> in Dallas and Cleveland.  </s>
<s> We're working quickly to track and monitor anyone who may  </s>
<s> have been in close contact with someone showing symptoms.  </s>
<s> We're sharing lessons learned so other hospitals  </s>
<s> don't repeat the mistakes that happened in Dallas.  </s>
<s> The CDC's new Ebola rapid response teams will deploy  </s>
<s> quickly to help hospitals implement the right protocols.  </s>
<s> New screening measures are now in place at airports  </s>
<s> that receive nearly all passengers arriving  </s>
<s> from Liberia, Guinea and Sierra Leone.  </s>
<s> And we'll continue to constantly review our measures,  </s>
<s> and update them as needed, to make sure we're  </s>
<s> doing everything we can to keep Americans safe.  </s>
<s> Finally, we can't just cut ourselves off from  </s>
<s> West Africa, where this disease is raging.  </s>
<s> Our medical experts tell us that the best way to stop this  </s>
<s> disease is to stop it at its source-before it spreads  </s>
<s> even wider and becomes even more difficult to contain.  </s>
<s> Trying to seal off an entire region of the world-if that were  </s>
<s> even possible-could actually make the situation worse.  </s>
<s> It would make it harder to move health workers  </s>
<s> and supplies back and forth.  </s>
<s> Experience shows that it could also cause people  </s>
<s> in the affected region to change their travel, to evade  </s>
<s> screening, and make the disease even harder to track.  </s>
<s> So the United States will continue to help lead  </s>
<s> the global response in West Africa.  </s>
<s> Because if we want to protect Americans from Ebola here  </s>
<s> at home, we have to end it over there.  </s>
<s> And as our civilian and military personnel serve in the region,  </s>
<s> their safety and health will remain a top priority.  </s>
<s> As I've said before, fighting this disease will take time.  </s>
<s> Before this is over, we may see more isolated cases  </s>
<s> here in America.  </s>
<s> But we know how to wage this fight.  </s>
<s> And if we take the steps that are necessary,  </s>
<s> if we're guided by the science-the facts,  </s>
<s> not fear-then I am absolutely confident that we can prevent  </s>
<s> a serious outbreak here in the United States,  </s>
<s> and we can continue to lead the world in this urgent effort.  </s>

<s> The President: March is Women's History Month, a time not only to celebrate the  </s>
<s> progress that women have made, but also the women throughout  </s>
<s> our history who have made that progress possible.  </s>
<s> One inspiring American who comes to mind is Eleanor Roosevelt.  </s>
<s> In 1961, the former First Lady was unhappy about the lack of  </s>
<s> women in government, so she marched up to President Kennedy  </s>
<s> and handed him a three-page list of women who were qualified for  </s>
<s> top posts in his administration.  </s>
<s> This led the President to select Mrs. Roosevelt as the head of a  </s>
<s> new commission to look at the status of women in America,  </s>
<s> and the unfairness they routinely faced in their lives.  </s>
<s> Though she passed away before the commission could finish its  </s>
<s> work, the report they released spurred action across the country.  </s>
<s> It helped galvanize a movement led by women that would help  </s>
<s> make our society a more equal place.  </s>
<s> It's been almost 50 years since the Roosevelt commission  </s>
<s> published its findings -- and there have been few similar  </s>
<s> efforts by the government in the decades that followed.  </s>
<s> That's why, last week, here at the White House,  </s>
<s> we released a new comprehensive report on the status of women in  </s>
<s> the spirit of the one that was released half a century ago.  </s>
<s> There was a lot of positive news about the strides we've made,  </s>
<s> even in recent years.  </s>
<s> For example, women have caught up with men in seeking higher education.  </s>
<s> In fact, women today are more likely than men to attend and  </s>
<s> graduate from college.  </s>
<s> Yet, there are also reminders of how much more work remains to be done.  </s>
<s> Women are still more likely to live in poverty in this country.  </s>
<s> In education, there are areas like math and engineering where  </s>
<s> women are vastly outnumbered by their male counterparts.  </s>
<s> This is especially troubling, for we know that to compete with  </s>
<s> nations around the world, these are the fields in which we need  </s>
<s> to harness the talents of all our people.  </s>
<s> That's how we'll win the future.  </s>
<s> And, today, women still earn on average only about 75 cents for  </s>
<s> every dollar a man earns.  </s>
<s> That's a huge discrepancy.  </s>
<s> And at a time when folks across this country are struggling to  </s>
<s> make ends meet -- and many families are just trying to get  </s>
<s> by on one paycheck after a job loss --  </s>
<s> it's a reminder that achieving equal pay for equal work isn't  </s>
<s> just a women's issue.  </s>
<s> It's a family issue.  </s>
<s> In one of my first acts as President,  </s>
<s> I signed a law so that women who've been discriminated  </s>
<s> against in their salaries could have their day in court to make it right.  </s>
<s> But there are steps we should take to prevent that from  </s>
<s> happening in the first place.  </s>
<s> That's why I was so disappointed when an important bill to give  </s>
<s> women more power to stop pay disparities --  </s>
<s> the Paycheck Fairness Act -- was blocked by just two votes in the Senate.  </s>
<s> And that's why I'm going to keep up the fight to pass the reforms  </s>
<s> in that bill.  </s>
<s> Achieving equality and opportunity for women isn't just  </s>
<s> important to me as President.  </s>
<s> It's something I care about deeply as the father of two  </s>
<s> daughters who wants to see his girls grow up in a world where  </s>
<s> there are no limits to what they can achieve.  </s>
<s> As I've traveled across the country,  </s>
<s> visiting schools and meeting young people,  </s>
<s> I've seen so many girls passionate about science and  </s>
<s> other subjects that were traditionally not open to them.  </s>
<s> We even held a science fair here at the White House,  </s>
<s> where I met a young woman named Amy Chyao.  </s>
<s> She was only 16 years old, but she was actually working on a  </s>
<s> treatment for cancer.  </s>
<s> She never thought, "Science isn't for me."  </s>
<s> She never thought, "Girls can't do that."  </s>
<s> She was just interested in solving a problem.  </s>
<s> And because someone was interested in giving her a  </s>
<s> chance, she has the potential to improve lives.  </s>
<s> That tells me how far we've come.  </s>
<s> But it also tells me we have to work even harder to close the  </s>
<s> gaps that still exist, and to uphold that simple American  </s>
<s> ideal: we are all equal and deserving of the chance to  </s>
<s> pursue our own version of happiness.  </s>
<s> That's what Eleanor Roosevelt was striving toward half a  </s>
<s> century ago.  </s>
<s> That's why this report matters today.  </s>
<s> And that's why, on behalf of all our daughters and all our sons,  </s>
<s> we've got to keep making progress in the years ahead.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> Over the past year, as I traveled across the country  </s>
<s> campaigning for this office, I told you that if I was fortunate  </s>
<s> enough to be re-elected, I'd work to change a tax code that  </s>
<s> too often benefited the wealthy at the expense of the  </s>
<s> middle class.  </s>
<s> This week, we did that.  </s>
<s> For the first time in two decades,  </s>
<s> we raised taxes on the wealthiest 2% of Americans in a  </s>
<s> bipartisan way, while preventing a middle-class tax hike that  </s>
<s> could have thrown our economy back into recession.  </s>
<s> Under this law, more than 98% of Americans and 97% of small  </s>
<s> business will not see their income taxes go up one dime.  </s>
<s> We also made sure that millions of families will continue to  </s>
<s> receive tax credits to help raise their children and send  </s>
<s> them to college.  </s>
<s> Companies will continue to receive tax credits for the  </s>
<s> research they do, the investments that they make,  </s>
<s> and the clean energy jobs that they create.  </s>
<s> And two million Americans who are out of work will continue to  </s>
<s> receive unemployment benefits so long as they are actively  </s>
<s> looking for a job.  </s>
<s> But all this was just one step in the broader effort to grow  </s>
<s> our economy and shrink our deficits.  </s>
<s> We still need to do more to put Americans back to work while  </s>
<s> also putting this country on a path to pay down its debt.  </s>
<s> And our economy can't afford more protracted showdowns or  </s>
<s> manufactured crises along the way.  </s>
<s> Because even as our businesses created 2 million new jobs last  </s>
<s> year -- including 168,000 new jobs last month --  </s>
<s> the messy brinksmanship in Congress made business owners  </s>
<s> more uncertain and consumers less confident.  </s>
<s> We know there's a path forward.  </s>
<s> Last year, I signed into law $1.7 trillion in  </s>
<s> deficit reduction.  </s>
<s> This week's action further reduces the deficit by $737  </s>
<s> billion, making it one of the largest deficit reduction bills  </s>
<s> passed by Congress in over a decade.  </s>
<s> And I'm willing to do more.  </s>
<s> I believe we can find more places to cut spending without  </s>
<s> shortchanging things like education, job training,  </s>
<s> research and technology all of which are critical to our  </s>
<s> prosperity in a 21st century economy.  </s>
<s> But spending cuts must be balanced with more reforms to  </s>
<s> our tax code.  </s>
<s> The wealthiest individuals and the biggest corporations  </s>
<s> shouldn't be able to take advantage of loopholes and  </s>
<s> deductions that aren't available to most Americans.  </s>
<s> As I said earlier this week, one thing I will not compromise over  </s>
<s> is whether or not Congress should pay the tab for a bill  </s>
<s> they've already racked up.  </s>
<s> If Congress refuses to give the United States the ability to pay  </s>
<s> its bills on time, the consequences for the entire  </s>
<s> global economy could be catastrophic.  </s>
<s> The last time Congress threatened this course of  </s>
<s> action, our entire economy suffered for it.  </s>
<s> Our families and our businesses cannot afford that dangerous  </s>
<s> game again.  </s>

<s> bipartisan way.  </s>
<s> If we focus on the interests of our country above the interests  </s>
<s> of party, I'm convinced we can cut spending and raise revenue  </s>
<s> in a manner that reduces our deficit and protects the  </s>
<s> middle class.  </s>
<s> And we can step up to meet the important business that awaits  </s>
<s> us this year.  </s>
<s> Creating jobs; boosting incomes; fixing our infrastructure and  </s>
<s> our immigration system.  </s>

<s> lousy constituent service.  </s>
<s> And it's not what you deserve.  </s>
<s> Your health insurance isn't something to play politics with.  </s>
<s> Our economy isn't something to play politics with.  </s>
<s> This is not a game.  </s>
<s> This is about the economic security  </s>
<s> of millions of families.  </s>
<s> See, in the states where governors and legislatures  </s>
<s> and insurers are working together to implement this law  </s>
<s> properly - states like California, New York, Colorado  </s>
<s> and Maryland - competition and consumer choice are actually  </s>
<s> making insurance affordable.  </s>
<s> So I'm going to keep doing everything in my power to make  </s>
<s> sure this law works as it's supposed to.  </s>
<s> Because in the United States of America, health insurance isn't  </s>
<s> a privilege - it is your right.  </s>
<s> And we're going to keep it that way.  </s>
<s> Thanks.  </s>
<s> And have a great weekend.  </s>
