<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> Over the past couple months,  </s>
<s> most of the political headlines you've read  </s>
<s> have probably been about the government shutdown  </s>
<s> and the launch of the Affordable Care Act.  </s>
<s> And I know that many of you have rightly  </s>
<s> never been more frustrated with Washington.  </s>
<s> But if you look beyond those headlines,  </s>
<s> there are some good things happening in our economy.  </s>
<s> And that's been my top priority  </s>
<s> since the day I walked into the Oval Office.  </s>
<s> After decades in which the middle class  </s>
<s> was working harder and harder  just to keep up,  </s>
<s> and a punishing recession that made it worse,  </s>
<s> we made the tough choices required  </s>
<s> not just to recover from crisis,  </s>
<s> but to rebuild on a new foundation  </s>
<s> for stronger, more durable economic growth.  </s>
<s> Five years later, we have fought our way back.  </s>
<s> Our businesses have created 7.8 million new jobs  </s>
<s> in the past 44 months.  </s>
<s> Another 200,000 Americans went back to work last month.  </s>
<s> The American auto industry has come roaring back  </s>
<s> with more than 350,000 new jobs -  </s>
<s> jobs churning out and selling the high-tech,  </s>
<s> fuel-efficient cars the world wants to buy.  </s>
<s> And they're leading the charge in a manufacturing sector  </s>
<s> that has added jobs for the first time  since the 1990s -  </s>
<s> a big reason why our businesses  sell more goods and services  </s>
<s> "Made in America" than ever before.  </s>
<s> We decided to reverse our addiction to foreign oil.  </s>
<s> And today, we generate more renewable energy than ever,  </s>
<s> more natural gas than anybody,  </s>
<s> and for the first time in nearly 20 years,  </s>
<s> America now produces more oil  </s>
<s> than we buy from other countries.  </s>
<s> We decided to fix a broken health care system.  </s>
<s> And even though the rollout of the marketplace  </s>
<s> where you can buy affordable plans  has been rough,  </s>
<s> so far, about 500,000 Americans are poised  </s>
<s> to gain health coverage starting January 1st.  </s>
<s> And by the way, health care costs are growing  </s>
<s> at the slowest rate in 50 years.  </s>
<s> And one more thing: since I took office,  </s>
<s> we've cut our deficits by more than half.  </s>
<s> And that makes it easier to invest  </s>
<s> in the things that create jobs -  </s>
<s> education, research, and infrastructure.  </s>
<s> Imagine how much farther along we could be  </s>
<s> if both parties were working together.  </s>
<s> Think about what we could do if a reckless few  </s>
<s> didn't hold the economy hostage every few months,  </s>
<s> or waste time on dozens of votes  </s>
<s> to repeal the Affordable Care Act  </s>
<s> rather than try to help us fix it.  </s>
<s> In the weeks ahead, I'll keep talking about my plan  </s>
<s> to build a better bargain for the middle class.  </s>
<s> Good jobs.  </s>
<s> A good education.  </s>
<s> A chance to buy a home, save, and retire.  </s>
<s> And yes, the financial security of affordable health care.  </s>
<s> And I'll look for any willing partners who want to help.  </s>
<s> Because of your hard work and tough sacrifices  </s>
<s> over the past five years,  </s>
<s> we're pointed in the right direction.  </s>
<s> But we've got more work to do to keep moving that way.  </s>
<s> And as long as I'm President,  </s>
<s> I'll keep doing everything I can  </s>
<s> to create jobs, grow the economy,  </s>
<s> and make sure that everyone who works hard  </s>

<s> Thanks, and have a great weekend.  </s>

<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> This week, after five years of effort with eleven other  </s>
<s> nations, we reached agreement on a new trade  </s>
<s> deal that promotes American values and protects  </s>
<s> American workers.  </s>
<s> There's a reason this Trans-Pacific Partnership  </s>
<s> took five years to negotiate.  </s>
<s> I wanted to get the best possible deal for  </s>
<s> American workers.  </s>
<s> And that is what we've done.  </s>
<s> Here's why it matters.  </s>
<s> Ninety-five percent of the world's consumers live  </s>
<s> outside our borders -- 95 percent.  </s>
<s> They want to buy American products.  </s>
<s> They want our cars; our music; our food.  </s>
<s> And if American businesses can sell more of their  </s>
<s> products in those markets, they can expand and support  </s>
<s> good jobs here at home.  </s>
<s> So it's no wonder that exports played a huge role  </s>
<s> in helping America recover from the Great Recession.  </s>
<s> In fact, last year, we set a new record for American  </s>
<s> exports for the fifth year in a row, selling more than  </s>
<s> $2 trillion in goods and services.  </s>
<s> Our exports support roughly 12 million American jobs --  </s>
<s> and they're jobs that typically pay better than  </s>
<s> other jobs.  </s>
<s> But here's the thing: Outdated trade rules put our  </s>
<s> workers at a disadvantage.  </s>
<s> And TPP will change that.  </s>
<s> Right now, other countries can cut their costs by  </s>
<s> setting lower standards to pay lower wages.  </s>
<s> This trade agreement, TPP, will change that, holding  </s>
<s> partner countries to higher standards and raising wages  </s>
<s> across a region that makes up nearly 40 percent of the  </s>
<s> global economy.  </s>
<s> Right now, other countries charge foreign taxes on  </s>
<s> goods that are made in America.  </s>
<s> Japan, for example, puts a 38 percent tax on American  </s>
<s> beef before it even reaches the market.  </s>
<s> Malaysia puts a 30 percent tax on American auto parts.  </s>
<s> Vietnam puts taxes as high as 70 percent on every car  </s>
<s> American automakers sell there.  </s>
<s> Those taxes and other trade barriers put our workers at  </s>
<s> a disadvantage.  </s>
<s> It makes it more expensive to make goods here and sell  </s>
<s> them over there.  </s>
<s> Well, TPP is going to change that.  </s>
<s> It eliminates more than 18,000 of these taxes on  </s>
<s> American goods and services.  </s>
<s> And that way, we're boosting America's farmers, ranchers,  </s>
<s> manufacturers, and small business owners -- make it  </s>
<s> easier for them to sell their products abroad.  </s>
<s> That's what it means to level the playing field for  </s>
<s> American workers and businesses.  </s>
<s> And when the playing field is level, and the rules are  </s>
<s> fair, Americans can out-compete anybody  </s>
<s> in the world.  </s>
<s> Now, I'm the first person who will say that past trade  </s>
<s> agreements haven't always lived up to their promise.  </s>
<s> Sometimes they've been tilted too much in the  </s>
<s> direction of other countries and we haven't gotten a  </s>
<s> fair deal.  </s>
<s> And that makes folks suspicious of any new  </s>
<s> trade initiatives.  </s>
<s> But let's be clear.  </s>
<s> Our future depends not on what past trade deals did  </s>
<s> wrong, but on doing new trade deals right.  </s>
<s> And that's what the TPP does.  </s>
<s> It includes the strongest labor standards in history,  </s>
<s> from requiring fair hours to prohibiting child labor and  </s>
<s> forced labor.  </s>
<s> It includes the strongest environmental standards  </s>
<s> in history.  </s>
<s> All these things level the playing field for us,  </s>
<s> because if they have to follow these rules, then  </s>
<s> they can't undercut us and sell their products cheaper  </s>
<s> because they're violating these rules.  </s>
<s> And unlike past trade agreements, these standards  </s>
<s> are actually enforceable.  </s>
<s> Without this agreement, competitors that don't share  </s>
<s> our values, like China, will write the rules of the  </s>
<s> global economy.  </s>
<s> They'll keep selling into our markets and try to lure  </s>
<s> companies over there; meanwhile they're going to  </s>
<s> keep their markets closed to us.  </s>
<s> That's what's been going on for the last 20 years.  </s>
<s> That's what's contributed so much to outsourcing.  </s>
<s> That's what has made it easier for them to compete  </s>
<s> against us.  </s>
<s> And it needs to change.  </s>
<s> With this Trans-Pacific Partnership, we are writing  </s>
<s> the rules for the global economy.  </s>
<s> America is leading in the 21st century.  </s>
<s> Our workers will be the ones who get ahead.  </s>
<s> Our businesses will get a fair deal.  </s>
<s> And those who oppose passing this new trade deal are  </s>
<s> really just accepting a status quo that everyone  </s>
<s> knows puts us at a disadvantage.  </s>
<s> Look, you don't have to take my word for it.  </s>
<s> In the coming weeks and months, you'll be able to  </s>
<s> read every word of this agreement online well before  </s>
<s> I sign it.  </s>
<s> You'll be able to see for yourself how this agreement  </s>
<s> is better than past trade deals -- and how it's better  </s>
<s> for America's working families.  </s>
<s> You can learn more at WhiteHouse.gov.  </s>
<s> And I look forward to working with both parties in  </s>
<s> Congress to approve this deal -- and grow our economy  </s>
<s> for decades to come.  </s>
<s> Thanks, everybody.  </s>
<s> And have a great weekend.  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> The President: Hi, everybody.  </s>
<s> Today, I want to talk about something that most of you  </s>
<s> already know -- it's hot outside.  </s>
<s> It's really hot.  </s>
<s> And if this feels worse than normal, that's because it is.  </s>
<s> We just found out that July was the warmest month on record --  </s>
<s> warmer than any other month since we began keeping track  </s>
<s> more than a century ago.  </s>
<s> On top of all this heat, we're also experiencing one of the  </s>
<s> worst droughts in over 50 years.  </s>
<s> Almost a quarter of the continental United States is  </s>
<s> facing what we call "extreme" or "exceptional"  </s>
<s> drought -- with states like Nebraska, Kansas, Missouri,  </s>
<s> Oklahoma and Arkansas getting hit harder than most.  </s>
<s> That's bad news for a lot of people,  </s>
<s> but it's especially tough on our farmers and ranchers.  </s>
<s> Right now, almost half of the corn crop in America is in poor  </s>
<s> or very poor condition.  </s>
<s> Cattlemen are struggling to feed their animals.  </s>
<s> Many folks are seeing their livelihoods dry up in front  </s>
<s> of their eyes.  </s>
<s> And if we don't get relief soon, Americans everywhere will start  </s>
<s> to feel the pinch, because the food our farmers and ranchers  </s>
<s> produce ends up on grocery store shelves.  </s>
<s> We can't let that happen.  </s>
<s> That's why, at my direction, the Department of Agriculture,  </s>
<s> led by Secretary Tom Vilsack, has been working with other  </s>
<s> agencies across the federal government to make sure we're  </s>
<s> doing everything we can to help farmers and ranchers fight back  </s>
<s> and recover from this disaster.  </s>
<s> Already, we've given farmers and small businesses across 32  </s>
<s> states access to low-interest emergency loans.  </s>
<s> We've opened up more federal land for grazing.  </s>
<s> And we're working with crop insurance companies to give  </s>
<s> farmers a short grace period on their premiums,  </s>
<s> since some families will be struggling to make ends meet at  </s>
<s> the end of the year.  </s>
<s> This past week, we went even further --  </s>
<s> announcing an additional $30 million to help get more water  </s>
<s> to livestock and restore land affected by the drought.  </s>
<s> We're making it easier for even more farmers,  </s>
<s> ranchers and businesses to get emergency loans.  </s>
<s> And the Department of Transportation is helping more  </s>
<s> truck drivers deliver supplies to states that need  </s>
<s> them the most.  </s>
<s> This is an all-hands-on-deck response,  </s>
<s> and we'll be doing even more in the coming weeks to help  </s>
<s> families and communities that are suffering.  </s>
<s> But my Administration can't do it alone.  </s>
<s> Congress needs to do its part, too.  </s>
<s> They need to pass a farm bill that not only helps farmers and  </s>
<s> ranchers respond to these kinds of disasters,  </s>
<s> but also makes necessary reforms and gives them some  </s>
<s> certainty year-round.  </s>
<s> That's the single best way we can help rural communities right  </s>
<s> now, and also in the long-term.  </s>
<s> So call your Members of Congress, write them an email,  </s>
<s> and tell them that now is the time to come together and  </s>
<s> get this done.  </s>
<s> Too many Americans are suffering right now to let politics get  </s>
<s> in the way.  </s>
<s> Let's help farmers, ranchers and business owners recover.  </s>
<s> Let's make sure that families who already stretch their  </s>
<s> budgets to the limit don't have to pay more for  </s>
<s> groceries this fall.  </s>
<s> In the meantime, I'll keep doing everything I can to help  </s>
<s> communities respond to this disaster.  </s>
<s> Because at times like these, it doesn't matter if you live in  </s>
<s> Des Moines or Detroit -- we're Americans first.  </s>
<s> And if we look out for each other,  </s>
<s> we'll come out of this stronger than before.  </s>
<s> Have a great weekend, everybody, and stay cool.  </s>
